sourceString: Rapidly increasing cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) in the European Union/European Economic Area and the United Kingdom, 1 January to 15 March 2020
targetString: Ana haɓaka yawan haɗarin cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) a cikin Tarayyar Turai/Tatalin Arzikin Yankin Turai da Ingila, ran 1 ga watan Janairu zuwa ran 15 watan Maris 2020

sourceString: The cumulative incidence of coronavirus disease (COVID-19) cases is showing similar trends in European Union/European Economic Area countries and the United Kingdom confirming that, while at a different stage depending on the country, the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in all countries.
targetString: Lamarin da ya haifar da cututtukan Coronavirus (COVID-19) yana nuna irin wannan yanayin a cikin Tarayyar Turai/Yankin tattalin arzikin Turai da Ingila da ke tabbatar da cewa, yayin da a wani matakin daban dangane da ƙasar, cutar ta COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin sauri a duk ƙasashe.

sourceString: Based on the experience from Italy, countries, hospitals and intensive care units should increase their preparedness for a surge of patients with COVID-19 who will require healthcare, and in particular intensive care.
targetString: Dangane da shaida daga Italiya, ƙasashe, asibitoci da rukunin kulawa mai zurfi ya kamata su ƙara shiryawar su don karuwar marasa lafiyar COVID-19 waɗanda zasu buƙaci kiwon lafiya, kuma musamman kulawa mai zurfi.

sourceString: On 31 December 2019, a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown aetiology was reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: A ranar 31 ga watan Disamba 2019, an ba da rahoton wani tarin cututtukan huhu da ba a san ilimin halittar sa ba a Wuhan, Lardin Hubei, kasar Sin.

sourceString: On 9 January 2020, the China Center for Disease Control and Prevention reported the causative agent as being a novel coronavirus now referred to as severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu shekara 2020, Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da Rigakafin Cuta ta kasar Sin ta ba da rahoton wakili da ke kawo sabon cutar coronavirus ne wanda aka mai da shi a matsayin cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsananin coronavirus 2 (SARS-COV-2).

sourceString: Since, the illness resulting from SARS-CoV-2 infection has been named coronavirus disease (COVID-19).
targetString: Tun daga wannan lokacin, cutar da ke haifar da kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 an sanya mata suna cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).

sourceString: Evidence to date is that ca 80% of individuals with COVID-19 have a mild disease, i.e. a respiratory tract infection with or without pneumonia, and most of these recover.
targetString: Shaida zuwa yau ita ce ca 80% na mutane tare da COVID-19 suna da cuta mai laushi, wato kamuwa da cutar hanyoyin numfashi tare da ko ba tare da cutar huhu ba, kuma yawancin waɗannan suna samun sauki.

sourceString: In ca 14% cases, COVID-19 develops into a more severe disease requiring hospitalisation while the remaining 6% cases experience critical illness requiring intensive care.
targetString: A cikin kashi 14% masu cututtuka, COVID-19 yana haɓaka cikin mummunan cutar da ke buƙatar kwana a asibiti yayin da raguwar kashi 6% suna fuskantar mummunan cutar da ke buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi.

sourceString: The mortality of patients hospitalised due to COVID-19 is ca 4%.
targetString: Yawan mutuwar marasa lafiya a asibiti sakamakon COVID-19 ya kai ca kashi 4%.

sourceString: In this study, we assess the trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 in each European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) country and the United Kingdom (UK) and compare them to that of Hubei Province, China.
targetString: A cikin wannan binciken, muna tantance sauye-sauye game da abin da ya faru na COVID-19 a cikin kowace Europeanasashen Turai / Yankin Turai na Yankin Turai (EU/EEA) da Kingdomasar Ingila (Birtaniya) tare da kwatanta su da na lardin Hubei, Sin.

sourceString: We also compare the current number of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK with that in Italy during 31 January–15 March 2020.
targetString: Hakanan muna kwatanta adadin masu kamuwa da cutarbCOVID-19 a kasachen EU/EEA da UK tare da na Italiya lokacin ranar 31 ga watan Janairu - ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020.

sourceString: COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK
targetString: Lamuran cutar COVID-19 a kasashen EU / EEA da UK

sourceString: Subsequent to China, COVID-19 underwent further geographical spread and the dynamic of the COVID-19 pandemic in the rest of the world currently follows that of this country.
targetString: Bayan kasar Sin, COVID-19 ya ci gaba da yaduwar kasashe daban-daban da kuma saurin annban COVID-19 a cikin sauran duniya a halin yanzu tana bin wannan kasar.

sourceString: On 11 March 2020, the Director General of the World Health Organization (WHO) declared COVID-19 a pandemic.
targetString: A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, Darakta Janar na Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ya ayyana COVID-19 a matsayin annoba.

sourceString: In the 5 March issue of Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al. reported on the first European confirmed COVID-19 cases according to the WHO case definition.
targetString: A cikin fitowar ta ranar 5 ga watan Maris na Eurosurveillance 2020, Spiteri et al. wanda aka ba da rahoto game da Turai ta farko ta tabbatar da lamarin cutar COVID-19 bisa ga bayyanar lamarin WHO.

sourceString: In the EU/EEA, the first three confirmed cases were reported by France on 24 January 2020 in persons returning from Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.
targetString: A cikin EU/EEA, Faransa ta gabatar da farko lamarin cutar guda uku a ranar 24 ga watan Janairu 2020 a cikin mutanen da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Lardin Hubei, Kasar Sin.

sourceString: As at 15 March 2020, COVID-19 cases had been detected in all 30 EU/EEA countries and the United Kingdom (UK), whereby between 31 December 2019 and that date included, 39,768 cases and 1,727 deaths had been reported, with 17,750 cases and 1,441 deaths from Italy alone.
targetString: Kamar yadda yake a ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, an gano lamarin cutar COVID-19 a cikin dukkan ƙasashe 30 na EU/EEA da UK, inda tsakanin ranar 31 ga watan Disamba 2019 kuma wannan ranar ta haɗa, masun kamu da cutar 39,768 da mutuwar mutane 1,727 wanda aka ruwaito, tare da lamarin 17,750. da mutuwar mutane 1,441 daga Italiya kadai.

sourceString: Obtaining cumulative number and cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases
targetString: Samun lambar tarawa da tarawar abin da ya faru na masun cututtukar COVID-19

sourceString: At the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), the notified COVID-19 case counts in each country worldwide, obtained from only official sources such as the countries' Ministry of Health, national and regional health authorities and the WHO, are updated each day at 8:00 a.m.
targetString: A Cibiyar Yaki da Cututtuka ta Yankin Turai (ECDC), an sanar da ƙididdigar COVID-19 a cikin kowace ƙasa a duniya, wanda aka samo daga kawai kafofin hukuma kamar ma'aikatar lafiya ta ƙasashe, hukumomin kiwon lafiya na ƙasa da na WHO da WHO, ana sabunta su. kowace rana da karfe 8:00 na safe.

sourceString: These data were used for assessing the trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA and the UK, and comparing them to that in Italy.
targetString: An yi amfani da waɗannan bayanan don tantance halaye na COVID-19 a EU/EEA da UK, da kwatanta su da na Italiya.

sourceString: As a proxy of the prevalence of active COVID-19 cases, we calculated the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases, thus taking into account the natural course of COVID-19, in each EU/EEA country and the UK, during the 1 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: A matsayin wakili na abubuwan da ke faruwa na lamuran COVID-19, mun kirga kwanaki 14 tarawar abin da ya faru da aka yanke na lamurar COVID-19, don haka yin la'akari da tafarkin COVID-19, a cikin kowace kasar EU/EEA da Ingila, tsakanin ranar 1 ga watan Janairu - 15 Maris 2020.

sourceString: We also presented the cumulative number of notified cases of each country as at 15 March 2020 8:00 a.m. compared with that of Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: Mun kuma gabatar da tarawar lambar sanarwa game da lamarin kamuwa da cutan a kowace kasa a ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020 8:00 na safe idan aka kwatanta da na Italiya a ranar 31 ga watan Janairu - ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020.

sourceString: Trends of COVID-19 in EU/EEA countries and the UK
targetString: Hanyar COVID-19 cikin kasachen EU/EEA da Ingila

sourceString: The trends in the 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases in EU/EEA countries and the UK generally followed that of Hubei Province (China) (Figure 1).
targetString: Sauye a cikin kwanaki 14 tarawar tsayar da abin da ya faru na lamarin cutar COVID-19 a cikin ƙasashen EU/EEA da UK gaba ɗaya sun bi ta lardin Hubei (Sin) (Siffa 1).

sourceString: For the EU/EEA and the UK overall, the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 started to increase around 21 February and then increased sharply around 28 February 2020 (Supplementary material).
targetString: Don EU/EEA da Ingila gaba ɗaya, yawan abin da ya faru na COVID-19 ya fara ƙaruwa kusan ran 21 ga watan Fabrairu sannan kuma ya karu sosai a kusa da ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 (kayan kari abubuwa).

sourceString: This was mostly driven by the rapid increase in the number of reported cases from Italy, but all other EU/EEA countries and the UK showed similar increasing trends of the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 (Supplementary material).
targetString: Wannan ya jawu ta yawan saurin karuwa cikin lambar rahoton lamarin cutar daga Italiya, amma duk sauran kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya sun nuna irin wannan yanayin na kara yawan abubuwan COVID-19 (Karin kaya).

sourceString: Figure 2 shows the cumulative number of COVID-19 cases, in EU/EEA countries and the UK compared with that in Italy for the 31 January–15 March 2020 period.
targetString: Siffa 2 yana nuna lamarin cutar COVID-19, a cikin EU/EEA da UK idan aka kwatanta da wannan a Italiya na ranar 31 ga watan Janairu - ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020.

sourceString: It highlights that, as at 15 March 8:00 a.m., 15 other EU/EEA countries and the UK had already reported a total number of cases comparable to that of Italy just 3 weeks prior or less.
targetString: Yana nuna cewa, kamar yadda a ranar 15 ga watan Maris kafe 8:00 na safe, wasu ƙasashe EU/EEA 15 da Ingila sun riga sun bayar da rahoton masu kamuwa da cutar kwatanta da na Italiya kafin makonni 3 da suka shige ko ƙasa da haka.

sourceString: Our results indicate that the number of notified cases of COVID-19 is rapidly increasing in the EU/EEA and the UK.
targetString: Sakamakon binciken mu ya nuna cewa lambar masu kamuwa da cutar COVID-19 yana karuwa cikin hanzari a cikin EU/EEA da UK.

sourceString: The observed trends in the cumulative incidence of COVID-19 suggest that the pandemic is progressing at a comparable speed in all countries.
targetString: Abubuwan lura da aka gani a cikin abin da ya faru na COVID-19 sun ba da shawarar cewa annobar ta ci gaba da sauri a cikin sauri a duk ƙasashe.

sourceString: This is despite countries being at different stages, variations in national public health responses, and possibly different case definitions in countries and different protocols for selecting patients that must be tested for confirmation of COVID-19, including catch-up testing.
targetString: Wannan duk da cewa ƙasashe sun kasance a matakai daban-daban, a cikin martanin lafiyar jama'a na ƙasa, kuma mai yiwuwa ƙararraki daban-daban a cikin ƙasashe da ƙa'idodi daban-daban don zaɓar marasa lafiya waɗanda dole ne a gwada su don tabbatar da COVID-19, gami da samun gwaji.

sourceString: Early March 2020, doctors in the affected regions of Italy described a situation in which ca 10% of patients with COVID-19 required intensive care and media sources reported that hospitals and intensive care units in these regions had already reached their maximum capacity.
targetString: A farkon Maris 2020, likitoci a yankuna da abin ya shafa na Italiya sun baiyana halin da ake ciki inda ca 10% na marasa lafiya da COVID-19 suka buƙaci kulawa mai zurfi kuma kafofin watsa labaru sun ba da rahoton cewa asibitoci da rukunin kulawa mai zurfi a cikin waɗannan yankuna sun riga sun kai iyakar ƙarfin su.

sourceString: Data on admission of COVID-19 cases in a hospital and/or an intensive care unit are currently available at EU/EEA level for only 6% and 1% cases, respectively (data not shown).
targetString: Bayanai game da kai marasa lafiya a asibiti don COVID-19 da/ko sashin kulawa mai zurfi a halin yanzu akwai a matakin EU/EEA don kawai kashi 6% da kashi 1% lamarin cutar, bi da bi (bayanan ba su nuna ba).

sourceString: They should, however, be collected in a systematic fashion to complement current surveillance data that focus on the number of reported cases and the number of deaths.
targetString: Yakamata, duk da haka, a tattara su ta hanyar tsari don dacewa da bayanan sa ido na halin yanzu wanda ya mayar da hankali kan rahoton masu kamu da cutar da kuma yawan mutuwa.

sourceString: A study performed in 2010–11 showed a large variation in the availability of intensive care and intermediate care beds in Europe, ranging from 29.2 in Germany to 4.2 beds per 100,000 population in Portugal.
targetString: Nazarin da aka yi a shekara ta 2010 zuwa 11 ya nuna babban bambanci a cikin kasancewar kulawa mai zurfi da gadaje na kulawa a Turai, kama daga 29.2 a Jamus zuwa gadaje 4.2 ga yawan jama'a 100,000 a Portugal.

sourceString: This means that countries may have more or less resources than Italy (12.5 intensive care and intermediate care beds per 100,000 population in 2010–11).
targetString: Wannan yana nufin cewa ƙasashe na iya samun albarkatu ko ƙasa fiye da Italiya (12.5 kulawa mai zurfi da gadaje na kulawar dai-dai da cikin yawan jama'a 100,000 cikin 2010-11).

sourceString: Modelling scenarios related to healthcare capacity saturation, with estimates for each EU/EEA country and the UK of the prevalence of hospitalised COVID-19 cases associated with a > 90% risk of exceeding intensive care bed capacity, are provided in the sixth update of the ECDC rapid risk assessment on COVID-19.
targetString: Yanayin tsarafawa wanda ya danganta ga cikawar cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya, da ƙididdigar kowace ƙasar EU/EEA da UK da mamayar zaman asibiti domin lamarin cutar COVID-19 wanda ya hadu da > > 90% da hadarin fi yawan gadon kulawa, an samar da su a sabuntawa ta shida na ECDC saurin kimantawar hadari kan COVID-19.

sourceString: Since cases have so far clustered in certain regions in EU/EEA countries and the UK, and hospitals and intensive care units usually serve a defined regional catchment population, information about cases and intensive care beds should preferably be made available at the Nomenclature of territorial units for statistics 2 (NUTS-2) level.
targetString: Tunda yake masun kamuwa da cutan a tare cikin wasu yakin kasashen EU/EEA da UK, da asibitoci da kuma rukunin kulawa mai zurfin yawancin lokaci na taimaki jama'ar yankin da aka sani, bayanai game da lamarin cututtuka da gadajen kulawa zai fi dacewa a samo su a matakin Nomenclature na raka'ar yankunan ƙasa don ƙidaya 2 (NUTS-2) mataki.

sourceString: The experience from Italy and the current trends in other countries show that the COVID-19 pandemic is progressing rapidly in the EU/EEA and the UK.
targetString: Koyi daga Italiya da abubuwan da ake samu a halin yanzu a wasu ƙasashe sun nuna cewa annobar COVID-19 tana ci gaba cikin sauri a cikin EU/EEA da Ingila.

sourceString: Countries, hospitals and intensive care units should thus prepare themselves for a scenario of sustained community transmission of SARS-CoV-2 and an increase in the number of patients with COVID-19 requiring healthcare, and in particular intensive care, such as the one occurring in the affected regions of Italy.
targetString: Kasashe, asibitoci da rukunin kulawa mai zurfi ya kamata su shirya kansu don yanayin watsawar al'umma na SARS-CoV-2 da karuwa a yawan masu haƙuri da COVID-19 waɗanda ke buƙatar kiwon lafiya, da kuma kulawa ta musamman, kamar wanda ke faruwa. a cikin yankunan da Italiya ta shafa.

sourceString: As pointed out in the recent ECDC rapid risk assessment, a rapid, proactive and comprehensive approach is essential to delay the spread of SARS-COV-2, with a shift from a containment to a mitigation approach, as the anticipated rapid increase in the number of cases may not provide decision makers and hospitals enough time to comprehend, accept and adapt their response accordingly if not implemented ahead of time.
targetString: Kamar yadda aka nuna a cikin ƙididdigar haɓakar haɗari na ECDC na baya-bayan nan, saurin aiki, cikakken aiki da cikakken tsari yana da mahimmanci don jinkirta yaduwar SARS-COV-2, tare da canzawa daga haɓakawa zuwa tsarin ragewa, kamar yadda saurin karuwa a yawan masu kamuwa da cutar ba zai iya samar da masun bada shawara da cikaken lokaci ma asibitoci domin fahimta, karba da daidaita hanyar aiwatarwa kafin lokacin.

sourceString: The rapid risk assessment also lists the public health measures to mitigate the impact of the pandemic.
targetString: Binciken saurin haɗari ya kuma lissafa matakan kiwon lafiyar jama'a don rage tasirin annoban.

sourceString: There is a short window of opportunity during which countries have the possibility to further increase their control efforts to slow down the spread of SARS-CoV-2 and decrease the pressure on healthcare.
targetString: Akwai gajeriyar tagar dama a yayin da ƙasashe ke da damar ƙara yawan ƙoƙarinsu na sarrafawa don rage yaduwar SARS-CoV-2 da rage matsin kiwon lafiya.

sourceString: Failing this, it is likely that the healthcare systems of other EU/EEA countries will face a surge of patients that require intensive care within the coming days or weeks.
targetString: Fadar da wannan, wataƙila tsarin kiwon lafiyar na wasu ƙasashe EU/EEA zai iya fuskantar yawan marasa lafiya waɗanda ke buƙatar kulawa mai zurfi a cikin kwanaki masu zuwa ko makonni masu zuwa.

sourceString: The outbreak of Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), has thus far killed over 3,000 people and infected over 80,000 in China and elsewhere in the world, resulting in catastrophe for humans.
targetString: Barkewar cutar Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19), wanda ya haifar da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (SARS) coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), ya zuwa yanzu ya kashe mutane fiye da 3,000 kuma ta kama fiye da mutane 80,000 a kasar Sin da sauran wurare a duniya, ya zama masifa ne ga mutane.

sourceString: Similar to its homologous virus, SARS-CoV, which caused SARS in thousands of people in 2003, SARS-CoV-2 might also be transmitted from the bats and causes similar symptoms through a similar mechanism.
targetString: Mai kama da kwayar cutar guda ɗaya, SARS-CoV, wanda ya haifar da SARS a cikin dubban mutane a 2003, SARS-CoV-2 Hakanan za'a iya watsa shi daga jemage kuma yana haifar da alamun irin wannan ta irin wannan hanyar tsarin.

sourceString: However, COVID-19 has lower severity and mortality than SARS but is much more transmissive and affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women.
targetString: Duk da haka, COVID-19 yana da ƙananan rauni da kisa fiye da SARS amma yafi watsawa kuma yana rinjayar yawancin tsofaffi fiye da matasa kuma maza fiye da mata.

sourceString: In response to the rapidly increasing number of publications on the emerging disease, this article attempts to provide a timely and comprehensive review of the swiftly developing research subject.
targetString: Saboda martani ga yawan lambar wallafewa cikin sauri a kan cutar da ke kunno kai, wannan labarin yayi ƙoƙarin samar da ingantaccen nazari game haɓaka batun bincike mai sauri.

sourceString: We will cover the basics about the epidemiology, etiology, virology, diagnosis, treatment, prognosis, and prevention of the disease.
targetString: Za mu koyi tushe game da epidemiology, etiology, virology, bincike, jinya, hangar zuwan cutar (Prognosis), da kuma hanawar cutan.

sourceString: Although many questions still require answers, we hope that this review helps in the understanding and eradication of the threatening disease.
targetString: Kodayake tambayoyin da yawa har yanzu suna buƙatar amsoshi, muna fatan wannan bita ta taimaka a cikin fahimta da kawar da cutar mai barazanar.

sourceString: The Spring Festival on January 25, 2020 has become an unprecedented and unforgettable memory to all Chinese who were urged to stay indoors for all the holiday and for many weeks after due to the outbreak of a novel viral disease.
targetString: Bikin bazara a ranar 25 ga Janairu, 2020 ya zama abin tunawa wanda ba a iya mantawa da shi ba ga duk Sinawa da aka nemi su kasance a gida a duk wannan hutu da kuma makonni da yawa bayan barkewar cutar.

sourceString: The virus is highly homologous to the coronavirus (CoV) that caused an outbreak of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) in 2003; thus, it was named SARS-CoV-2 by the World Health Organization (WHO) on February 11, 2020, and the associated disease was named CoV Disease-19 (COVID-19).
targetString: Kwayar cutar ta yi kama sosai da coronavirus (CoV) wacce ta haifar da barkewar cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (SARS) a cikin shekarar 2003; don haka, Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ba shi suna SARS-CoV-2 a ranar 11 ga Fabrairu, 2020, kuma aka ba cuta mai haduwa da ita suna CoV Cutar-19 (COVID-19).

sourceString: The epidemic started in Wuhan, China, and quickly spread throughout the entire country and to near 50 others all over the world.
targetString: Annobar ta fara ne a Wuhan, kasar Sin, kuma cikin hanzari ya bazu cikin kasar baki daya kuma zuwa kusan wasu 50 a duk duniya.

sourceString: As of March 2, 2020, the virus has resulted in over 80,000 confirmed cases of COVID-19, with more than 40,000 patients discharged and over 3,000 patients who died.
targetString: Tun daga watan Maris 2, 2020, kwayar cutar ta haifar da fiye da lamari 80,000 da aka tabbatar da yanayin kamuwa da cutar COVID-19, da marasa lafiya fiye da 40,000 suka sami sauki kuma fiye da marasa lafiya 3,000 suka mutu.

sourceString: WHO warns that COVID-19 is “public enemy number 1” and potentially more powerful than terrorism.
targetString: WHO tayi kashedin cewa COVID-19 shine "lambar 1 na abokin gaba ta jama'a" kuma mai iya karfi fiye da ta'addanci.

sourceString: According to PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), in less than two months, over 200 papers have been published on COVID-19 including its virology, epidemiology, etiology, diagnosis, and treatment since the first report on January 7, 2020 that determined the sequence of the virus isolated from multiple patients.
targetString: Dangane da PubMed (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/), a cikin ƙasa da watanni biyu, an buga fiye da 200 takardu akan COVID-19 ciki har da virology, epidemiology, etiology, ganewar asali, da magani tun daga rahoton farko a Janairu 7, 2020 wanda ya kayyade jerin cutar ta ware daga marasa lafiya da yawa.

sourceString: This review attempts to summarize the research progress in the new and swiftly developing subject area.
targetString: Wannan bita tana ƙoƙarin taƙaita ci gaban bincike a cikin sabo da kuma mai saurin bunkasa taken wuri.

sourceString: Whenever possible, we will try to compare COVID-19 with SARS and another CoV-caused disease, Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS, an outbreak in 2012).
targetString: Duk lokacin da zai yiwu, zamuyi kokarin kwatanta COVID-19 tare da SARS da kuma wani CoV wanda ya haifar da cutar, cutar numfashi na gefen larabawa (barkewar MERS, a 2012).

sourceString: We will also discuss what we have learned so far regarding the prevention and prognosis of the disease as well as some remaining yet urgent questions.
targetString: Hakanan zamu tattauna abin da muka koya zuwa yanzu game da rigakafin da haifar da cutar da kuma wasu tambayoyin da suka rage.

sourceString: CoVs have been traditionally considered nonlethal pathogens to humans, mainly causing approximately 15% of common colds 4.
targetString: An dauki CoVs a al'adance cutar marasa guba ga mutane, akasarinsu yana haifar da kusan kashi 15% a mura 4.

sourceString: However, in this century, we have encountered highly pathogenic human CoVs twice, i.e., SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, which caused an outbreak originally in China in 2003 and Saudi Arabia in 2012, respectively, and soon spread to many other countries with horrible morbidity and mortality.
targetString: Duk da haka, a cikin wannan karni, mun ci karo da cutar mutum ta mutum sau biyu, watau SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, wanda ya haifar da asalin yaduwar a kasar Sin a shekarar 2003 da Saudi Arabia a cikin shekarar 2012, bi da bi, kuma nan da nan ya watsu cikin sauran ƙasashe tare da mummunan tashin hankali da mutuwa.

sourceString: Therefore, the current COVID-19 is the third CoV outbreak in the recorded history of humans.
targetString: Sabili da haka, COVID-19 na yanzu shine yaduwar CoV na uku a cikin tarihi da aka ajiye na mutum.

sourceString: As shown in Fig. ​Fig.1,1, clusters of pneumonia that had unknown origins were first reported from Wuhan on December 31, 2019 to the China National Health Commission.
targetString: Kamar yadda aka nuna a cikin siffa. 1,1, an fara samun cuwayoyin cutar huhu da ba ta da asasi da suka fara daga Wuhan a ranar 31 ga watan Disamba, 2019 ga Hukumar Lafiya ta Kasar Sin.

sourceString: Seven days later the sequence of the CoV was released.
targetString: Kwana bakwai daga baya an sake bin jerin hanyoyin CoV.

sourceString: On January 15, 2020 the first fatal case from Wuhan was reported.
targetString: A ranar 15 ga watan Janairu, 2020 an fara bayar da rahoton karar farko daga Wuhan.

sourceString: Meanwhile, the epidemic rapidly spread to the neighboring cities, provinces, and countries.
targetString: A halin da ake ciki, cutar ta bulla cikin hanzari zuwa garuruwan makwabta, larduna, da kasashe.

sourceString: On January 20, the infection of health-care providers was reported, suggesting that human-to-human transmission was possible.
targetString: A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, an ba da rahoton ma'aikatan kiwon-lafiya, sun bayar da shawarar cewa yadawar mutum-zuwa-mutum abu mai yiwuwa ne.

sourceString: On January 23, the city of Wuhan was locked down with all its public transportation stopped.
targetString: A ranar 23 ga watan Janairu, an kulle birnin Wuhan tare da dakatar da jigilar jama'a.

sourceString: On January 24 the first clinical study on the disease reported that, out of 41 patients with confirmed cases, only 21 had direct contact with the Wuhan seafood market that was considered the starting site of the infection from an unknown animal source.
targetString: A ranar 24 ga Janairu, binciken farko na asibiti game da cutar ya ba da rahoton cewa, a cikin mutane 41 da aka tabbatar da lamuran cutan, mutane 21 kawai suna da hulɗa kai tsaye tare da kasuwar cin abincin teku na Wuhan wanda aka yi la'akari da farkon wurin kamuwa da cuta daga asalin dabba.

sourceString: On January 30, WHO declared the outbreak a global health emergency.
targetString: A ranar 30 ga watar Janairu, WHO ta ba da sanarwar barkewar cutar ta gaggawa a duniya.

sourceString: By the time of this report, the disease has already spread throughout China and near 50 other countries all over the world (Fig. ​(Fig.2).2).
targetString: Ya zuwa lokacin hada wannan rahoto, cutar ta riga ta yadu a cikin kasar Sin da kuma kusan wasu kasashe 50 a duniya baki daya (Fig. (Fig. 2).2)

sourceString: As the situation is rapidly evolving, the final scope and severity of the outbreak remain to be determined.
targetString: Yayin da yanayin ke gudana cikin hanzari, yanayin ƙarewa da tsananin yaduwar ya kasance za a gano.

sourceString: On February 11, 2020, a multi-center study on 8,866 patients including 4,021 confirmed COVID-19 patients presented a more updated illustration of the epidemic as follows (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).
targetString: A ranar 11 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, wani bincike na cibiyar kan marasa lafiya 8,866 ciki har da 4,021 sun tabbatar da marassa lafiyar COVID-19 an gabatar da wani sabon bayanin da aka samu game da annoban kamar haka (https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/UlBi-HX_rHPXa1qHA2bhdA).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 infected people of all ages, but mainly at the age of 30-65.
targetString: Cutar SARS tana kama mutane masu kowanne irin shekaru, amma ta fi kama 'yan shekara 30-65.

sourceString: Almost half (47.7%) of the infected individuals were over 50 years old, very few were under 20, and only 14 infected individuals were under the age of 10.
targetString: Kusan rabin kashi (47.7%) na mutanen da ke kamuwa da cutar sun wuce shekaru 50, kaɗan kalilan ba su kasa da shekara 20 ba, kuma mutane 14 ne kawai suka kamu da cutar waɗanda ke ƙarƙashin shekara 10.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 infected more men (0.31/100,000) than women (0.27/100,000).
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 sun fi kama maza (0.31 / 100,000) fiye da mata (0.27 / 100,000).

sourceString: COVID-19 expanded in clusters mainly in and around Hubei.
targetString: COVID-19 ya fadada cikin gungura a ciki da kewayen Hubei.

sourceString: COVID-19 took an average of 5 (2-9) days from onset to diagnosis.
targetString: COVID-19 ya ɗauki tsawon kwanaki 5 (2-9) daga farko zuwa binciken ganewar sa.

sourceString: The average incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days.
targetString: Matsakaicin lokacin girman cutan shine kwanakin 4.8 (3.0-7.2).

sourceString: The average time from onset to death was 9.5 (4.8-13) days.
targetString: Matsakaicin lokacin daga farko zuwa mutuwa ya kasance kwanaki 9.5 (4.8-13)

sourceString: The basic reproductive number (R0) was 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), and the adjusted R0 was 2.23-4.82.
targetString: Lambar asali ta haihuwa (R0) ya kasance 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), kuma daidaitawar R0 shine 2.23-4.82.

sourceString: The number of infected people increased exponentially before 23 Jan. 2020, matching the time of massive transportation before the Spring Festival in China.
targetString: Yawan masu kamuwa da cutar sun karu sosai kafin ranar 23 ga Janairu 2020, wanda ya yi daidai da lokacin da ake daukar jigilar kayayyaki kafin bikin bazara a kasar Sin.

sourceString: The mortality of patients with confirmed cases was 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), and the adjusted mortality of all the patients was 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).
targetString: Yawan mutuwar marasa lafiya wanda aka tabbata da lamura kamu da cutan ya kai kashi 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), kuma daidaitawar mutuwar duk marasa lafiya shine kashi 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).

sourceString: Three major risk factors for COVID-19 were sex (male), age (≥60), and severe pneumonia.
targetString: Manyan dalilan haɗarin uku don COVID-19 sun kasance jima'i (namiji), shekaru (≥60), da matsananciyar ciwon huhu.

sourceString: CoVs are a subfamily of large and enveloped viruses containing a single strand of sense RNA.
targetString: CoVs dan rashen iyali ne na babban ambulaf ƙwayoyin cuta wanda ke dauke da ma'anar RNA guda daya.

sourceString: They can be divided into four genera, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, and delta, of which alpha- and beta-CoVs are known to infect humans.
targetString: Ana iya rarrabasu gida uku, i.e., alpha, beta, gamma, da delta, waɗanda alpha- da beta-CoVs an san su don kamuwa da ɗan adam.

sourceString: The envelope spike (S) glycoprotein binds to its cellular receptors angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) and dipeptidyl peptidase 4 (DPP4) for SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, respectively, and then membrane fusion occurs.
targetString: Ambulaf ta kara daurin (S) glycoprotein a masu karɓar kwayar halittar sa angiotensin-mai canza enzyme 2 (ACE2) da pepeididly peptidase 4 (DPP4) don SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV, bi da bi, sannan kuma hadawar membrane yana faruwa.

sourceString: The viral RNA genome is released into the cytoplasm; after replication of the viral genome, genomic RNA accompanied by envelope glycoproteins and nucleocapsid proteins forms virion-containing vesicles, which then fuse with the plasma membrane to release the virus.
targetString: An saki kwayar cutar RNA a cikin cytoplasm; bayan sake fasaltar kwayar halittar, RNA genomic rufe baya da ambulaf na glycofurotin da sunadarai na nucleocapsid suna samar da virion-dauke da vesicles, wanda sai ya hadu da membrane na plasma don sakin kwayar cutan.

sourceString: The first genomic sequence of SARS-CoV-2 was reported on January 10, 2020.
targetString: An bayar da rahoton jerin kwayoyin halitta na farko na SARS-CoV-2 a ran 10 ga watan Janairu, 2020.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 was found to be a new type of beta-CoV with more than 99.98% genetic identity among 10 sequenced samples collected from the original site of the outbreak, the Huanan Seafood Market in Wuhan.
targetString: An gano SARS-CoV-2 wani sabon nau'in beta-CoV ne tare da fiye da kashi 99.98% asalin kwayoyin halitta tsakanin samfuran 10 da aka tattara daga asalin yaduwar, Kasuwar abincin teku ta Huanan a Wuhan.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is genetically more similar to SARS-CoV than to MERS-CoV.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 ya fi kamani da SARS-CoV fiye da MERS-CoV.

sourceString: Through transmission electron microscopy, SARS-CoV-2 particles were found in ultrathin sections of human airway epithelium.
targetString: Ta hanyar watsa microscopy na wutar lantarki, an samo barbashi na SARS-CoV-2 a sassan iskar jikin mutum na epithelium.

sourceString: Human ACE2 was found to be a receptor for SARS-CoV-2 as well as SARS-CoV.
targetString: An samo ACE2 na mutum a matsayin mai karɓa wa SARS-CoV-2 kazalika da SARS-CoV.

sourceString: However, the S protein of SARS-CoV-2 binds to human ACE2 more weakly than that of SARS-CoV, which is coincident with the fact that SARS-CoV-2 causes less severe infection in patients than SARS-CoV.
targetString: Duk da haka, furotin S na SARS-CoV-2 ya danganta ga ACE2 na ɗan adam fiye da na SARS-CoV, wanda ya zo daidai da gaskiyar cewa SARS-CoV-2 yana haifar da ƙarancin kamuwa da cuta a cikin marasa lafiya fiye da SARS-CoV.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 can also form a novel short protein encoded by orf3b and a secreted protein encoded by orf8.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 na iya samar da gajeriyar sunadarin furotin da aka shigar ta orf3b da wani furotin da ke rufe da orf8.

sourceString: The orf3b of SARS-CoV-2 may play a role in the viral pathogenicity and inhibit the expression of IFNβ; however, orf8 does not contain any known functional domain or motif.
targetString: orf3b na SARS-CoV-2 na iya taka rawa a cikin bada kwayar cuta da kuma hana bayyanar IFNβ; kodayake, orf8 ba ya da wani yanki da aka sani aiki ko motif.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Zhou, et al., reported the cryo-EM structure of the full-length human ACE2 at 2.9 Å resolution in complex with the amino acid transporter B0AT1.
targetString: A ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, Zhou, et al, sun ba da rahoton tsarin cryo-EM na cikakken ACE2 na dan adam a ƙudurin 2.9 Å ƙuduri cikin hadadden mai ɗaukar amino acid B0AT1.

sourceString: They found that the complex, which had open and closed conformations, was assembled as a dimer and the ACE2-B0AT1 complex can bind two S proteins, which provides evidence for CoV recognition and infection.
targetString: Sun gano cewa hadadden, wanda an gano aka bude kuma an rufe, an taru a matsayin sinadari dimer kuma hadadden ACE2-B0AT1 na iya daurar sinadarai biyu na S furotin, wanda ke ba da shaida don ganewar CoV da kamuwa da cuta.

sourceString: B0AT1 may become a therapeutic target for drug screening to suppress SARS-CoV-2 infection.
targetString: B0AT1 na iya zama makasudin warkewa don gwajin magunguna don murƙushe kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The origin and intermediate host
targetString: Asalin da kuma tsakiyar mazaman cutar.

sourceString: It has been known that both SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV originated from bats and were transmitted to humans via civet cats and camels, respectively.
targetString: An san cewa SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV sun samo asali ne daga jemagu kuma ana watsa su ga mutane ta hanyar kuliyoyi da raƙuma.

sourceString: Through a phylogenetic comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with other CoVs, bats were considered the native host of SARS-CoV-2 as the new virus is 96% identical to two SARS-like CoVs from bats called bat-SL-CoVZX45 and bat-SL-CoVZX21.
targetString: Ta hanyar kwatancen fitowar cututtukan na SARS-CoV-2 tare da sauran CoVs, an yi la'akari cewa jemage ne mazaunin SARS-CoV-2 kamar yadda sabon ƙwayar cuta ya kasance kashi 96% zuwa mai kamar-SARS CoVs biyu daga jemagu da ake kira bat-SL-CoVZX45 da jemage-SL-CoVZX21.

sourceString: However, what intermediate host helped the virus cross the species barrier to infect humans remains unknown, and the transmission route is yet to be elucidated.
targetString: Duk da haka, wande mazaman tsakiya mai taimaka wa kwayar cutar ta keta shingen nau'ikan don kama mutane har yanzu ba a san shi ba, kuma har yanzu ba a fara sanin hanyar yada cutar ba.

sourceString: Ji, et al., proposed snakes as a carrier of the virus from bats to humans which involved homologous recombination within the S protein.
targetString: Ji, et al., Sun gabatar da macizai a matsayin jigilar kwayar cutar daga jemagu zuwa mutane wanda ke da alaƙar yin ma'amala tsakanin S furotin.

sourceString: According to a study, researchers in Guangzhou, China, suggested that pangolins - long-snouted, ant-eating mammals often used in traditional Chinese medicine - are the potential intermediate host of SARS-CoV-2 based on 99% genetic homology in a CoV discovered in pangolins and SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Dangane da wani bincike, masu bincike a Guangzhou, China, sun ba da shawarar cewa pangolins - dogon-hanci da baki, dabbobi masu cin kyashi an cikia amfani da su cikin al'adar maganin Sinawa - su ne mazama SARS-COV-2 da ke yiwu wa bisa ga kashi 99% kwayar halitta a cikin wani CoV wanda aka gano a cikin pangolins da SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: However, 1% difference spread all over two genomes is still a big difference; thus, conclusive results for concrete evidence are awaited (Fig. ​(Fig.33).
targetString: Duk da haka bambancin kashi 1% ya bazu akan kwayoyin halitta guda biyu har yanzu babban bambanci ne; don haka, ana jiran sakamako na ƙarshe don tabbataccen hujja (Fig.(Fig.33).

sourceString: The physicochemical properties of SARS-CoV-2 are largely not yet known.
targetString: Sunadarain kimiyyar kadarorin SARS-CoV-2 har yanzu ba a san su ba.

sourceString: SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV can survive in vitro for 48 hours in a dry environment and up to 5 days under 20 °C and 40%-50% humidity.
targetString: SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV zasu iya rayuwa cikin kwalban gwaji na tsawon awanni 48 a cikin busheshen yanayin har zuwa kwanaki 5 a ƙarƙashin 20 ° C da danshi kashi 40% -50%.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 may possess similar properties.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 na iya mallakar kaddarorin iri daya.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 is sensitive to ultraviolet rays and heat at 56 °C for 30 minutes; ether, 75% ethanol, chlorine-containing disinfectant, peracetic acid, chloroform, and other fatty solvents, but not chlorhexidine, can effectively inactivate the virus.
targetString: An ba da rahoton cewa SARS-CoV-2 yana kula da haskoki na zafin rana da zafi a 56 ° C na minti 30; kashi 75% ethanol, chlorine-mai dauke da sinadarai, sinadarin peracetic acid, chloroform, da sauran abubuwan rage kiba, amma ba chlorhexidine ba, na iya lalata kwayar ta yadda ya kamata.

sourceString: The entire human population generally lacks immunity to SARS-CoV-2 and hence is susceptible to the novel virus.
targetString: Yawan mutane gabaɗaya sun rasa garkuwa ga SARS-CoV-2 kuma saboda haka ana iya kamuwa da sabuwar ƙwaya cutan.

sourceString: Currently, no detailed study has been reported regarding the immunological response to SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: A halin yanzu, babu cikakken binciken da aka bayar da rahoton game da amsawar rigakafi ga SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Thus, we can only refer to previous studies on other CoVs, especially SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV (Fig. ​(Fig.4).4).
targetString: Don haka, zamu iya komawa ne kawai ga binciken da muka gabata akan wasu CoVs, musamman SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV (Fig. (Fig. 4).4).

sourceString: In general, after a virus invades the host, it is first recognized by the host innate immune system through pattern recognition receptors (PRRs) including C-type lectin-like receptors, Toll-like receptor (TLR), NOD-like receptor (NLR), and RIG-I-like receptor (RLR).
targetString: Gabaɗaya, bayan da kwayar cutar ta mamaye mai watsa shiri, an fara gane ta hanyar rigakafin garkuwar jiki ta hanyar karɓa (PRRs) gami da masu karɓa na nau'in irin-C, kamar-Toll mai karɓa (TLR), mai karɓar kamar-NOD mai karɓa (NLR) , da kamar-RIG-I mai karɓa (RLR).

sourceString: Through different pathways, the virus induces the expression of inflammatory factors, maturation of dendritic cells, and synthesis of type I interferons (IFNs) which limit the spreading of the virus and accelerate macrophage phagocytosis of viral antigens.
targetString: Ta hanyar hanyoyi daban-daban, kwayar cutar ta haifar da bayyanar da abubuwan da ke haifar da kumburi, matattarar ƙwayoyin dendritic, da haɓaka nau'in I interferons (IFNs) waɗanda ke iyakance yaduwar ƙwayar cuta kuma suna haɓaka matakan ƙwayoyin cuta na ƙwayoyin cuta.

sourceString: However, the N protein of SARS-CoV can help the virus escape from the immune responses.
targetString: Duk da haka, sinadarin furotin N na SARS-CoV zai iya taimakawa kwayar cutar ta tsere daga amsawar garkuwan jiki.

sourceString: Soon, the adaptive immune response joins the fight against the virus.
targetString: Ba da daɗewa ba, amsar rigakafin ƙwayar cuta ta shiga cikin yaƙi da ƙwayar cuta.

sourceString: T lymphocytes including CD4+ and CD8+ T cells play an important role in the defense.
targetString: T lymphocytes ciki har da CD4 + da CD8 + T tantanin halitta suna taka muhimmiyar rawa a cikin tsaron.

sourceString: CD4+ T cells stimulate B cells to produce virus-specific antibodies, and CD8+ T cells directly kill virus-infected cells.
targetString: Tantanin halita CD4 + T suna motsa ƙwayoyin B don samar da ƙayyadaddun rigakafin ƙwayoyin cuta, kuma sel CD8 + T tantanin halita na kashe kwayoyin cutar da suka kamu da ciwo kai tsaye.

sourceString: T helper cells produce proinflammatory cytokines to help the defending cells.
targetString: Mai taimakon tantanin halita T ta samar da cytokines na kumburi don taimakawa kwayoyin da ke kare su.

sourceString: However, CoV can inhibit T cell functions by inducing apoptosis of T cells.
targetString: Duk da haka, CoV zai iya hana ayyukan tantanin halita T ta hanyar gabatar da apoptosis na tantanin halita T.

sourceString: The humoral immunity including complements such as C3a and C5a and antibodies is also essential in combating the viral infection.
targetString: Rigakafin ƙwaƙwalwar ciki har da haɗi kamar C3a da C5a da ƙwayoyin garkuwar jiki suna da mahimmanci don yaƙar kamuwa da cuta.

sourceString: For example, antibodies isolated from a recovered patient neutralized MERS-CoV.
targetString: Alal misali, warewar kwayoyin garkuwar jiki daga wani mara lafiya mai warkewa ya watsar da MERS-CoV.

sourceString: On the other hand, an overreaction of the immune system generates a large number of free radicals locally that can cause severe damages to the lungs and other organs, and, in the worst scenario, multi-organ failure and even death.
targetString: A gefe guda, wuce gona da iri na tsarin rigakafi yana haifar da babban adadin radadi kyauta a cikin gida wanda zai iya haifar da lahani ga huhu da sauran gabobin, kuma, a cikin mummunan yanayin, gazawar ƙwayoyin cuta da dama har ma da mutuwa.

sourceString: The SARS-CoV-2 infection, featured by clustering onset, is more likely to affect elderly people with comorbidities and pregnant women.
targetString: Kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2, wanda aka nuna ta hanyar haɗuwa, yana yuwuwar kama tsofaffi masun zama da wasu cututtuka da mata masu juna biyu.

sourceString: It is common that for people who are exposed to a large number of viruses or whose immune functions are compromised, they have higher chance to be infected than others.
targetString: Abu ne gama gari cewa ga mutanen da ke kamuwa da ɗimbin ƙwayoyin cuta ko waɗanda aka keɓance ayyukan su, suna da damar da za su kamu da ita fiye da sauran.

sourceString: The estimated mean incubation period of SARS-CoV-2 is 1-14 days, mostly 3-7 days based on a study of the first 425 cases in Wuhan.
targetString: An kiyasta cewa lokacin girman SARS-CoV-2 shine ranakun 1-14, yawancin kwanaki 3-7 bisa ya danganta ga binciken farkon mutane 425 wanda suka kamu da cutar cikin Wuhan.

sourceString: However, a study on 1,099 cases demonstrates that the incubation period was 3 days on average and ranged from 0 to 24 days.
targetString: Duk da haka, binciken akan mutane 1,099 masu cutan ya nuna cewa kwanakin haifarwa shine kwana 3 a matsakaita kuma daga ranakun 0 zuwa 24.

sourceString: A more recent study, as described above, demonstrates that the incubation period was 4.8 (3.0-7.2) days based on the demography of 8,866 cases.
targetString: Wani ƙarin binciken da aka yi kwanan nan, ya nuna cewa lokacin shiryawa ya kasance kwanaki 4.8 (3.0-7.2) kwanaki bisa ga tarihin kamuwar mutane 8,866.

sourceString: It is very important for health authorities to adjust the effective quarantine time based on the most accurate incubation period, thus preventing infected but symptomless people from transmitting the virus to others.
targetString: Yana da matukar muhimmanci ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya su daidaita lokacin keɓancewa daidai gwargwado lokacin shiryayye, don haka hana kamuwa da cuta amma mutanen da ba su da kwayar cutar kwayar cutar ga wasu.

sourceString: As a common practice, individuals exposed to, or infected by, the virus are usually required to be quarantined for 14 days.
targetString: A matsayin al'adar yau da kulum, mutanen da ke a fili, ko masu kamuwa da cutar, yawanci ana buƙatar ware kansu na kwanaki 14.

sourceString: Should the quarantine time be extended to 24 days?
targetString: Shin yakamata a tsawan lokacin keɓewa zuwa kwanaki 24?

sourceString: Fever is often the major and initial symptom of COVID-19, which can be accompanied by no symptom or other symptoms such as dry cough, shortness of breath, muscle ache, dizziness, headache, sore throat, rhinorrhea, chest pain, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting.
targetString: Zazzabi shine babban kuma farkon nuna alamar COVID-19, wanda za'a iya haɗa shi ba tare da wata alama ba ko wasu alamomi kamar bushewar tari, gajeruwar numfashi, ciwon jijiyoyi, matsanancin ƙarfi, ciwon kai, ciwon makogwaro, rhinorrhea, ciwon kirji, zawo, tashin zuciya, da amarwa.

sourceString: Some patients experienced dyspnea and/or hypoxemia one week after the onset of the disease.
targetString: Wasu marasa lafiya sun sami dyspnea da / ko hypoxemia mako guda bayan farkon cutar.

sourceString: In severe cases, patients quickly progressed to develop acute respiratory syndrome, septic shock, metabolic acidosis, and coagulopathy.
targetString: A cikin mawuyacin hali, marasa lafiya sun sami saurin don haɓaka cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani, girgizawar jijiyoyin jiki, acidosis metabolic, da coagulopathy.

sourceString: Patients with fever and/or respiratory symptoms and acute fever, even without pulmonary imaging abnormalities, should be screened for the virus for early diagnosis.
targetString: Marasa lafiya da zazzabi da/ko alamomin hanyoyin numfashi da zazzabi mai tsanani, koda ba tare da alamun cutar huhun ciki ba, yakamata a bincika kwayar cutan don gano shi da sauri.

sourceString: A demographic study in late December of 2019 showed that the percentages of the symptoms were 98% for fever, 76% for dry cough, 55% for dyspnea, and 3% for diarrhea; 8% of the patients required ventilation support.
targetString: Wani binciken alƙaluma a ƙarshen Disamba na 2019 ya nuna cewa kashiɗarin bayyanar cututtuka sun kasance kashi 98% ga zazzabi, kashi 76% don bushewar bushe, kashi 55% don dyspnea, da kashi 3% don zawo; 8% na marasa lafiya suna buƙatar tallafin iska.

sourceString: Similar findings were reported in two recent studies of a family cluster and a cluster caused by transmission from an asymptomatic individual.
targetString: An bayar da rahoton irin daya a cikin binciken biyu na kwanan nan game da tarin iyali da kuma tari wanda ya haifar ta hanyar watsawa daga mutum mai nunin alamar ciwon.

sourceString: Comparably, a demographic study in 2012 showed that MERS-CoV patients also had fever (98%), dry cough (47%), and dyspnea (55%) as their main symptoms.
targetString: A kwatancewa, a binciken mutane a shekarar 2012 ya nuna cewa masu cutar MERS-CoV suma suna da zazzabi kashi (98%), bushewar tari kashi (47%), da dyspnea kashi (55%) a matsayin babban alamun su.

sourceString: However, 80% of them required ventilation support, much more than COVID-19 patients and consistent with the higher lethality of MERS than of COVID-19.
targetString: Duk da haka, kashi 80% daga cikinsu suna buƙatar tallafin shakar iska, fiye da marasa lafiyar COVID-19 kuma sun dace da mafi girmar kamuwar MERS fiye da na COVID-19.

sourceString: Diarrhea (26%) and sore throat (21%) were also observed with MERS patients.
targetString: An kuma lura da zawo kashi (26%) da ciwon makogwaro kashi (21%) tare da marasa lafiyar MERS.

sourceString: In SARS patients, it has been demonstrated that fever (99%-100%), dry cough (29%-75%), dyspnea (40%-42%), diarrhea (20-25%), and sore throat (13-25%) were the major symptoms and ventilation support was required for approximately 14%-20% of the patients.
targetString: A cikin marasa lafiya na SARS, an nuna cewa zazzabi kashi (99% -100%), tari mai bushewar kashi (29% -75%), dyspnea kashi (40% -42%), zawo kashi (20-25%), da ciwon makogwaro kashi (13 -25%) sune manyan alamu kuma ana buƙatar tallafin iska don kusan kashi 14% -20% na marasa lafiya.

sourceString: By February 14, the mortality of COVID-19 was 2% when the confirmed cases reached 66,576 globally.
targetString: Ya zuwa ranar 14 ga watan Fabrairu, mutuwar COVID-19 ya zama kashi 2% lokacin da aka tabbatar da masu kamuwa da chutar sun kai 66,576 a duk duniya.

sourceString: Comparably, the mortality of SARS by November 2002 was 10% of 8,096 confirmed cases.
targetString: Kwatancen, mutuwa don SARS daga Nuwamba 2002 shine kashi 10% na mutane 8,096 wanda aka tabbatar da kamuwa da cutar.

sourceString: For MERS, based on a demographic study in June 2012, the mortality was 37% of 2,494 confirmed cases.
targetString: Ga MERS, dangane da binciken alƙaluma a watan Yuni na 2012, mutuwa ta kasance kashi 37% daga cikin 2,494 lamari da aka tabbatar.

sourceString: An earlier study reported that the R0 of SARS-CoV-2 was as high as 6.47 with a 95% confidence interval (CI) of 5.71-7.23, whereas the R0 of SARS-CoV only ranged from 2 to 4.
targetString: Wani binciken da aka yi a baya ya ba da rahoton cewa R0 na SARS-CoV-2 ya yi sama da 6.47 tazarar amintace na kashi 95% (CI) na 5.71-7.23, yayin da R0 na SARS-CoV ya jera daga 2 zuwa 4 kawai.

sourceString: A comparison of SARS-CoV-2 with MERS-CoV and SARA-CoV regarding their symptoms, mortality, and R0 is presented in Table ​Table1.1.
targetString: An gabatar da kwatancen SARS-CoV-2 tare da MERS-CoV da SARA-CoV dangane da alamomin su, mace-mace, da kuma R0 a cikin Tebur Tebur1.1.

sourceString: The above figures suggest that SARS-CoV-2 has a higher ability to spread than MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV, but it is less lethal than the latter two.
targetString: Abubuwan da ke sama suna ba da shawara cewa SARS-CoV-2 suna da iko mafi girma don yadawa fiye da MERS-CoV da SARS-CoV, amma ba shi da kasala fiye da na ƙarshen biyu.

sourceString: Thus, it is much more challenging to control the epidemic of SARS-CoV-2 than those of MERS-CoV and SARS-CoV.
targetString: Don haka, ya fi fuskantar kalubale sosai wajen shawo kan cutar SARS-CoV-2 fiye da MERS-CoV da SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Clustered onset often happens in the same family or from the same gathering or vehicle such as a cruise ship.
targetString: Gungura wuri daya yakan faru sau dayawa ne a cikin dangi guda ɗaya ko daga taro guda ɗaya ko abin hawa kamar jirgin ruwan.

sourceString: Patients often have a history of travel or residence in Wuhan or other affected areas or contact with infected individuals or patients in the recent two weeks before the onset.
targetString: Marasa lafiya galibi suna da tarihin tafiya ko zama a Wuhan ko wasu wuraren da cutar ta shafa ko kuma hulɗa da masu kamuwa da cuta ko kuma marasa lafiya a cikin makwanni biyu da suka gabata kafin an fara.

sourceString: However, it has been reported that people can carry the virus without symptoms longer than two weeks and cured patients discharged from hospitals can carry the virus again, which sends out an alarm to increase the time for quarantine.
targetString: Duk da haka, an ba da rahoton cewa mutane na iya ɗaukar kwayar cutar ba tare da alamu fiye da makonni biyu ba sannan kuma warkewar marasa lafiyar da aka kwantar da su daga asibitoci na iya ɗaukar cutar ta sake, wanda ke aika ƙararrawa don ƙara lokacin keɓewa.

sourceString: Patients have normal or reduced number of peripheral white blood cells (especially lymphocytes) at the early stage.
targetString: Marasa lafiya suna da daidai ko rage lambar yanki farin jini (musamman cututtukan lymphocytes) a farkon matakin.

sourceString: For example, lymphopenia with white blood cell count < 4×109/L including lymphocyte count < 1×109/L, and elevated aspartate aminotransferase levels and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Alal misali, lymphopenia tare da yawan farin jinin tantanin halita <4 × 109/L hade da yawan lymphocyte <1×109/L, kuma an daga matakan asotate aminotransferase da viremia a marasa lafiya guda 1,099 wanda suka kamu da COVID-19.

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: Matakin hanta da jijiyar enzymes da myoglobin sun karu a cikin jinin wasu marasa lafiya, kuma an karuwar furotin C-mai martani da dalakawarr erythrocyte a cikin jinin na yawancin marasa lafiya.

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: A cikin marasa lafiya da ke da tsananin cuta, matakin D-dimer, samfurin fibrin mai lalatawa da ke akwai cikin jini, ya haɓaka, kuma an rage adadin ƙwayar cutar ta lymphocyte.

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: Rashin lafiya cikin hoton rediyon kirji ana samun shi a cikin mafi yawan marasa lafiya na COVID-19 kuma an nuna su ta hanyar inuwa biyu na inuwa ko kuma gilashin ƙasa a cikin huhu.

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Yawanci marasa lafiya kan haifar da ciwon huhu, raunin huhu mai tsanani, da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani (ARDS).

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: Lokacin da ARDS ta faru, kumburin da ba a sarrafa shi ba, tara ruwa, da fibrosis mai ci gaba sun lalata mummunar musayar gas sosai.

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: Rashin daidaituwa na nau'in-I da nau'in-II na pneumocytes yana rage matakin surfactant kuma yana kara tashin hankali, ta haka ne rage ikon fadadar huhun da kara hadarin rushewar huhu.

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: Sabili da haka, binciken mafi munin hoton zuciya sau da yawa suna kama da mafi girman yanayin cutar.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: A ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, bincike na farko na COVID-19 ya nuna rashin cancanci na pneumocytes, hyaline membrane, da kuma ƙwayar cuta ta mahaifa, da tantanin halita da yawa na ƙwayoyin cuta a cikin huhun masu cuta wanda ya mutu da cutar, ya yi daidai da yanayin kamuwar cutar makamacin ARDS da marasa lafiyar SARS da MERS.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: Ganowar SARS-CoV-2 RNA ta hanyar juyawar sarkar polymerase wato (reverse-transcriptase) (RT-PCR) anyi amfani da shi azaman manyan ka'idojin gwajin cutar COVID-19.

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: Duk da haka, saboda kiyatsa girman babu-rashi, wanda zai iya hanzartawar annoban, an fara amfani da alamun bayyanar asibiti don ganewar asali (wanda bai dogara ga RT-PCR ba) kadai ba a kasar Sin a ranar 13 ga Fabrairu, 2020.

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: Hakanan irin wannan yanayin ya faru tare da bayyanar cutar SARS.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: Sabili da haka, haɗuwa da tarihin cutar, bayyanar asibiti, dakin gwaji da kuma binciken radiyo yana da mahimmanci kuma wajibi ne don yin ingantaccen bincike.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: A ranar 14 ga Fabrairu, 2020, kungiyar Feng Zhang ta ba da bayanin wata hanyar yin amfani da fasahar SHERLOCK ta CRISPR don gano SARS-CoV-2, wanda ke gano ƙwayoyin SARS-CoV-2 RNA roba a 20 × 10-18 mol / L zuwa 200 × 10-18 mol / L (10-100 kwafa ta microliter na shigar) ta amfani da dipstick a cikin ƙasa da awa ɗaya ba tare da buƙatar bayyanin kayan aikin ba.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: Da fatan, sabuwar dabarar za ta iya bunkasa hankali da kwanciyar hankali matukar an tabbatar cikin samfuran asibiti.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: Saboda ƙarancin ƙwarewa tare da sabon labari na CoV, likitoci na iya samar da kulawa ta musamman ga marasa lafiyar COVID-19, yayin da ake ƙoƙarin hanyoyin jiyya da dama waɗanda aka yi amfani da su ko aka gabatar dasu don jiyyar wasu CoV kamar SARS-CoV da MERS-CoV da sauran cututtukan (Tebur 2).2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: Wadannan hanyoyin jinya na yanzu da kuma yiwuwar jiyya tare da magungunan rigakafi, da immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma daga majinyatan da suka sami sauki, magungunan Sinawa, da tallafin tunani.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: Ko da plasma daga majinyatan da sun samu sauki an gabatar dasu ne domin ayi amfani dasu don jiyya.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: Kamfanonin magunguna suna yin tsere don haɓaka ƙwayoyin garkuwa da alluran rigakafin kan kwayar cutan.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 suna kai hari sosai a huhu a farawa kuma mai yiwuwa kuma suna kaiwa hari, zuwa ƙarancin ƙima, sauran gabobin da ke bayyana ACE2, kamar tsarin gastrointestinal da kodan.

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: Duk da haka, lalatawar hanyar numfashi da gazawa sune babbar haɗari ga marasa lafiya da babban dalilin mutuwa.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: Saboda haka, tallafawar hanya numfashi yana da mahimmanci don sauƙaƙe bayyanar cututtuka da kuma ceton rayuka kuma ya haɗa duk jiyya ta iska, iska mai saurin motsawa, samun iska daga na'ura, ya danganta ga tsananin cutar.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: Marasa lafiya da bayyanar cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani dole ne a tallafa su da karin isaka (ECMO), wani ingantaccen dabarar bugun zuciya wanda aka yi amfani dashi don maganin cututtukan zuciya masu haɗari ko gazawar hanyoyin numfashi.

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: Bugu da kari, da daidaitawar ma'aunin electrolyte, rigakafin da lura da kamuwa da cuta da sakin jiki, da kuma kariya daga ayyukan gabobin jiki ma suna da matukar muhimmanci ga marasa lafiya na SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: An san cewa guguwar cytokine tana faruwa ne sakamakon wuce gona da iri na tsarin rigakafi a cikin marasa lafiyar SARS da MERS.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: Guguwar Cytokine wani nau'i ne na yanayi amsar tsarin kumburi wanda aka gabatar ta hanyar jerin cytokines da suka hada da TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, da MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: Waɗannan cytokines tare da tantanin halita mai garkuwa su saki ɗimbin kwayoyi mara canzawa waɗanda sune babban dalilin ARDS da kuma gazawar gabobin jiki da yawa.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: Danna rigakafi yana da muhimmanci a lura da guguwar cytokine, musamman a cikin majinyata masu rauni sosai.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: Corticosteroids da tocilizumab, anti-IL6 monoclonal garkuwar jiki, an yi amfani dasu don magance guguwar cytokine.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: Sauran jiyya danna rigakafi don guguwa ta cytokine sun hada da daidaitawa da amsawa kai tsaye na rigakafin tantanin halita T; toshewar IFN-γ, IL-1, da TNF; JAK hanawa; blinatumomab; mai danna alamar cytokine 4; da HDAC masu hanawa.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Maganin Steroids, kamar immunosuppressants, aka yi amfani da su sosai a cikin lura da SARS don rage tsananin lalacewa kumburi.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Duk da haka, shan steroids sosai ba su da fa'ida ga mummunan raunin huhu a cikin marasa lafiyar SARS da COVID-19.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: Madadin haka, suna iya haifar da mummunar illa, musamman cututtukan osteonecrosis, da ke haifar da tasirin cutar.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Kodayake, gajerun darussan na corticosteroids a ƙarancin-zuwa-matsakaitan allurai an bada shawarar ayi amfani dasu da hankali don marasa lafiya COVID-19 marasa lafiya.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: A lokacin rubutu, babu ingantaccen maganin rigakafi da aka tabbatar.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: Duk da haka, badawa ta jijiya da remdesivir, wani nucleotide na analog, ana samun inganci a cikin marasa lafiyar COVID-19 na Amurka.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: Remdesivir wata sabon maganin rigakafin ƙwayoyin cuta ne wanda Gidiyon ta kirkiro da farko don jiyyar cututtukan da cutar Ebola da Marlburg suka haifar.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: Daga baya, sakatariya ya kuma nuna yiwuwar hana sauran kwayoyin cutar RNA guda da suka hada da kwayoyin cututtukar MERS da SARS.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: Dangane da waɗannan, Gidiyon ya ba wa mahaɗin zuwa China don gudanar da gwaji guda biyu a kan mutane masu kamuwa da cutar SARS-CoV-2, kuma ana sa ran samun sakamako sosai.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: Bugu da ƙari, an ba da shawarar baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, da ribavirin a matsayin hanyoyin kwantar da hankalin marasa lafiya wanda ke da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: Zawo, tashin zuciya, amai, lalacewar hanta, da sauran raunin azaba na iya faruwa bayan an haɗawar jinyar tare da lofinavir/ritonavir.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: Hulɗawar waɗannan jiyya tare da wasu magunguna da aka yi amfani da su a cikin marasa lafiya ya kamata a sa ido sosai.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: Plasma daga marasa lafiya da suka samu sauki da garkuwar jiki.

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: Tarin jini daga marasa lafiyar da suka murmure daga wata cuta mai yaduwa don yi wa wasu marasa lafiya da ke fama da wannan cuta ko kuma kare lafiyar mutane daga kamuwa da cutar yana da dogon tarihi.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: Tabbas, mara lafiyar da aka dawo dasu galibi suna da babban matakin kariya daga kwayar cuta a cikin jinin su.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: Garkuwar jiki sune rigakafi immunoglobulin (Ig) wanda aka samar daga B lymphocytes don yaƙar ƙwayoyin cuta da sauran abubuwa na ƙasashen waje kuma suna sane da kwayoyi na musamman a cikin cututtukan da ke cikin su.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: Dangane da wannan, an karɓo plasma daga jinin gungun masu haƙuri waɗanda suka warke daga COVID-19 kuma an saka shi cikin marasa lafiya 10 mara lafiya sosai.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: Alamar cutar su ta inganta cikin sa'o'i 24, tare da rage kumburi da rahusa da kuma inganta jijiyar oxygen a cikin jini.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: Duk da haka, tabbatarwa da bayani wajibi ne don gabatar da hanyar don babban amfani kafin takamaiman hanyoyin kwantar da hankali ba su inganta ba.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: Bugu da kari, da aka ba da tasirin warkewa, za a yi la'akari da wasu kasala da ke da alaƙa da plasma a hankali.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: Alal misali, cututtukan rigakafi na iya wuce gona da iri kan hanyar kariya kuma suna haifar da sakin alamar alcytokine, wanda ke iya zama haɗarin rayuwa.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: Taruwar garkuwar jiki cikin jini yawancin lokuta na ƙadan, kuma buƙatun plasma yana da yawa don kula da marasa lafiya da ke fama da rashin lafiya.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: Yana da wuya a haɓaka da samar da takamaiman ƙwayoyin rigakafi cikin hanzari don yaƙi da annobar duniya.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: Don haka, abu mafi mahimmanci ne kuma mai kyawu ne a kebe tantanin halittar jikin B (B cells) daga marassa lafiyar da suka warke kuma gano lambobin kwayar halitta wadanda ke hade da ingantattun garkuwar jiki ko duba garkuwa musamman a kan muhimman furotin na kwayan cutar.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: Ta wannan hanyar, zamu iya haɓaka samar da magungunan garkuwar jiki.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: An yi amfani da TCM don magance wasu cututtuka da yawa a kasar Sin har tsawon dubunnan shekaru.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: Duk da haka, tasirin sa ya dogara ne akan haɗakar abubuwan haɗin da yawa a cikin tsari wanda ya bambanta dangane da binciken cutar da aka yi la'akari da tunanin TCM.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: Yawancin ingantattun abubuwanda ake aiki dasu ba'a san su ba ko kuma marasa fahimta ne saboda yana da wahalar cirewa da tabbatar da irin waɗannan abubuwan haɗin ko abubuwan haɗin su.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: A halin yanzu, saboda rashin inganci da takamaiman jiyyar COVID-19, TCM ya zama ɗayan daga cikin hanyoyin jiyyan marasa lafiya tare da haske zuwa alamu na matsakaicin alama ko ga waɗanda suka warke daga matsanancin matakai.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Alal misali, maganin kawan Shu Feng Jie Du da maganin kawan Lian Hua Qing Wen an samu sun dace don jinyar COVID-19.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: Babban warkarwa marasa lafiyar COVID-19 a cikin larduna da yawa na kasar Sin wadanda ke amfani da TCM a cikin kashi 87% bisa dari na marasa lafiyar su, ciki har da Gansu kashi (63.7%), Ningxia kashi (50%), da Hunan kashi (50%), yayin da lardin Hubei, wanda ya yi amfani da TCM a kusan kashi 30% na masu cutar COVID-19, suna da mafi ƙarancin warkewa kashi (13%).

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: Duk da haka, wannan ya zama kwatanci mara kyau kamar yadda sauran dalilai masu tasiri kamar lamba da tsananin marasa lafiya yakamata a saka su cikin kimantawa.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: A ranar 18 ga watan Fabrairu, 2020, Boli Zhang da abokan aikin ta sun buga wani bincike don kwatanta magani na yamma (WM) jinyar shi kaɗai tare da haɗin maganin WM da TCM.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: Sun gano cewa lokutan da ake buƙata don murmurewar yanayin jiki, ɓarnawar alama, da kuma asibiti mafi ƙaranci a cikin rukunin WM + TCM fiye da ƙungiyar cikin WM ƙungiyar kawai.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: Mafi ban sha'awa, rauni da yake ƙaruwa da cuta (daga haske zuwa mai tsanani) ya kasance ƙarancin ƙungiyar WM + TCM fiye da na ƙungiyar WM kawai kashi (7.4% kusa da 46.2%) kuma yawan mutuwa ya kasance ƙasa a cikin rukunin WM + TCM fiye da WM kawai rukuni kashi (8.8% a kan 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: Koyaya, inganci da lafiyar TCM har yanzu suna jiran ƙarin gwaji da aka sarrafa sosai a sikeli mafi girma da kuma a cikin ƙarin cibiyoyin.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: Hakanan zai zama mai ban sha'awa don sanin yanayin ayyukan da bayyana ingantattun kayan aikin jiyya na TCM ko haɗinsu idan zai yiwu.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Marasa lafiya da ake zargi ko aka tabbatar da COVID-19 yawan lokuta suna fuskantar babbar fargaba game da cutar mai yaduwa har ma da kisa, kuma mutanen da ke keɓewa kuma suna fuskantar bacin rai, kadaici, da fushi.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Bayan haka, alamomin kamuwa da cuta kamar zazzabin, cututtukan rashin iska, da tari kazalika da illa dabam-dabam na jinyar kamar cutar rashin bacci wanda corticosteroids ke hadasa na iya haifar da ƙarin damuwa da damuwa ta hankali.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: A farkon barkewar cutar ta SARS, an sami dumbin cututtukan kwakwalwa da suka hada da ci gaba da damuwa, damuwa, fargaba, tashin hankali, alamomin tabin hankali, tashin hankali, har ma da kashe kansa.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: M lamba tuntuɓe da keɓe masu ciwo, a matsayin wani ɓangare na martanin lafiyar jama'a game da yaduwar COVID-19, zai iya sa mutane su zama masu yawan damuwa da masu laifi game da sakamakon yaduwar, keɓewa, da ki kan iyali da abokai.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Don haka, ya kamata a ba da kulawa ta lafiyar kwakwalwa ga marasa lafiya na COVID-19, waɗanda ake zargi, da mutanen da ke hulɗa da su da kuma sauran jama'a waɗanda ke da buƙata.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
