targetString: Domain.com shafin chinikayyan gidaje, sun bada rahoton wasu masun sayarwa suna bada takardan bayangida kyauta ga wanda zai fara ciniki kan gwanjon a Melbourne, lokacin da aka gudanar da gwanjon kadan domin masun saya sun tafi hutu a dogon karshen mako ranar iyan kwadago.

sourceString: The Thursday edition of NT News, a daily printed in Darwin, included an eight-page insert meant to be cut up and used as toilet paper.
targetString: Shirin ranar Alhamis na jaridar NT na dauke da shafuka guda takwas wanda ya kamace ya yanka domin yin amfani a matsayin tolifefa.

sourceString: The stores were originally reluctant to impose restrictions, according to a report from ABC Australia on March 3 in which they said they had no plans to introduce restrictions on the purchases.
targetString: Da farko Shagunan Sun nuna Rashin aikata Daga Farko Wajen Sa Matakan, A Yadda Wani rahoto Na ABC Australia a ranar 3 ga Watan Maris Wanda Suka Ce Babu Wani Shiri Don Takaita Siyyayya.

sourceString: Russell Zimmerman added that other products are also in high demand, including masks, sanitiser, dried goods, handwash and flour.
targetString: Russell Zimmerman ya kara wasu kayakin da ake bukatar su sosai, harda kariyar fuska, sabulun hannu, busashen kaya, ruwan goge hannu da ma filawa.

sourceString: Similarly, outside of Australia, on Sunday evening online British supermarket Ocado was observed limiting purchases of Andres toilet paper to two 12-roll packs.
targetString: A irin haka, a wajen Australia, a rananr lahadi da yamma an lura da cewa shafin kasuwanci na Birtania a yanar gizo Ocado na takaita sayarwan takadar bayan gida Andres zuwa fakitin biyu na nadi-12.

sourceString: World Health Organization declares COVID-19 pandemic
targetString: Kungiyar Lafiya ta Duniya ta ayyana COVID-19 a matsayin annoba

sourceString: On Wednesday, the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the ongoing outbreak of COVID-19 — the disease caused by coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 — to be a pandemic.
targetString: Ranar hukumar lafiya ta WHO ta kaddamar da barkewar COVID-19 da ciwon da coronavirus SARS-COV-2 ke haifarwa a matsayin annoba.

sourceString: Although the word "pandemic" only refers to how widely a disease has spread, not how dangerous specific cases are, the WHO noted the need to drive governments to action:
targetString: Ko da yake ita kalmar anoba na nufin yanda cutar ke yaduwa, ba yanda hadarin wasu majinyatan ba, WHO ta bukaci sahalewar gwamnatoci wajen yakin.

sourceString: "All countries can still change the course of this pandemic.
targetString: “Dukanin kasashen duniya har yanzu na iya sauya fasalin wannan annobar.

sourceString: If countries detect, test, treat, isolate, trace and mobilize their people in the response," said Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, the Director-General of the WHO.
targetString: idan kasashe suka gane, gwaji, warkar, binciko, da tura mutanen su izuwa agaji, “ inji Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, shugaban kungiyar WHO.

sourceString: "We are deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity and by the alarming levels of inaction."
targetString: "Muna matukar damuwa da duka matakan tashin hankali da yaduwar cutar da kuma matakan rashin damuwa."

sourceString: According to Dr. Tom Frieden, formerly the director of the United States' Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, the pandemic is "unprecedented."
targetString: A Cewar Dr Tom Frienden, Tsohon Shugaban Hukumar Kula Da Cuttutuka Da Ma Kariya Daga Kamuwa Cewa ita Wannan Annoba Ba a San Kan ta ba Tukun.

sourceString: He said, in remarks published by CNN in February, "other than influenza, no other respiratory virus has been tracked from emergence to continuous global spread."
targetString: Ya ce, a cikin jawabin da CNN ta buga a watan Fabrairu, "ban da mura, ba wani kwayar cutar ta hanyar numfashi da ta bulla daga damuwa har zuwa yaduwar duniya."

sourceString: Ghebreyesus expressed a similar view, saying "we have never before seen a pandemic sparked by a coronavirus."
targetString: Ghebreyesus shima ya shaida inda ya kara da cewa ba'a taba samun annoba wanda coronavirus tayi sanadiyar yaduwar ta.

sourceString: He continued, "and we have never before seen a pandemic that can be controlled at the same time."
targetString: Ya ci gaba da cewa, "kuma ba mu taba ganin annoba da za a iya sarrafa ta a lokaci guda ba."

sourceString: The new status as a pandemic follows the WHO's decision in January to declare the outbreak a public health emergency of international concern.
targetString: Sabuwar matsayin annoba ta biyo bayan shawarar da WHO ta yanke a watan Janairu don bayyana barkewar cutar a matsayin matsalar lafiyar jama'a na damuwa ta kasa da kasa.

sourceString: The United States' National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Disease's director, Dr. Anthony Fauci, said of the outbreak, "bottom line, it's going to get worse."
targetString: Darektan Cibiyar Nazarin Cutar Jiki da Cuta mai Yaduwa wato (The United States' National Institute of Allegy and Infectious Diseases) Dr. Anthony Fauci, ta ce game da barkewar, "Karshen magana, zai kasance da muni."

sourceString: As of Thursday, Associated Press reported there were at least 126,000 cases of COVID-19 worldwide, resulting in over 4,600 deaths.
targetString: A halin yanzu jaridar Associated press ta kawo rahoto cewa an adadin wadanda suka kamu da COVID-19 a duniya ya kai 126,000 kuma mutane 4,600 sun mutu sakamakon kamuwa da ita.

sourceString: The 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic is an ongoing pandemic of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Annobar coronavirus ta shekara 2019-20 annoba ce wanda ke cigaba da faruwa ta ciwon 2019 COVID-19 wanda 2 SARS-COV-2 ke haifarwa.

sourceString: The outbreak was identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019, declared to be a Public Health Emergency of International Concern on 30 January 2020, and recognized as a pandemic on 11 March 2020.
targetString: An gano bullar barkewar cutar a Wuhan, China, a watan Disamba na shekarar 2019, an ayyana shi a matsayin Babban Lafiyar Jama'a na Damuwar Kasa da Kasa a ranar 30 ga Janairu 2020, kuma an karbe shi da cutar a ranar 11 ga Maris 2020.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 1.61 million cases of COVID-19 have been reported in 210 countries and territories, resulting in approximately 97,000 deaths.
targetString: A ranar 10 ga watan Afrilu 2020, kimanin mutane miliyan 1.61 aka samu da cutar COVID-19 a kasashe 210 da ma yankuna, wadanda hakan sun kawo mutuwa guda 97,000.

sourceString: About 364,000 people have recovered.
targetString: Kimanin mutane 364,000 sun warke.

sourceString: The case fatality rate has been estimated to be 4% in China, while globally ranging from 13.04% in Algeria to .08% in New Zealand.
targetString: An kiyasta yiuwar mutuwa sanadiyar ta zuwa 4% a kasar China. A duniya kuwa kason ta rabu ne tsakanin 13.04% a Aljeriya zuwa .08% a kasar New Zealand.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough and shortness of breath.
targetString: Manyan alamomin cutar sun hada da zazzabi da tari tare da takaita shakar iska.

sourceString: Complications may include pneumonia and acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Rikitarwan cututuka zai iya haɗawa da ciwon huhu da cutar hanyoyin numfashi mai tsanani.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days, but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Lokacin daga bayyanar cutar zuwa farkon bayyanar cututtuka shine kusan kwanaki biyar, amma yana iya kasancewa daga kwana biyu zuwa goma sha huɗu.

sourceString: There is no known vaccine or specific antiviral treatment.
targetString: Babu sanannen rigakafi ko wata kulawa domin kawar da ita.

sourceString: Primary treatment is symptomatic and supportive therapy.Recommended preventive measures include hand washing, covering one's mouth when coughing, maintaining distance from other people, and monitoring and self-isolation for people who suspect they are infected.
targetString: Kulawa Ta farko Na da nasaba Da Kuma Bada Garkuwa Wajen kawo Sauki, Matakan Kare Kai Ciki Harda wanke Hannu, Rufe baki Yayin Tari, Bada tazara Ga Mutanne, Kula da kuma Kebe Kai wa Mutanen Da Ke Dauke da ko Ake Zargin Sun Kamu Da ita.

sourceString: Authorities worldwide have responded by implementing travel restrictions, quarantines, curfews, workplace hazard controls, and facility closures.
targetString: Hukumomi a fadin duniya sun mayar da martani ta hanyar daukar matakai kamar takaita safara, killacewa, dokar hana fita, bin ka'idojin rage hatsari a wuraren aiki da kuma kulle masana'antu.

sourceString: The pandemic has led to severe global socioeconomic disruption, the postponement or cancellation of sporting, religious, political and cultural events, and widespread shortages of supplies exacerbated by panic buying.
targetString: annoban ta haifar da mummunar rikice-rikicen tattalin arziƙin duniya, dakatar da sokewa ko soke wasannin, addinai, siyasa da al'adu, da kuma wadatar kayayyaki da ke haifar da sayan ban tsoro.

sourceString: Schools and universities have closed either on a nationwide or local basis in 193 countries, affecting approximately 99.4 percent  of the world's student population.
targetString: Makarantu da jami'o'i sun rufe kodai a kasa gaba daya ko a wasu wurare a cikin kasashe 193, ya shafi a kalla kimanin kashi 99.4% na yawan daliban duniya.

sourceString: Misinformation about the virus has spread online, and there have been incidents of xenophobia and discrimination against Chinese people, other people of East and Southeast Asian descent and appearance, and others from areas with significant virus cases.
targetString: Rashin fahimta game da kwayar cutar ta bazu a kan layi, kuma akwai lokutan maganganu na ƙabilanci da nuna wariya ga Sinawa, sauran mutanen Gabas da Kudu maso gabashin Asiya da bayyanar su, da sauran su daga wuraren da ke da muhimancin kamuwa da cutan.

sourceString: Due to reduced travel and closures of heavy industry, there has been a decrease in air pollution and carbon emissions.
targetString: Sakamakon dakatar da tafiye-tafiyte da kuma rufe manyan masana'antu an samu karancin gurbatattun iska.

sourceString: Health authorities in Wuhan, China (the capital of Hubei province) reported a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 31 December 2019, and an investigation was launched in early January 2020.
targetString: Jami'o'in lafiya a Wuhan sun kawo rahoto cewa an gano taron cutar ta hanyar kwayar Pneumonia a 31 ga watan Disemba na 2019 bayan haka an kaddamar da bincike a farkon watan Janairu na 2020.

sourceString: The cases mostly had links to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market and so the virus is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: Yawancin lokuta suna da alaƙa da Kasuwancin kayan ruwa a Huanan don haka ana tunanin cutar tana da asalin zoonotic.

sourceString: The virus that caused the outbreak is known as SARS-CoV-2, a newly discovered virus closely related to bat coronaviruses, pangolin coronaviruses, and SARS-CoV.The earliest known person with symptoms was later discovered to have fallen ill on 1 December 2019, and that person did not have visible connections with the later wet market cluster.
targetString: Kwayar cutar da ta haifar da barkewar cutar ana kiranta da SARS-CoV-2, sabuwar kwayar cutar da aka gano tana da alaƙa da coronaviruses na gemage, pangolin coronaviruses, da SARS-CoV. Wanda aka fara gano shi da alamun cutar daga baya an gano cewa ya kamu da rashin lafiya a ranar 1 ga Disamba 2019 , kuma mutumin bai da alaƙa da bayyane tare da tari mai rukunin kasuwa na baya.

sourceString: Of the early cluster of cases reported in December 2019, two-thirds were found to have a link with the market.
targetString: Daga farkon tarin rahoton wadanda suka kamu da cutar cikin watan Disamba na shekarar 2019, an gano kashi biyu cikin uku suna da nasaba da kasuwa.

sourceString: On 13 March 2020, an unverified report from the South China Morning Post suggested that a case traced back to 17 November 2019, in a 55-year-old from Hubei province, may have been the first.On 26 February 2020, the WHO reported that, as new cases reportedly declined in China but suddenly increased in Italy, Iran, and South Korea, the number of new cases outside China had exceeded the number of new cases within China for the first time.
targetString: A ranar 13 ga Maris 2020, wani rahoto da ba a tabbatar da shi ba daga South China Morning Post ya ba da shawarar cewa, wata kara ta fara daga ranar 17 ga Nuwamban shekarar 2019, a cikin wani dan shekara 55 daga lardin Hubei, watakila shi ne na farko. A ranar 26 ga Fabrairu 2020, WHO ta ba da rahoton cewa, yayin da aka samu rahoton bullar sabbin maganganu a China amma ba zato ba tsammani ya karu a Italiya, Iran, da Koriya ta Kudu, Yawan sababbin shari'o'i a wajen kasar Sin sun wuce adadin sabbin maganganu a cikin kasar Sin a karon farko.

sourceString: There may be substantial underreporting of cases, particularly among those with milder symptoms.
targetString: Zai yiwu a sami rahoto mai yawa, musamman tsakanin waɗanda ke da alamun karamin bayyanar cututtukan.

sourceString: By 26 February, relatively few cases had been reported among youths, with those 19 and under making up 2.4% of cases worldwide.The United Kingdom's chief scientific adviser, Patrick Vallance, estimated that 60% of the British population would need to become infected before effective herd immunity could be achieved.
targetString: Ya zuwa 26 ga watan Fabrairu, ba a samu karancin lokuta ba a tsakanin matasa, wadanda shekarun su 19 kuma wadanda ke kasa da kashi 2.4 cikin dari na duk duniya. Babban mashawarcin kimiyya na Burtaniya, Patrick Vallance, ya kiyasta cewa kashi 60% na mutanen Birtaniya za su kamu da cutar kafin cimma wata ingantaccen garkuwa.

sourceString: Cases refers to the number of people who have been tested for COVID-19, and whose test has been confirmed positive according to official protocols.
targetString: Yanayi ya nuna yawan mutane da suka gudanar da gwajin COVID-19 wanda kuma gwajin na nuna cewa suna dauke da cutar bisa tabbacin hukuma.

sourceString: As of 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and many countries have had official policies not to test those with only mild symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain, and Switzerland.
targetString: A 23 ga watan Maris ba'a samu kasar da ta gudanar da gwajin cutar na sama da 3% kuma akasarin kasashen sun samu tsari daga hukuma na yin gwaji har ga wadanda basu nuna kananan alamu ba. cikin kasashen akwai Italy da Netherlands da Spain da kuma Switzerland.

sourceString: A study published on 16 March found that in China, up to 23 January, an estimated 86% of COVID-19 infections had not been detected, and that these undocumented infections were the infection source for 79% of documented cases.
targetString: Wani binciken da aka buga a ranar 16 ga Maris ya gano cewa, a cikin kasar Sin, har zuwa 23 ga Janairu, an kiyasta kimanin kashi 86% na cututtukan COVID-19, kuma waɗannan cututtukan da ba a yarda da su ba sune tushen kamuwa da cuta kashi 79% na kamuwa da cutan yadda yake a rubuce.

sourceString: A statistical analysis published 30 March estimated that numbers of infections in Italy were considerably greater than the reported cases.
targetString: Wani bincike na ƙididdigar da aka buga a ranar 30 Maris ya kiyasta cewa lambobin cututtukan cututtuka a Italiya sun fi girma fiye da rahoton da aka bayar.

sourceString: The initial estimates of the basic reproduction number (R0) for COVID-19 were 1.4 to 2.4.
targetString: Atesididdigar farko na lambar haifuwa ta asali (R0) don COVID-19 sun kasance 1.4 zuwa 2.4.

sourceString: A study published by the US Center for Disease Control and Prevention has concluded that it may be 5.7.
targetString: Bincike da hukumar dake dakile yaduwar cututuka na Amurka ta wallafa ta hakikance cewa wata kila 5.7 ne.

sourceString: Most people with COVID-19 recover.
targetString: Mafi yawancin mutane da suka kamu da COVID-19 suna warkewa.

sourceString: For those who do not, the time from development of symptoms to death has been between 6 and 41 days, with the most common being 14 days.
targetString: Ga waɗanda ba su yi hakan ba, lokacin daga bayyanar cututtuka zuwa mutuwa ya kasance tsakanin ranakun 6 zuwa 41, tare da mafi yawan kwanakin 14.

sourceString: As of 10 April 2020, approximately 97,000 deaths had been attributed to COVID-19.
targetString: A ranar 10 ga watan Afrillu 2020 kimanin mace-macen aka alakanta da COVID-19 su kai 97,000.

sourceString: In China, as of 5 February about 80% of deaths were in those over 60, and 75% had pre-existing health conditions including cardiovascular diseases and diabetes.Official tallies of deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic generally refer to dead people who tested positive for COVID according to official protocols.
targetString: A kasar Sin, ya zuwa ranar 5 ga Fabrairu kusan kashi 80% na wadanda suka mutu sun kasance a cikin wadanda suka wuce 60, kuma 75% suna da yanayin rashin lafiya da suka hada da cututtukan zuciya da cutar siga.Daidaito da mutuwa ta asali daga cutar COVID-19 gabaɗaya tana nufin mutanen da suka mutu waɗanda suka gwada tabbacin COVID bisa ga ka'idoji na hukuma.

sourceString: The number of true fatalities from COVID-19 may be much higher, as it may not include people who die without testing - e.g. at home, in nursing homes, etc.
targetString: Wata kila adadin wadanda ke mutuwa sanadiyar COVID-19 zai fi yawa saboda akwai yiuwar mutuwar mutane wadanda ba'a samu anyi masu gwaji ba misali wadanda ke gida da kuma wadanda ke gidan kulawa.

sourceString: Partial data from Italy found that the number of excess deaths during the pandemic exceeded the official COVID death tally by a factor of 4-5x.
targetString: wani yanki na daga bayanai na kasar Italy ya gano yawon mutuwa yayin barkewar annobar ya wuce adadin mutuwar COVID da nasabar 4-5x.

sourceString: A spokeswoman for the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) acknowledged "We know that [the stated death toll] is an underestimation", a statement corroborated by anecdotal reports of undercounting in the U.S. Such underestimation often occurs in pandemics, such as the 2009 H1N1 swine flu epidemic.The first confirmed death was in Wuhan on 9 January 2020.
targetString: Mai magana da yawun Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da kawarwa ta U.S. (CDC) ta yarda "Mun san cewa [adadin da aka bayyana na mutuwa) lamari ne mai ban tsoro", bayanin da ya samo tushe daga rahotannin asirin abubuwan da ke faruwa a Amurka Irin wannan rashin sanin yakamata galibi yakan faru a cikin bala'o'i, kamar cutar H1N1 alade ta 2009. Wanda aka tabbatar da mutuwa ta farko ita ce a Wuhan ranar 9 ga Janairu 2020.

sourceString: The first death outside mainland China occurred on 1 February in the Philippines, and the first death outside Asia was in France on 14 February.
targetString: Mutuwa na farko da ya faru wajen China na faru ne a 1 ga watan Febreru a kasar Philipines hakazalika mutuwa ta farko a wajen nahiyar Asia ya faru ne a kasar France a ranar 14 ga watan Febreru.

sourceString: By 28 February, outside mainland China, more than a dozen deaths each were recorded in Iran, South Korea, and Italy.
targetString: A ranar 28 na Febreru a gabanin kasar China an samu rahoton mutuwar mutuwa fiye da goma sha biyu a ko wani na Iran da South Korea da kuma Italy.

sourceString: By 13 March, more than forty countries and territories had reported deaths, on every continent except Antarctica.Several measures are commonly used to quantify mortality.
targetString: A ranar 13 ga Watan Maris, kasashe da bangarori Fiye Da Arbain Sun Sanar Da Mutuwa, A Kowane Nahiya Banda Antarctica. Ana amfani da Matakai Da Dama Wajen Kimanta Mace-macen.

sourceString: These numbers vary by region and over time, and are influenced by the volume of testing, healthcare system quality, treatment options, time since initial outbreak, and population characteristics such as age, sex, and overall health.The death-to-case ratio reflects the number of deaths divided by the number of diagnosed cases within a given time interval.
targetString: Waɗannan lambobin sun bambanta daga yanki da na tsawon lokaci, kuma ana rinjayar su da ƙimar gwaji, ingancin tsarin kiwon lafiya, zaɓuɓɓukan magani, tun lokaci barkewar farko, da kuma halayen jama'a kamar shekaru, jima'i, da kuma lafiyar gaba ɗaya. yana nuna adadin mutuwar da aka rarrabe ta hanyar adadin cututtukan da aka gano a tsakanin wani lokaci na wani lokaci.

sourceString: Based on Johns Hopkins University statistics, the global death-to-case ratio is 6.0% (97,039/1,617,204) as of 10 April 2020.
targetString: Dangane da ƙididdigar Jami'ar Johns Hopkins, ƙimar mutuwa-ta-duniya shine 6.0% (97,039 / 1,617,204) kamar 10 na Afrilu 2020.

sourceString: The number varies by region.
targetString: Lambobin ya banbanta tsakanin yanki.

sourceString: In China, estimates for the death-to-case ratio decreased from 17.3% (for those with symptom onset 1–10 January 2020) to 0.7% (for those with symptom onset after 1 February 2020).Other measures include the case fatality rate (CFR), which reflects the percent of diagnosed people who die from a disease, and the infection fatality rate (IFR), which reflects the percent of infected (diagnosed and undiagnosed) who die from a disease.
targetString: A China kiyastawar da aka yi na nuna cewa mutuwa sanadiyar cutar ta ragu daga 17.3% ( Na wadanda suka nuna alamu daga ranar 1 zuwa 10 na watan Janairu 2020) zuwa 0.7% (Na wadanda suka nuna alamu daga ranar 1 na watan Febreru 2020). Sauran matakai da aka dauka ya kunshi matakin auna mutuwa wanda ke nuna yawar mutane da aka kwantar sanadiyar wani cuta da suka mutu. Hakazalika akwai matakin auna kamuwa da cutar mai nuna yawan mutanen (wadanda aka kwantar da akasin su) da suka mutu sakamakon cutar.

sourceString: These statistics are not timebound and follow a specific population from infection through case resolution.
targetString: Waɗannan ƙididdigar basu da iyakar lokaci kuma suna bin takamaiman yawan jama'a daga kamuwa da cuta ta hanyar sassanci.

sourceString: A number of academics have attempted to calculate these numbers for specific populations.
targetString: Da yawa cikin masana sunyi kokarin gano lissafa adadin na wani bangaren al'umma.

sourceString: The University of Oxford's Centre for Evidence-Based Medicine estimates that the infection fatality rate for the pandemic as a whole is between 0.1% and 0.39%.
targetString: Cibiyar Nazarin Shaida ta Jami'ar Oxford ta yi kiyasin cewa yawan masu kamuwa da cutar yaduwar cutar gaba daya ya kasance tsakanin 0.1% zuwa 0.39%.

sourceString: The upper estimate of this range is consistent with the results from the first random testing for COVID-19 in Germany, and a statistical study analysing the impact of testing on CFR estimates.
targetString: Manyan Kididdigar na wannan kewayon sun yi daidai da sakamakon daga gwaji na farko na COVID-19 a Jamus, da kuma nazarin ƙididdigar da ke nazarin tasirin gwaji akan ƙididdigar CFR.

sourceString: The WHO asserts that the pandemic can be controlled.
targetString: WHO ta tabbatar da cewa za a iya sha kan annoban.

sourceString: The peak and ultimate duration of the outbreak are uncertain and may differ by location.
targetString: Tsananin Hauhawar da Yawan Lokacin Barkewar Ba Su Da Tabbas Kuma Za Su Iya Banbanta A Wurare.

sourceString: Maciej Boni of Penn State University stated, "Left unchecked, infectious outbreaks typically plateau and then start to decline when the disease runs out of available hosts.
targetString: Maciej Bony daga Penn State University ya bayyana cewa idan ba'a kula ba barkewar shafuwar ta zai haura sa'anan ya fara raguwa yayin da cutar ta rasa jiki da zata rayu a kai.

sourceString: But it's almost impossible to make any sensible projection right now about when that will be".
targetString: Amma kusan ba zai yiwu a yi wani tsinkaye ba game da lokacin da hakan zai kasance ”.

sourceString: The Chinese government's senior medical adviser Zhong Nanshan argued that "it could be over by June" if all countries can be mobilized to follow the WHO's advice on measures to stop the spread of the virus.
targetString: Babban jami'i mai baiwa gwamnatin China shawara a kan kiwon lafiya Zhong Nashan yana mai ra'ayi cewa akwai yiwuwar kawo karshen ta a watan Yuni mudin dukanin kasashen duniya sun lura da shawarar da hukumar WHO ta bayar na matakan takaita yaduwar kwayar cuta.

sourceString: On 17 March, Adam Kucharski of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine stated that SARS-CoV-2 "is going to be circulating, potentially for a year or two".
targetString: A ranar 17 ga watan Maris, Adam Kucharski na London School of Hygiene &amp, Tropical Medicine ya bayyana cewa SARS-CoV-2 "zai zagaya a kasashe, mai yiwuwa na tsawon shekara daya ko biyu".

sourceString: According to the Imperial College study led by Neil Ferguson, physical distancing and other measures will be required "until a vaccine becomes available (potentially 18 months or more)".
targetString: Bisa ga Kwalejin Ilimi na Imperiyal Wani Bincike Wanda Neil Ferguson Ya Jagoranta, za a bukanci Nesantawar jama'a Da ma Wasu matakai “har ya zuwa lokacin da za a  sami maganin rigakafi (a kalla Watani 18 ko ma ya fi)".

sourceString: William Schaffner of Vanderbilt University stated, "I think it's unlikely that this coronavirus—because it's so readily transmissible—will disappear completely" and it "might turn into a seasonal disease, making a comeback every year".
targetString: William Schaffner na Jami'ar Vanderbilt ya ce, "Ina tsammanin ba zai yiwu ba wannan coronavirus - saboda yana da sauƙin ɗaukar hoto - za ta shuɗe gabaɗaya" kuma "" na iya zama cuta ta zamani, da ke dawowa kowace shekara ".

sourceString: The virulence of the comeback would depend on herd immunity and the extent of mutation.
targetString: Tsananin kwayar cutar na dangantuwa ne ga karfin kariyar jiki na kamuwa da cuta da kuma yanayin kwayoyin halittar jiki.

sourceString: Symptoms of COVID-19 can be relatively non-specific and infected people may be asymptomatic.
targetString: Alamomin COVID-19 na iya zama mara takamaiman rashin daidaito kuma mutane masu kamuwa da cuta na iya zama mara sa alamun cutar.

sourceString: The two most common symptoms are fever (88%) and dry cough (68%).
targetString: Mafi yawan alamun rashin lafiya su ne zazzabi (88%) da ma busashen tari (68%).

sourceString: Less common symptoms include fatigue, respiratory sputum production (phlegm), loss of the sense of smell, shortness of breath, muscle and joint pain, sore throat, headache, chills, vomiting, hemoptysis, diarrhea, or cyanosis.The WHO states that approximately one person in six becomes seriously ill and has difficulty breathing.
targetString: Wasu kananan bayyanuwar cutan ta hadar da gajiya, fitar da majina daga hanyar numfashi (phlegm), rashin jin kanshi, karancin numfashi, ciwon gabobi da na jiki, ciwon makogwaro, ciwon kai, rashin jin dadi, amai, da gudawa, ko canza launin fata wato cyanosis. WHO ta sanar cewa kimanin mutum daya a cikin shida ya kamu da rashin lafiya kuma yana da wahala yin numfashi.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) lists emergency symptoms as difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, sudden confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.Further development of the disease can lead to severe pneumonia, acute respiratory distress syndrome, sepsis, septic shock and death.
targetString: Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da kawarwa ta U.S. (CDC) ta lissafa alamu na gaggawa kamar wahalar numfashi, tsayayyar ciwon kirji ko matsi, rikicewar kwatsam, farkawa mara wahala, da fuska mai kyau ko lebe; Ana ba da shawarar likita na gaggawa idan waɗannan alamu suna nan.Farin ci gaba na cutar na iya haifar da matsananciyar ciwon huhu, cuta hanyoyin numfashi mai tsananin gajiyar alamar cutan, tashin zuciya, sepsis, girgiza septic da mutuwa.

sourceString: Some of those infected may be asymptomatic, with no clinical symptoms but with test results that confirm infection, so researchers have issued advice that those with close contact to confirmed infected people should be closely monitored and examined to rule out infection.
targetString: Wasu daga cikin masu kamuwa da cutar na iya zama asymptomatic, ba tare da alamu na asibiti ba amma tare da sakamakon gwaji da ke tabbatar da kamuwa da cuta, don haka masu bincike sun ba da shawara cewa waɗanda ke da kusanci da mutanen da suka kamu da cutar ya kamata a sa ido sosai kuma a bincika su kawar da kamuwa da cuta.

sourceString: Chinese estimates of the asymptomatic ratio range from few to 44%.
targetString: Kdiddigar Sinanci na jimlar mara alamun cutar yana daga kalilan zuwa 44%.

sourceString: The usual incubation period (the time between infection and symptom onset) ranges from one to 14 days; it is most commonly five days.As an example of uncertainty, the estimate of the fraction of people with COVID-19 who lost their sense of smell was initially 30% and later fell to 15%.
targetString: Lokacin da aka saba amfani da shi (lokacin tsakanin kamuwa da cuta da farawa) ya fara daga daya zuwa kwanaki 14; mafi yawan lokuta kwana biyar ne.To da misalin rashin tabbas, kimantawar ɓarkewar mutane da COVID-19 waɗanda suka rasa kamshin da ƙanshi ya fara daga 30% kuma daga baya ya faɗi zuwa 15%.

sourceString: Some details about how the disease is spread are still being determined.
targetString: Wasu jawaban akan yadda cutar ke yaduwa ake kokarin ganowa.

sourceString: The disease is believed to be primarily spread during close contact and by small droplets produced during coughing, sneezing, or talking; with close contact being within 1 to 2 metres (3 to 6 feet).
targetString: Akwai yakinin farkon yaduwar ciwon at hanyar hulda da mai shi sai kuma ta hanyar digo da aka samu yayin tari ko atishawa ko yin magana tare da samun kusanci da mutum tsakanin mita 1 zuwa 2 (kafa 3 zuwa 6).

sourceString: Studies have found that an uncovered coughing can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 metres (15 feet) to 8.2 metres (27 feet).
targetString: Bincike ya gano cewa tari da ba a rufe ba yana iya haifar da didiga wanda wand zai iya tafiya zuwa mita 4,5 (ƙafa 15) zuwa mita 8.2 (ƙafa 27).

sourceString: Some have proposed that the virus may also be transmitted by small droplets that stay for more prolonged periods in the air, that may be generated during speech.Respiratory droplets may also be produced during breathing out, including when talking, though the virus is not generally airborne.
targetString: Wasu sun kudurta cewa kwayar cutar na iya yaduwa ne ta hanyar dugon ruwa da ta zauna a iska a tsawon lokaci mai yawa bayan haka a kamu da ita ta hanyar magana. Haka zalika digo ta hanyar nunfashi na iya samuwa yayin da mutum ke numfasa iska waje ko yayin magana. Asali dai hanyar shigar kwayar cutar bai takaita a kan hanyar iska ba.

sourceString: The droplets can land in the mouths or noses of people who are nearby or possibly be inhaled into the lungs.
targetString: Digon na iya fadawa a baki ko hancin wanda ke kusa wata sa'i ma ana iya shakar ta zuwa ga hunhu.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolized and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Wasu dagag cikin hanyoyin samada da lafiya kamar saka bututu don shakar iska da kuma farfadowa ta zuci suna iya zama sila na yada cutar ta iska.

sourceString: It may also spread when one touches a contaminated surface, including skin, and then touches their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Hakanan yana iya yaduwa lokacin da mutum ya taɓa abin da ya gurbata, gami da fata, sannan ya taɓa idanunsu, hanci, ko bakin su.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread by faeces, this risk is believed to be low.
targetString: A yayin da yaduwar ta na iya faruwa ta hanyar kashi ke razanar da mutane, hatsarin ta kuwa na da karanci matuka.

sourceString: The Government of China denied the possibility of faecal-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2.The virus is most contagious during the first three days after onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.
targetString: Gwamnatin China ta karyata yiwuwar yaduwar kamuwa da SaRS-CoV-2 ta hanyar takshi zuwa baki. Kwayar cutar ta fiye yaduwa rana uku da nuna alama sai dai akwai yiwuwar yaduwar ta kafin alamun sun bayyana ko kuma kafin ta ketara zuwa mataki na biyu na ciwon.

sourceString: People have tested positive for the disease up to three days before onset of symptoms suggesting transmission is possible before developing significant symptoms.
targetString: Bayan gwaji an gano mutane sun kamu da cutar har tsawon kwana uku kafin bayyanar alamomin ta. Wannan ke nuna cewa akwai yiwuwar kamuwa da cutar kafin bayyanar alamomin ta.

sourceString: Only few reports of laboratory-confirmed asymptomatic cases exist, but asymptomatic transmission has been identified by some countries during contact tracing investigations.
targetString: kadan dag cikin rahotannin dakin gwaji kae tabbatar da mmatsanancin hali da aka samu, amman tsananin yaduwar ya tabbata a wasu kasashe yayin binciken yaduwar da ma alaka.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) states that while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Hukumar dakile yadduwar cututtuka na nahiyar turai ta sanar da cewa mutum daya yakan iya raba ma mutum biyu ko uku cutar. Kuma kwayar cutar na tasiri sa'o'i zuwa ranaku a fili.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and 304 stainless steel, for one day on cardboard, and for up to four hours on copper.
targetString: Musamman, an gano kwayar cutar har zuwa kwanaki uku akan filastik (polypropylene) da 304 bakin karfe, na kwana ɗaya a cikin kwali, kuma har tsawon sa'o'i huɗu akan jan ƙarfe.

sourceString: This, however, varies based on the humidity and temperature.Pets and other animals have tested positive for COVID-19.
targetString: Wannan, duk da haka, ya bambanta dangane da ɗanshin yanayi da zafin yanayin jiki. An samu dabbobin gida da wasu dabbobin da cutar COVID-19 bayan gwaji.

sourceString: There is no evidence animals can pass the virus on to humans, though British authorities advise washing one's hands after contact with animals, like after contact with other surfaces infected people could have touched.
targetString: Babu wata shaida mai nuna cewa dabba na iya zamo sanadiyar kamuwar cutar ga dan Adam. Sai dai hukumar Birtaniya ta shawarci da a wanke hannaye bayan hulda da dabba da sauran wurare da mai dauke da cutar ke iya tabawa.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel virus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Kwayar cutar 2 SARS-COV-2 kwayar cuta ce wanda ke da asali. An fara samo ta ne daga mutane uku masu dauke da cutar pneumonia dake tare da ciwon nunfashi mai tsanani a nan birnin Wuhan na kasar China.

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which dissolves its protective envelope.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Dukkan fasalin Wannan sabon kwayar cutan SARS-CoV-2 Sun Faru daga coronavirus dangi iri daya a yanayin su. A Wajen Jikin mutum, a kan kashe kwayar cutan da sabulun gida, Wanda ke Narkar Da Matakan Kariya. SARS-CoV-2 Na Da dangataka Da Ainahin SARS-CoV.

sourceString: It is thought to have a zoonotic origin.
targetString: Ana tsammanin yana da asalin zoonotic.

sourceString: Genetic analysis has revealed that the coronavirus genetically clusters with the genus Betacoronavirus, in subgenus Sarbecovirus (lineage B) together with two bat-derived strains.
targetString: Binciken kwayar halitta ta bayyana cewa coronavirus yana hade da kwayoyin halittar Betacoronavirus, a cikin subgenus Sarbecovirus (jinsi B) tare da nau'ikan baturi biyu da aka samo.

sourceString: It is 96% identical at the whole genome level to other bat coronavirus samples (BatCov RaTG13).
targetString: Kaso 96% na nuna kamala a wani bangare yayin gina kwayoyin hallita idan aka kwatanta da samfurin Bat coronavirus (BatCov RaTG13).

sourceString: In February 2020, Chinese researchers found that there is only one amino acid difference in certain parts of the genome sequences between the viruses from pangolins and those from humans.
targetString: A watan Faburairu 2020, masu bincike yan chinese sun gano cewar akwai wani kwayar hallita a sassa na kawayr da alakar ta tsakanin cutar dama kwayar da kuma wanda ke jikin mutum.

sourceString: Whole-genome comparison to date has found at most 92% of genetic material shared between pangolin coronavirus and SARS-CoV-2, which is insufficient to prove pangolins to be the intermediate host.
targetString: Da aka kwatanta abubuwa da suke gina kwayoyin halitta na an gano cewa kaso 92% iri daya ne tsakanin pangolin coronavirus da na SARS-COV-2. Hakan dai baya tabbatar da pangolin a matsayin masauki na tsakani ba.

sourceString: Infection by the virus can be provisionally diagnosed on the basis of symptoms, though confirmation is ultimately by reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) of infected secretions or CT imaging.
targetString: Ana iya gano da kamuwa da kwayar cutar kan alamu, kodayake tabbatarwa daga ƙarshe ita ce hanyar jujjuyawar kwayar polymerase (rRT-PCR) ta kamuwa ko hoton CT.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Wani bincike mai hada PCR Da CT a Wuhan Na Da raayin cewa CT Na Da Saurin Dauka akan PCR, Duk da rashin takaicewa, Dama Yawancin irin Ganin yadda Wasu cututukan Sanyi Da wasu Cuttutukan Suka gudana.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".
targetString: ya zuwa Maris 2020, Cibiyar Nazarin Kama Hoton Jiki na Amurka wato American College of Radiology ta ba da shawarar cewa "Bai kamata a yi amfani da CT don bincika ko a matsayin gwajin fari don gano da cutar COVID-19 ba".

sourceString: The WHO has published several RNA testing protocols for SARS-CoV-2, with the first issued on 17 January.
targetString: Hukumar WHO ta wallafa hanyoyi gwajin ta hanyar kwayar hallita na SARS-COV-2. Ta wallafa na farkon ne a ranar 17 ga watan Janairu.

sourceString: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).
targetString: Gwajin yana amfani da rikodin sarkar polymerase real-lokaci (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: The test can be done on respiratory or blood samples.
targetString: Za a iya gwajin daga layin numfashi ko ma samfurin jini.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to days.
targetString: Ana samun sakamako gaba ɗaya cikin 'yan awanni kaɗan zuwa kwanaki.

sourceString: Generally this test is carried out on a nasopharyngeal swab though a throat swab may also be used.A number of laboratories and companies are developing serological tests, which detect antibodies.
targetString: Kullum ana yin wannan gwajin ne a kan nasopharyngeal swab kodayake ana iya amfani da makogwaron makogwaro. Yawancin dakunan gwaje-gwaje da kamfanoni ke yin gwaje-gwaje na serological, wanda ke gano kwayoyin.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, none of these has been proved sufficiently accurate to be approved for widespread use.
targetString: A ranar 6 ga watan Afrilu 2020, wannan duk ba a tabbatar da ingancin su ba wajen yawan yaduwar.

sourceString: In the US a serological test developed by Cellex has been approved for emergency use by certified laboratories only.
targetString: A cikin U.S. an yarda da gwajin serological da Cellex ya kirkira wanda an aminci da shi don amfani da shi lokacin gaggawa a dakin gwajin da aka amince da ita.

sourceString: Characteristic imaging features on radiographs and computed tomography (CT) of people who are symptomatic include asymmetric peripheral ground glass opacities and absent pleural effusions.
targetString: Siffofin kwaikwayo na halayyar hoto a cikin hotunan rediyo da kuma lissafin tomography (CT) na mutanen da ke da alamun cutar sun haɗa da yanayin gilashin ƙasa na asymmetric da kuma abubuwan rashin jin daɗin rayuwa.

sourceString: The Italian Radiological Society is compiling an international online database of imaging findings for confirmed cases.
targetString: Kungiyar Radiological na Italiyanci tana tattara bayanan yanar gizo na kan layi na binciken abubuwan binciken don tabbatattun shari'o'in a duniya.

sourceString: Due to overlap with other infections such as adenovirus, imaging without confirmation by PCR is of limited specificity in identifying COVID-19.
targetString: Sakamakon kewayawa tare da wasu cututtukan irin su adenovirus, hoto ba tare da tabbatarwar PCR ba shi da iyaka takamaiman ganowa COVID-19.

sourceString: A large study in China compared chest CT results to PCR and demonstrated that though imaging is less specific for the infection, it is faster and more sensitive, suggesting its consideration as a screening tool in epidemic areas.
targetString: Wani gaggarumin bincike a China ta kwatanta sakamakon hoton kirji da na kwayoyin halitta inda ta gano karancin samar da hakikanin hoton kumuwar cutar. Ta gano cewa kwayar cutar ta fiye sauri kuma ta fi hadari ta kara da bada shawara na a sauya hanyar wajen gwajin cututuka a wuraren da annobar ke da yawa.

sourceString: Artificial intelligence-based convolutional neural networks have been developed to detect imaging features of the virus with both radiographs and CT.
targetString: An tsara cibiyoyin sadarwa na tsarin wucin gadi na fasahar mutum don gano fasali masu kwayar cutar tare da hotunan rediyo da CT.

sourceString: Strategies for preventing transmission of the disease include maintaining overall good personal hygiene, washing hands, avoiding touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands, and coughing or sneezing into a tissue and putting the tissue directly into a waste container.
targetString: Dabarun hana yaduwar cutar sun hada da kula tsabtacewar mutum gaba daya, wanke hannaye, gujewa taba idanu, hanci, ko baki da hannayen ku wanda ba a wanke ba, da tari ko atishawa cikin takarda da sanya takardan cikin kwandon shara.

sourceString: Those who may already have the infection have been advised to wear a surgical mask in public.
targetString: An shawarci waɗanda su riga su ka kamu da wannan cutar su sanya abin rufe fuska na tiyata a cikin jama'a.

sourceString: Physical distancing measures are also recommended to prevent transmission.Many governments have restricted or advised against all non-essential travel to and from countries and areas affected by the outbreak.
targetString: Guje ma musabiha tsakanin juna na daga cikin matakan magance yaduwar cuta da aka dauka. Mafi yawancin gwamnatocin kasashe sun shawarci da a hana tafiyar kai da kawowa zuwa kasashen da annobar ta shafa.

sourceString: However, the virus has reached the stage of community spread in large parts of the world.
targetString: Amman cutar ta kai matakin yaduwa a cikin alumma a sassa na duniya.

sourceString: This means that the virus is spreading within communities, and some community members don't know where or how they were infected.Health care providers taking care of someone who may be infected are recommended to use standard precautions, contact precautions, and eye protection.Contact tracing is an important method for health authorities to determine the source of an infection and to prevent further transmission.
targetString: Wannan Ya Nuna Cewa Kwayan Cutar Na Yaduwa A Cikin al'ummai, Kuma Wasu Mazuna Yankin basu San Ko Ta Ina Bane Ko Ta Yaya ne Suka Kamu Da Wannan Cutar. MaAikatan kiwon Lafiya Masu Kula Da Marasa Lafiya suna Umarta wadanda suka kamu da cutar Cewa Su Yi amfani Da kaidar Kariya, da kaidar huldawa, kariyar ido. Neman wadanda suka yi hulda da marasa lafiya hanya ce mai mahimmanci ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya su gano ainihin inda cutar ta bullo da kuma hana shi daga yaduwa.

sourceString: The use of location data from mobile phones by governments for this purpose has prompted privacy concerns, with Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issuing a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Yin amfani da bayanan wuri daga wayoyin hannu ta gwamnatoci don wannan dalili ya haifar da damuwa na sirri, tare da Amnesty International da wasu kungiyoyi sama da 100 suna ba da sanarwa suna kiran iyaka akan wannan sa-ido.

sourceString: Various mobile apps have been implemented or proposed for voluntary use, and as of April 7, 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: An aiwatar da aikace-aikacen wayar hannu daban-daban ko aka gabatar don amfani da son rai, kuma daga ranar 7 ga Afrilu, 2020, gungun masana kwararru da yawa suna aiki akan hanyoyin sadarwar sirri, kamar yin amfani da Bluetooth don shiga kusancin mai amfani da sauran wayoyin hannu.

sourceString: Users then receive a message if they've been in close contact with someone who has tested positive for COVID-19.Misconceptions are circulating about how to prevent infection; for example, rinsing the nose and gargling with mouthwash are not effective.
targetString: Masun amfani sun sami sako cewa idan sun hulda da wani wanda aka gwada kuma na dauke cutar COVID-19. Rashin fahimta na ta yadawa akan yadda za a kariya daga samun cutar; alal misali, wanke hanci da ma kurkurar baki basa kare mutu daga cutar ba.

sourceString: There is no COVID-19 vaccine, though many organizations are working to develop one.
targetString: Babu maganin cutar COVID-19 amman kungiyoyi na ta kokari samar da guda.

sourceString: Hand washing is recommended to prevent the spread of the disease.
targetString: An shawarci wanke hannaye domin kiyaye yaduwar cutar.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that people wash hands often with soap and water for at least twenty seconds, especially after going to the toilet or when hands are visibly dirty; before eating; and after blowing one's nose, coughing, or sneezing.
targetString: Hukumar CDC Ta Bukaci Mutane da su wanke Hannayen su a koda Yaushe Da Sabulu Ma A Kalla Dakika Aishirin, mussaman Bayan Su Ziyar Ci Bandaki Ko In Hannun Su Na Da Datti; Dama Bayan Fece Hanci, Tari Ko Hatishawa.

sourceString: This is because outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.
targetString: Wannan na faruwa ne saboda a wajen jikin mutum ana iya kashe kwayar cutar da sabulu , sabulun ta kan fasa launin dake bayar da kariya.

sourceString: CDC further recommended using an alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol by volume when soap and water are not readily available.
targetString: CDC ta kara da cewa ayi anfani da man tsaftacewar hannu mai sinadarin alcohol kashi 60% idan ba bu ruwa ko sabulu a kusa.

sourceString: The WHO advises people to avoid touching the eyes, nose, or mouth with unwashed hands.
targetString: Kungiyyar WHO Tana Shawartar mutane da su Kiyayi taba Ido, Hanci da bakin su Ba Tare da wanke Hannu Ba.

sourceString: Surfaces may be decontaminated with a number of solutions (within one minute of exposure to the disinfectant for a stainless steel surface), including 62–71% ethanol, 50–100% isopropanol, 0.1% sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, and 0.2–7.5% povidone-iodine.
targetString: Za'a iya wanke kwayoyin cututtuka daga saman da yawancin hanyoyin magancewa (a cikin minti daya na bayyanuwa ga mai lalata ga bakin karfe), hade da kashi 62-71 bisa dari ethanol, kashi 50-100 bisa dari isopropanol, kashi 0.1 bisa dari sodium hypochlorite, 0.5% hydrogen peroxide, da kashi 0.2-7.5 bisa dari na povidone-iodine.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chrohexidine gluconate, are less effective.
targetString: Sauran rigakafi kamar Benzalkonium chloride da Chrohexidine tasirin su bai yi karfi ba.

sourceString: The CDC recommends that if a COVID case is suspected or confirmed at a facility such as an office or day care, all areas such as offices, bathrooms, common areas, shared electronic equipment like tablets, touch screens, keyboards, remote controls, and ATM machines used by the ill persons, should be disinfected.
targetString: CDC ta ba da shawarar cewa idan ana zargin COVID idan aka tabbatar ko aka tabbatar da shi a wani ofishi kamar ofis ko kulawar rana, duk bangarorin kamar ofisoshin, wuraren wanka, wuraren gama gari, kayan lantarki kamar na allunan, allon taɓawa, keɓaɓɓun maɓallin, na nesa, da ATM injunan da marasa lafiyar ke amfani da su, ya kamata a warwatsa su.

sourceString: Health organizations recommended that people cover their mouth and nose with a bent elbow or a tissue when coughing or sneezing, and disposing of any tissue immediately.
targetString: Kungiyoyin kiwon lafiya sun shawarciu da jama'a suyi rufe baki da hancin ta hanyar lankewasa gwiwar hannaye ko kuma ayi amfani da tolifefa yayin da mutum ke tari ko atishawa kuma a tabbatar an zubar da tolifefa ba tare da bata lokaci ba bayan kammala hakan.

sourceString: Surgical masks are recommended for those who may be infected, as wearing a mask can limit the volume and travel distance of expiratory droplets dispersed when talking, sneezing, and coughing.
targetString: Ana ba da shawarar amfani da abin rufe fuska na tiyata ga waɗanda wataƙila sun kamu da cutar, domin sanya abin rufe fuska na iya taƙaita yawan tafiyar nesan tarwatsewar ɗigagga nufanshin waje a lokacin magana, atishawa, da yin tari.

sourceString: The WHO has issued instructions on when and how to use masks.
targetString: Hukumar WHO ta ba da umarni kan yaushe da kuma yadda za a yi amfani da abin rufe fuskoki.

sourceString: According to Stephen Griffin, a virologist at the University of Leeds, "Wearing a mask can reduce the propensity [of] people to touch their faces, which is a major source of infection without proper hand hygiene."Masks have also been recommended for use by those taking care of someone who may have the disease.
targetString: Bisa bayani kwararre a bangaren kwayar cuta a jami'ar Leeds Stephen Griffin sanya takunkunmin fuska na rake yiwuwar taba fusta da hannu wanda yin haka yana daga cikin manyan hanyoyin samun cuta matukar ba'a wanke hannu da kyau. “ Hakazalika an shawarci yin amfani da takunkumin fuska ga masu jinyar wadanda ke dauke da ciwon.

sourceString: The WHO has recommended the wearing of masks by healthy people only if they are at high risk, such as those who are caring for a person with COVID-19, although they also acknowledge that wearing masks may help people avoid touching their face.
targetString: WHO Tana shwartar Sanya kariyar fuska ga masu lafiya in har suna daga cikin wanda ke iya fuskantar barazana, alal misali wanda ke kula da masu cutar COVID-19, duk da cewa sun amince da sanya kariyar fuska yana iya taimakawar mutane don hana su shafa fuskar su.

sourceString: Several countries have started to encourage the use of face masks by members of the public.
targetString: Kasashe Da Dama Sun Fara Daukaka Amfani Da Kariyar Fuska Ga membobin Al'umamn Su.

sourceString: In the U.S., the CDC recommends wearing non-medical face mask made out of cloth.China has specifically recommended the use of disposable medical masks by healthy members of the public, particularly when coming into close contact (1 metre (3 ft) or less) with other people.
targetString: A cikin U.S., CDC ta ba da shawarar saka suturar fuska wanda ba na asibiti ba wacce aka yi da zane.China ta ba da shawarar musamman amfani da abubuwan rufe fuska wanda za a iya jefarwa ta hanyar wakilan jama'a masu lafiya, musamman idan suna cikin kusanci (1 mita (3 ft) ko lessasa da haka) ) da sauran mutane.

sourceString: Hong Kong recommends wearing a surgical mask when taking public transport or staying in crowded places.
targetString: Hong Kong ta umarci da a sanya takunkumin fuska yayin shiga abun hawa kuma inda jama'a suka taru.

sourceString: Thailand's health officials are encouraging people to make cloth facemasks at home and wash them daily.
targetString: Ma'aikatan lafiyar Thailad suna kara karfafa mutane da su saka kariyar fuska a gida kuma su wanke su a kullum.

sourceString: The Czech Republic and Slovakia banned going out in public without wearing a mask or covering one's nose and mouth.
targetString: Jamhuriyar Czech da Slovakia sun hana fita a bainar jama'a ba tare da sanya abin rufe fuska ba ko rufe hanci da bakin mutum.

sourceString: On 16 March, Vietnam requested everyone to wear a face mask when going to public areas in order to protect themselves and others.
targetString: A ranar 16 Maris, Vietnam ta buƙaci kowa da kowa ya sanya abin rufe fuska yayin zuwa wuraren jama'a don kare kansu da sauran jama'a.

sourceString: The Austrian government mandated that everyone entering a grocery store must wear a face mask.
targetString: Gwamnatin Ostireliya ta ba da umarnin cewa duk wanda ya shiga kantin kayan miya dole ne ya sanya abin rufe fuska.

sourceString: Israel has asked all residents to wear face masks when in public.
targetString: Israila Ta Umarci mazaunan ta Da a Sanya Kariyar Fuska Indan Zai Fito Cikin Jama'a.

sourceString: Taiwan, which has been producing ten million masks per day since mid-March, required passengers on trains and intercity buses to wear face masks on 1 April.
targetString: Taiwan, wanda ke sakar Kariyar Fuska A Rana kusan guda milliyan Goma tun Tsakiyar watan Maris, Ta bukaci Fasanja a Jirgin kasa Da motoccin Haya Na Bas Da su sanya Kariyar fuska Daga 1 ga watan Afrilu.

sourceString: Panama has made it obligatory to wear a face mask whenever going outside, while also recommending the manufacture of a homemade face mask for those who cannot purchase face masks.
targetString: Kasar Panama ta wajabta sanya takunkumin rufe hanci da baki ga ko wani dan kasa yayin fita waje. Ta bada shawarar na a sarrafa irin takunkumi na gargajiya idan babu halin siyan ainihin samfurin.

sourceString: Face masks have also been widely used in Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, and Singapore.
targetString: Akasarin mutane na amfani da takunkumin fuska a kasashen Japan da South Africa da Malaysia da Korea da kuma Singapore.

sourceString: Social distancing (also known as physical distancing) includes infection control actions intended to slow the spread of disease by minimizing close contact between individuals.
targetString: Nisantawar zamantakewa (wanda kuma aka sani da nesa da jiki) ya hada da ayyukan sarrafa kamuwa da cuta wanda aka yi niyya don rage yaduwar cutar ta hanyar rage kusancin tsakanin mutane.

sourceString: Methods include quarantines; travel restrictions; and the closing of schools, workplaces, stadiums, theatres, or shopping centres.
targetString: matakai sun hadar da kebe kai, hana tafiye-tafiye, da rufe makarantu, da maaikatu, da filayen wasa, dandalin wasanni ko shagunan siyayya.

sourceString: Individuals may apply social distancing methods by staying at home, limiting travel, avoiding crowded areas, using no-contact greetings, and physically distancing themselves from others.
targetString: Mutane dayawa na iya amfani da hanyoyin nisanta daga jama'a ta hanyar kasancewa a gida, rage tafiye-tafiye, guje wuraren cunkoso, yi amfani da gaisuwa ba tare da wata ma'amala ba, da nisantar kansu daga wasu.

sourceString: Many governments are now mandating or recommending social distancing in regions affected by the outbreak.
targetString: Yawancin gwamnatoci yanzu suna ba da izini ko bayar da shawarar nisantar jama'ar yankuna da cutar ta barke.

sourceString: The maximum gathering size recommended by US government bodies and health organizations was swiftly reduced from 250 people (if there was no known COVID-19 spread in a region) to 50 people, and later to 10 people.
targetString: Mafi girman taro da hukumomin gwamnatin U.S da kungiyoyin lafiya suka saurin rage shi zuwa mutum 250 (idan har ba a samu yaduwar COVID-19 a yankin ba) zuwa mutum 50, daga bisani ma mutum 10.

sourceString: On 22 March 2020, Germany banned public gatherings of more than two people.Older adults and those with underlying medical conditions such as diabetes, heart disease, respiratory disease, hypertension, and compromised immune systems face increased risk of serious illness and complications and have been advised by the CDC to stay home as much as possible in areas of community outbreak.In late March 2020, the WHO and other health bodies began to replace the use of the term "social distancing" with "physical distancing", to clarify that the aim is to reduce physical contact while maintaining social connections, either virtually or at a distance.
targetString: A ranar 22 Maris 2020, Jamus ta haramta haɗuwa da jama'a fiye da mutane biyu. Manyan manya da waɗanda ke da halayen kiwon lafiya kamar su ciwon sukari, ciwon zuciya, ciwon hanyar numfashi, hauhawar jini, da kuma tsarin jayyayar garkuwar jiki suna fuskantar haɗarin kamuwa da cutar rashin ƙarfi da rikice-rikice kuma sun kasance CDC ta shawarci su ci gaba da kasancewa cikin gida a duk lokacin da yankin ke barkewar cutar. A karshen Maris 2020, hukumar ta WHO da sauran bangarorin lafiya sun fara maye gurbin amfani da kalmar "nisanta daga jama'a" tare da "nisantar jiki", don fayyace cewa Manufar shine a rage yawan sadarwar jiki yayin da ake tsare haduwar jama'a, ko nesa gaske ko kusa.

sourceString: The use of the term "social distancing" had led to implications that people should engage in complete social isolation, rather than encouraging them to stay in contact with others through alternative means.Some authorities have issued sexual health guidelines for use during the pandemic.
targetString: Lakanin “Bayar da tazarar muamala” ya maye zukatan jama'a da killacewa baki daya ba tare da waiwaya baya wajen hulda da jama'a ta wata hanya daban. Hukumomi sun isar da shafuda jima'i masu amfani na kiwon lafiya yayin annobar.

sourceString: These include recommendations to only have sex with someone you live with, who does not have the virus or symptoms of the virus.
targetString: Ciki akwai shawarar yin jima'i tare da wanda suka zamanto muhallin su daya kuma wanda/wacce ba'a samu kwayar cutar ko alamun ta a jikin su.

sourceString: Self-isolation at home has been recommended for those diagnosed with COVID-19 and those who suspect they have been infected.
targetString: An shawarci masu dauke da cutar korona da su killace a gida tare da wadanda suke zaton sun kamu COVID-19 a sanadiyar su.

sourceString: Health agencies have issued detailed instructions for proper self-isolation.Many governments have mandated or recommended self-quarantine for entire populations living in affected areas.
targetString: Hukumomin kiwon lafiya sun ba da cikakkun bayanai na yadda ya dace a kebance. Gwamnatocin da dama sun ba da umarnin ko bayar da shawarar keɓance kai ga dukkan jama'ar da ke zaune a yankunan da abin ya shafa.

sourceString: The strongest self-quarantine instructions have been issued to those in high risk groups.
targetString: An ba da umarni mafi ƙarfi na keɓancewar kai ga waɗanda ke cikin haɗarin mai karfi.

sourceString: Those who may have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 and those who have recently travelled to a country or region with widespread transmission have been advised to self-quarantine for 14 days from the time of last possible exposure.
targetString: Wadanda watakila sun fallasa ga wani tare da COVID-19 da waɗanda suka tafi kwanan nan zuwa wata ƙasa ko yanki tare da watsawa masu yaduwa an shawarce su keɓe kansu na kwanaki 14 daga lokacin bayyanar ƙarshe.

sourceString: Strategies in the control of an outbreak are containment or suppression, and mitigation.
targetString: Dabarun da ke cikin kula da barkewa sune garkuwa ko hanawa, da ragewa.

sourceString: Containment is undertaken in the early stages of the outbreak and aims to trace and isolate those infected as well as introduce other measures of infection control and vaccinations to stop the disease from spreading to the rest of the population.
targetString: Ana gudanar da kokarin rage barkewar cutar a farko matakai da nufin ganowa da kuma ware wadanda suka kamu da cutar akazalika bullo da wasu matakan sarrafawar kamuwa da cutan da kuma rigakafin don hana yaduwar cutar zuwa sauran jama'a.

sourceString: When it is no longer possible to contain the spread of the disease, efforts then move to the mitigation stage: measures are taken to slow the spread and mitigate its effects on the healthcare system and society.
targetString: Lokacin da ba zai yiwu a iya ɗaukar yaduwar cutar ba, kokarin sai a matsa zuwa matakin ragewa: ana ɗaukar matakan rage jinkirin yaduwar cutar da kuma tasirin ta kan tsarin kiwon lafiya da al'umma.

sourceString: A combination of both containment and mitigation measures may be undertaken at the same time.
targetString: Ana iya aiwatar da matakan kariya da ragewar cutan a lokaci guda.

sourceString: Suppression requires more extreme measures so as to reverse the pandemic by reducing the basic reproduction number to less than 1.Part of managing an infectious disease outbreak is trying to decrease the epidemic peak, known as flattening the epidemic curve.
targetString: Takaitawa na bukatar karin tsauraran matakai don sauya cutar ta hanyar rage lambar haifuwa ta asali da kasa da 1.Sashin gudanar da kamuwa da barkewar cutan na kokarin rage haurawar annoban, da aka sani da karkatar bakin hanyar annoban.

sourceString: This decreases the risk of health services being overwhelmed and provides more time for vaccines and treatments to be developed.
targetString: Wannan yana rage haɗarin ayyukan kiwon lafiya da ake fama da shi kuma yana ba da ƙarin lokaci don jinyar allurar rigakafi da jiyya.

sourceString: Non-pharmaceutical interventions that may manage the outbreak include personal preventive measures, such as hand hygiene, wearing face-masks, and self-quarantine; community measures aimed at physical distancing such as closing schools and cancelling mass gathering events; community engagement to encourage acceptance and participation in such interventions; as well as environmental measures such surface cleaning.More drastic actions aimed at containing the outbreak were taken in China once the severity of the outbreak became apparent, such as quarantining entire cities and imposing strict travel bans.
targetString: Kariya wanda ba na magani ba wanda zai iya kare barkewar ta hada da matakan kariyar mutum, kamar, sanya abun rufe fuska, da kebewar kai; matakai na al'uma da nufin nisantar jiki kamar rufewar makarantu da hana babban taruka; hadin kan al'uma don karfafa karbuwa da gudanarwa a iri wadanan kariya; har da matakan yanayi kamar tsaftacewar saman ababe. An dauki ayyukan da aka yi niyya sosai domin rage barkewar cutan a China lokacin da tsananin barkewar ta bayyana a sarari, kamar kebewar dukan birane da  tilasta dokar hana tafiye-tafiye.

sourceString: Other countries also adopted a variety of measures aimed at limiting the spread of the virus.
targetString: Wasu kasashen suma sun dau matakai da dama waje rage yaduwar cutar.

sourceString: South Korea introduced mass screening and localized quarantines, and issued alerts on the movements of infected individuals.
targetString: Koriya ta Kudu ta gabatar da gwaje-gwaje na taro da kuma keɓewa ta gida, tare da ba da sanarwar faɗakarwa game da ƙungiyoyin masu cutar.

sourceString: Singapore provided financial support for those infected who quarantined themselves and imposed large fines for those who failed to do so.
targetString: Singapore ta ba da tallafin kudi ga wadanda suka kamu da kebe wadanda suka kebe kansu tare da sanya babbar asara ga wadanda suka kasa yin hakan.

sourceString: Taiwan increased face mask production and penalized hoarding of medical supplies.Simulations for Great Britain and the United States show that mitigation (slowing but not stopping epidemic spread) and suppression (reversing epidemic growth) have major challenges.
targetString: Taiwan Ta Kara Yawan Hada Kariyar fuska Tare Da Hukunta Masu Boye Kayan Kiyon Lafiya. Matakan Kasar Birtania Da Na Kasar Amurka Na Nuna Yanayin (raguwan annoba Amman Ba a Hana Yaduwar ba) Da Ma Rage (Juya yaduwar annoba) Na Da manyan Matsaloli.

sourceString: Optimal mitigation policies might reduce peak healthcare demand by 2/3 and deaths by half, but still result in hundreds of thousands of deaths and health systems being overwhelmed.
targetString: Tsarin rage kaifin cutar na iya haddasa raguwar bukatun harkokin lafiya zuwa 2/3 da kuma mace-mace zuwa rabi. Hakazalika tana iya haifar da mutuwa daruruwan dubbunan mutane tare da fin karfin tsare-tsaren kula da lafiya.

sourceString: Suppression can be preferred but needs to be maintained for as long as the virus is circulating in the human population (or until a vaccine becomes available, if that comes first), as transmission otherwise quickly rebounds when measures are relaxed.
targetString: An fiye amfani da mataki na dannewa har tsawon lokaci da kwayar cutar ke yawo a jikin dan Adam (Ko kuma har sain an samu rigafi) domin yaduwa na iya canza salon ta yayi da aka sassauta matakin.

sourceString: Long-term intervention to suppress the pandemic causes social and economic costs.
targetString: sa baki na dogon lokaci don kashe cutar na haifar da tsadarna zamantakewa da tattalin arziƙi.

sourceString: There are no specific antiviral medications approved for COVID-19, but development efforts are underway, including testing of existing medications.
targetString: Babu tabbatacciyar magani dake yakar kwayar cutar COVID-19 amma har yanzu ana yunkurin ganowa cikin yunkurin da ake akwai gwajin magunguna da aka riga aka sarrafa.

sourceString: Taking over-the-counter cold medications, drinking fluids, and resting may help alleviate symptoms.
targetString: Shan magani da yawan shan abu mai malala tare da hutawa na iya taimakawa wajen rage girman alamomin ciwon.

sourceString: Depending on the severity, oxygen therapy, intravenous fluids, and breathing support may be required.
targetString: Ya danganta da tsananin ta ana iya bukatar jinya ta hanyar iskar Oxygen da shigar sinadarin ruwa ta hanyar bututun jini tare da kuma shakar iska.

sourceString: The use of steroids may worsen outcomes.
targetString: Yin amfani da magungunan steroids na iya tsanantar sakamako.

sourceString: Several compounds that were previously approved for treatment of other viral diseases are being investigated for use in treating COVID-19.
targetString: Yawancin mahadi waɗanda aka yarda da su don maganin wasu cututtukan gama gari ana bincikarsu don amfani da su wajen jinyar COVID-19.

sourceString: The WHO also stated that some "traditional and home remedies" can provide relief of the symptoms caused by SARS-CoV-19.
targetString: WHO ta kara da cewa wasu maganin gargajiya na iya sassauta alamu da SARS-COV-19 ke haifarwa.

sourceString: Increasing capacity and adapting healthcare for the needs of COVID-19 patients is described by the WHO as a fundamental outbreak response measure.
targetString: ingizawa tare da bayar da sauya tsarin kiwon lafiya domin biyan bukatar mara lafiya mai fama da ciwon COVID-19 ta kasance gaggarumi mataki na gaggawa kamar yadda WHO ta bayyana.

sourceString: The ECDC and the European regional office of the WHO have issued guidelines for hospitals and primary healthcare services for shifting of resources at multiple levels, including focusing laboratory services towards COVID-19 testing, cancelling elective procedures whenever possible, separating and isolating COVID-19 positive patients, and increasing intensive care capabilities by training personnel and increasing the number of available ventilators and beds.
targetString: ECDC da ofishin yanki na Turai na WHO sun ba da jagororin asibitoci da sabis na kiwon lafiya na farko don canza albarkatu a matakan da yawa, ciki har da sabis na dakin gwaje-gwaje zuwa gwajin COVID-19, soke hanyoyin zaɓe a duk lokacin da zai yiwu, kebanta da ware marasa lafiya masu COVID-19, da haɓaka ƙarfin kulawa mai zurfi ta hanyar horar da ma'aikatan da kuma ƙara yawan wadatattun masu ba da iska da gadaje.

sourceString: There are various theories about where the very first case (the so-called patient zero) may have originated.
targetString: Akwai ra'yi da Dama Akan inda Cutar ta fara (ainahin Mai Dauke Da Ita) Wanda Ta Bulla Daga Wajen Shi.

sourceString: The first known case of the novel coronavirus may trace back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan, Hubei, China.
targetString: Maganar farko da aka santa da cutar Coronavirus ana iya gano ta zuwa 1 ga Disamba 2019 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.

sourceString: Within a month, the number of coronavirus cases in Hubei gradually increased.
targetString: A tsakanin wata daya, yawan cututtukan coronavirus a Hubei sannu a hankali ya ƙaru.

sourceString: These were mostly linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, which also sold live animals, and one theory is that the virus came from one of these kinds of animals; or, in other words, has a zoonotic origin.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Wadannan galibi ana alakanta su da Kasuwar Kayan Ruwan Huanan, wanda shima ya sayar da dabbobi masu rayuwa, kuma wata ka'ida ita ce cutar ta fito ne daga ɗayan nau'ikan dabbobi; ko, a takaice dai, yana da asalin zoonotic.An lura da tarin nimoniya wanda ba a sani ba a ranar 26 ga Disamba kuma likitan Zhang Jixian ya bayyana a Asibitin lardin Hubei, wanda ya sanar da CDC na Wuhan Jianghan a ranar 27 ga Disamba.

sourceString: On 30 December, a group of doctors at Wuhan Central Hospital alerted their colleagues of a "SARS-like coronavirus".
targetString: A Ranar 30 ga Watan December, wata Kungiyyar likitoci A Asibitin Tsakiyyar Wuhan Sun Sanar Da Abokan aikin Su Akan “coronavirus mai kamar da-SARS.

sourceString: Eight of these doctors, including Li Wenliang, were admonished by the police for spreading false rumours, and another, Ai Fen, was reprimanded by her superiors for raising the alarm.
targetString: 'Yan sanda sun kama takwas daga cikin likitocin, ciki har da Li Wenliang, saboda yada jita-jitar karya, sannan wasu manyan jami'anta, Ai Fen, sun tsawata mata game da batun kararrawa.

sourceString: The Wuhan Municipal Health Commission later released a public notice on 31 December and informed the WHO.
targetString: Hukumar lafiya na alkaryar Wuhan daga baya ta sanar da jama'a ranar 31 ga watan Disemba tare da bayana ma hukumar WHO.

sourceString: Enough cases of unknown pneumonia had been reported to health authorities in Wuhan to trigger an investigation in early January.During the early stages of the outbreak, the number of cases doubled approximately every seven and a half days.
targetString: An bada rahoton yanayin da ba a ganewa ba da dama ga hukumomin kiwon lafiya a Wuhan don haifar da bincike a farkon watan Janairu. A yayin farkon lokacin barkewar cutar, adadin cutar yana ninka kamar kowace kwana bakwai da rabi a takaice.

sourceString: In early and mid-January 2020, the virus spread to other Chinese provinces, helped by the Chinese New Year migration and Wuhan being a transport hub and major rail interchange.
targetString: A farkon da tsakiyar Janairu na 2020, cutar ta bazu zuwa wasu lardunan kasar Sin, da yin amfani da Sabuwar kasar Sin da Wuhan su zama tashar sufuri da kuma babbar musayar layin dogo.

sourceString: On 20 January, China reported nearly 140 new cases in one day, including two people in Beijing and one in Shenzhen.
targetString: A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, kasar Sin ta ba da rahoton sabbin masu kamu da cutar kusan 140 a cikin kwana guda, wadanda suka hada da mutane biyu a nan Beijing da kuma daya a Shenzhen.

sourceString: Later official data shows that 6,174 people had already developed symptoms by 20 January 2020.As of 26 March, the United States has overtaken China and Italy with the highest number of confirmed cases in the world.As of 9 April 2020, more than 1.61 million cases have been reported worldwide; more than 97,000 people have died and more than 364,000 have recovered.
targetString: Bayanai daga baya sun nuna cewa mutane 6,174 sun kamu da alamun cutar a ranar 20 ga Janairu 2020. Tun daga ranar 26 ga Maris, Amurka ta mamaye China da Italiya tare da mafi yawan adadin lokuta da aka tabbatar a duniya. A cikin 9 Afrilu 2020, an bayar da rahoton fiye da miliyan 1.61 a duk duniya; mutane fiye da 97,000 sun mutu kuma sama da 364,000 sun murmure.

sourceString: Around 200 countries and territories have had at least one case.
targetString: Akalla a samun mutum daya wanda ya kamu da cutar a kasashe 200 da yankuna.

sourceString: Due to the pandemic in Europe, many countries in the Schengen Area have restricted free movement and set up border controls.
targetString: Saboda Annobar dake Europe, Kasahe da Dama dake karkashin Tsarin Schenghen sun Takaita Zirga-zirga domin Samar da Doka A Iyakokin.

sourceString: National reactions have included containment measures such as quarantines (known as stay-at-home orders, shelter-in-place orders, or lockdown) and curfews.As of 2 April, nearly 300 million people, or about 90% of the population, are under some form of lockdown in the United States, more than 50 million people are in lockdown in the Philippines, about 59 million people are in lockdown in South Africa, and 1.3 billion people are in lockdown in India.
targetString: Tunanin kasa ya hada da matakain ragewar cutan kamar kebe mutane don samun (wato umurnin zaman gida, wajajen mafaka, ko ma rufe gari) da ma dokar ta baci. A ranar 2 ga watan afrillu kusa mutane milliyan 300, ko kimanin kashi 90% na alumma, na kar kashi wata irin doka ta kulle a kasar amurka, fiye da mutane milliyan 50 na kulle a kasar phillipines, kusan mutane milliyan 59 na kulle a kasar africa ta kudu, da mutane billiyan 1.3 na fuskantar kulle a kasar india.

sourceString: On 26 March, 1.7 billion people worldwide were under some form of lockdown, which increased to 2.6 billion people two days later—around a third of the world's population.
targetString: 26 ga watan Maris, mutane biliyan 1.7 a duk duniya sun kasance a cikin wasu nau'ikan kullewa, wanda ya karu zuwa mutane biliyan 2.6 a cikin kwana biyu - kusan kashi ɗaya cikin uku na yawan jama'ar duniya.

sourceString: The first confirmed case of COVID-19 has been traced back to 1 December 2019 in Wuhan; one unconfirmed report suggests the earliest case was on 17 November.
targetString: Mutumin Farko Da Aka samu Da Cutar COVID-19 An Bibiya Shi ranar 1 ga Watan December Na 2019 a Wuhan; A Wani Rahoto Mara Tabbaci An Ce Na Farokon Tun 17 ga Watan Nuwamba.

sourceString: Doctor Zhang Jixian observed a cluster of pneumonia cases of unknown cause on 26 December, upon which her hospital informed Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
targetString: Likita Zhang Jixian ya lura da lura da taruwar alamar pneumonia mara asali wanda a 26 ga watan Disemba. Samun haka ya sanya asibitin ta ya sanar da hukumar dakile cututtuka masu yaduwa ta Wuhan Jianghan a ranar 27 ga watan Disemba.

sourceString: Initial genetic testing of patient samples on 27 December 2019 indicated the presence of a SARS-like coronavirus.
targetString: Gwajin Masarrafar kwayar hallita na farko na mara lafiya aka gudanar a 27 ga watan Disemba na 2019 ya nuna kasancewar kwayar cuta mai kama da SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: A public notice was released by Wuhan Municipal Health Commission on 31 December.
targetString: An fitar da Sanarwa ta Jama'a baki daya daga Hukumar Lafiya na Wuhan A ranar 31 ga watan Disamba.

sourceString: The WHO was informed on the same day.
targetString: An sanar da hukumar lafiya na duniya (WHO) a ranar.

sourceString: As these notifications occurred, doctors in Wuhan were warned by police for "spreading rumours" about the outbreak.
targetString: Yayin da waɗannan sanarwar suka faru, 'yan sanda sun gargaɗi likitocin Wuhan game da "yada jita-jita" game da barakar.

sourceString: The Chinese National Health Commission initially claimed that there was no "clear evidence" of human-to-human transmission.
targetString: Hukumar lafiya ta kasar China a farko tayi ikirari cewa babu tabbaciyar matsaya na kamuwa tsakanin Mutum zuwa wani.

sourceString: In late January, the Chinese government launched a radical campaign later described by the Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping as a "people's war" to contain the spread of the virus.
targetString: A karshen watan Janairu, gwamnatin kasar Sin ta bullo da wani shiri na daga baya wanda babban sakataren jam'iyyar kwaminis ta kasar Sin Xi Jinping ya bayyana a matsayin "yakin mutane" don shawo kan yaduwar cutar.

sourceString: In what has been described as "the largest quarantine in human history", a cordon sanitaire was announced on 23 January stopping travel in and out of Wuhan, which was extended to a total of 15 cities in Hubei, affecting a total of about 57 million people.
targetString: A Abun da aka kimanta da Mafi Girman Kebe Alumma a Tarihin bil adama",a Cordon sanitaire an Sanar A Ranar 23 gawatan Junairu Hana tafiye-tafiye a Ciki da Wajen Wuhan, Wanda Bisani Aka Kara Da birane 15 a Hubei, Wanda ya Shafi mutane kimanin Miliyan 57.

sourceString: Private vehicle use was banned in the city.
targetString: An hana amfani da motoci mutane a cikin birni.

sourceString: Chinese New Year (25 January) celebrations were cancelled in many places.
targetString: An soke bikin Sabuwar shekarar kasar Sin (25 Janairu) a wurare da yawa.

sourceString: The authorities also announced the construction of a temporary hospital, Huoshenshan Hospital, which was completed in 10 days.
targetString: Mahukuntan sun kuma ba da sanarwar gina wani asibiti na wucin gadi, asibitin Huoshenshan, wanda aka kammala cikin kwanaki 10.

sourceString: Another hospital was built afterwards, Leishenshan Hospital, to handle additional patients.
targetString: An kara gina wata asibitin bayan haka,  Asibitin Leishenshan, za su kula da karin marasa lafiya.

sourceString: In addition to newly constructed hospitals, China also converted 14 other facilities in Wuhan, such as convention centers and stadiums, into temporary hospitals.On 26 January, the government instituted further measures to contain the COVID-19 outbreak, including issuing health declarations for travellers and extending the Spring Festival holiday.
targetString: Kari da sabbin asibitocin da aka gina, Sin ta mayar da wasu cibiyoyi 14 a Wuhan, kamar wuraren taron gasa da filin wasa, zuwa asibitoci na wucin gadi. A ranar 26 ga Janairu, gwamnatin ta kafa wasu matakai don dakile barkewar COVID-19, gami da bayar da sanarwar lafiyar matafiya da kuma tsawaita lokacin bikin bazara.

sourceString: Universities and schools around the country were also closed.
targetString: Jami'oi da makarantu a fadin kasar suma a kulle suke.

sourceString: The regions of Hong Kong and Macau instituted several measures, particularly in regard to schools and universities.
