targetString: Yankin Hong Kong da Macau sun dau matakai musamman na dangane da makarantu da jami'o'i.

sourceString: Remote working measures were instituted in several Chinese regions.
targetString: An bullo da matakan aiki da yawa a yankuna da yawa na kasar Sin.

sourceString: Travel restrictions were enacted in and outside of Hubei.
targetString: A Saka ƙuntatawa Akan tafiye-tafiye A Ciki da wajen Hubei.

sourceString: Public transport was modified, and museums throughout China were temporarily closed.
targetString: An canza fasalin safarar jama'a tare da kulle wuraren tarihi na takaitaccen lokaci a China.

sourceString: Control of public movement was applied in many cities, and it has been estimated that about 760 million people (more than half the population) faced some form of outdoor restriction.After the outbreak entered its global phase in March, Chinese authorities took strict measures to prevent the virus from "importing" from other countries.
targetString: An yi amfani da ikon motsi a cikin birane da yawa, kuma an kiyasta cewa kimanin mutane miliyan 760 (sama da rabin yawan jama'a) sun fuskanci wani nau'in dokar hana fita daga waje. Bayan barkewar cutar ta shiga matsayinta na duniya a watan Maris, hukumomin kasar Sin sun dauki tsauraran matakan. hana cutar daga "shigo da" daga wasu ƙasashe.

sourceString: For example, Beijing has imposed a 14-day mandatory quarantine for all international travellers entering the city.On 23 March, mainland China only one case had transmitted domestically in the five days prior, in this instance via a traveller returning to Guangzhou from Istanbul.
targetString: Misali, birnin Beijing ya sanya dokar hana fita ta kwanaki 14 ga duk matafiya na duniya da suka shiga cikin birnin. A ranar 23 ga Maris, babban yankin kasar Sin daya ne ya ba da izinin shiga cikin gida a cikin kwanaki biyar da suka gabata, a wannan hanyar ta hanyar matafiyi da ya dawo Guangzhou daga Istanbul.

sourceString: On 24 March 2020, Chinese Premier Li Keqiang reported that the spread of domestically transmitted cases has been basically blocked and the outbreak has been controlled in China.
targetString: A ranar 24 ga watan maris 2020, Firimiyar Sinawa Li Keqiang ya bada rahoto cewa an toshe yaduwar kamuwa da cutan da kuma an lura da barkewar a China.

sourceString: The same day travel restrictions were eased in Hubei, apart from Wuhan, two months after the lockdown was imposed.The Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs announced on 26 March 2020 that entry for visa or residence permit holders would be suspended from 28 March onwards, with no specific details on when this policy will end.
targetString: A wannan rana an sassauta dokar hana zirga-zirga a Hubei, ban da Wuhan, watanni biyu bayan da aka sanya takunkumin. Ma'aikatar Harkokin Wajen China ta sanar a ranar 26 ga Maris 2020 cewa, za a dakatar da shigo da visa ko kuma masu ba da izinin zama daga ranar 28 ga Maris din nan, tare da babu takamaiman bayanai kan lokacin da wannan tsarin zata ƙare.

sourceString: Those who wish to enter China will have to apply for visas in Chinese embassies or consulates.
targetString: Masu bukatar shiga kasar China zasu bukaci takardar izinin zama a offishin jakadancin China.

sourceString: The Chinese government encouraged businesses and factories to re-open on 30 March, and provided monetary stimulus packages for firms.The State Council declared a day of mourning to begin with a national three-minute moment of silence on 10:00 4 April, coinciding with Qingming Festival, although the central government asked families to pay their respects online in observance of physical distancing as to avoid a renewed COVID-19 outbreak.
targetString: Gwamnatin kasar Sin ta karfafawa 'yan kasuwa da masana'antu damar sake budewa a ranar 30 ga Maris, tare da samar da kayan tallafin kudi don kamfanonin.Gwamnatin kasar ta ba da sanarwar ranar juyayin da za a fara daga wani yanayi na mintuna uku na kasa da karfe 10:00 4 ga Afrilu, a hade tare da bikin Qingming, kodayake gwamnatin tsakiya ta nemi iyalai don biyan bukatunsu ta hanyar layi don kiyaye damuwa ta jiki kamar gujewa sake bullar cutar COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 was confirmed to have spread to South Korea on 20 January 2020 from China.
targetString: An tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya bazu zuwa Koriya ta Kudu a ranar 20 ga Janairu 2020 daga China.

sourceString: The nation's health agency reported a significant increase in confirmed cases on 20 February, largely attributed to a gathering in Daegu of a new religious movement known as the Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
targetString: Hukumar kula da lafiya ta kasar ta bayar da rahoton karuwar wadanda suka tabbatar a ranar 20 ga watan Fabrairu, wanda aka danganta shi da wani taro a Daegu na wani sabon darikar addini da aka sani da Cocin Shincheonji na Yesu.

sourceString: Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
targetString: Masu bautar Shincheonji da ke ziyartar Daegu daga Wuhan ana zargin su ne asalin barkewar.

sourceString: As of 22 February, among 9,336 followers of the church, 1,261 or about 13% reported symptoms.South Korea declared the highest level of alert on 23 February 2020.
targetString: Har zuwa ranar 22 ga watan Fabrairu, tsakanin mabiya cocin 9,336, 1,261 ko kusan 13% sun ba da rahoton alamu cutar. Koriya ta Kudu ta sanar mataki mafi girma a ranar 23 ga watan Fabrairu 2020.

sourceString: On 28 February, more than 2,000 confirmed cases were reported in Korea, rising to 3,150 on 29 February.
targetString: An samu rahoton tabbutuwar mutum sama da 2,000 da suka kamu da cutar a ranar 28 ga watna Febreru a kasar Korea sai dai kuma adadin ya karu zuwa 3,150 a ranar 29 na watan.

sourceString: All South Korean military bases were quarantined after tests confirmed that three soldiers were positive for the virus.
targetString: An killace ko wani mazaunin rundunar soja nan kasar Korea ta kudu bayan labarin tabbatuwar sojoji uku da suka kamu da cutar.

sourceString: Airline schedules were also affected and therefore they were changed.South Korea introduced what was considered the largest and best-organized programme in the world to screen the population for the virus, and isolate any infected people as well as tracing and quarantining those who contacted them.
targetString: An kuma shafi tsarin jigilar sufurin jiragen sama kuma saboda haka an canza su.South Korea ta gabatar da abin da ake ganin shi ne mafi girma kuma mafi kyawun tsari a duniya don duba yawan mutanen da ke dauke da kwayar cutar, da kuma ware duk wani da ya kamu da cutar da kuma gano wadanda suka tuntube su. .

sourceString: Screening methods included mandatory self-reporting of symptoms by new international arrivals through mobile application, drive-thru testing for the virus with the results available the next day, and increasing testing capability to allow up to 20,000 people to be tested every day.
targetString: Hanyar gwajin ya kunshi kai kara na dole na nuna alamu daga baki masu shigowa daga kasar waje ta hanyar na'urar waya. Akwai kuma gwajin bi-ta-mota wanda ana iya samun sakamakon ta washe gari. Bugu da kari wani daga cikin hanyoyin shine yin Kari ga yawan mutanen da ake iya gwadawa zuwa 20,000 a ko wace rana.

sourceString: South Korea's programme is considered to be a success in controlling the outbreak despite not quarantining entire cities.The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Ana ganin shirin Koriya ta Kudu a matsayin nasara a cikin saraffawa barkewan duk da yake ba a kebe biranen baki daya ba. Tun farko dai an ba da izini ga jama'ar Koriya ta Kudu game da martanin Shugaba Moon Jae-in game da rikicin cutar.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.
targetString: ‘Yan Koriya da yawa sun sa hannu a takarda ko dai suna kiran a tsige Moon saboda abin da suka ce suna yi wa gwamnati ɓarnar barkewar, ko kuma yabon da ya yi.

sourceString: On 23 March, it was reported that South Korea had the lowest one-day case total in four weeks.
targetString: A ranar 23 ga Maris, an ba da rahoton cewa Koriya ta Kudu ce ke da mafi karancin masun kamu da cutar kwana ɗaya a cikin makwanni huɗu.

sourceString: On 29 March it was reported that beginning 1 April all new overseas arrivals will be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: A ranar 29 ga watan Maris an bada rahoton cewa daga ranar 1 ga watan Afrilu za a kebe sababin baki na tsawon sati biyu.

sourceString: Per media reports on 1 April, South Korea has received requests for virus testing assistance from 121 different countries.
targetString: A kowace rahoton kafofin watsa labarai a ranar 1 ga Afrilu, Koriya ta Kudu ta sami buƙatu na taimako na gwajin ƙwayar cuta daga ƙasashe 121 daban-daban.

sourceString: Iran reported its first confirmed cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections on 19 February in Qom, where, according to the Ministry of Health and Medical Education, two people died later that day.
targetString: Iran ta bada rahoton mutumin ta na farko da ya kamu da cutar SARS-COV-2 a ranar 19 ga watan Faburairu a qom, inda, a cewar hukumar lafiya da ilimin lafiya mutum biyu sun mutu da yammacin wannan rana.

sourceString: Early measures announced by the government included the cancellation of concerts and other cultural events, sporting events, and Friday prayers, and closures of universities, higher education institutions, and schools.
targetString: Matakan Farko Da Aka Sanar Na Gwanati ya Hadar Da Hana shagali da Ma Tarukan Gargajiyya, Wassani Da Sallar Juma'a, Dama Rufe Jami'oi,Da Makarantun Cigaba da ilimi, Da Makarantu.

sourceString: Iran allocated five trillion rials to combat the virus.
targetString: Iran sun ware kudi tiriliyan biyar don yakar wannan cuta.

sourceString: President Hassan Rouhani said on 26 February 2020 that there were no plans to quarantine areas affected by the outbreak, and only individuals would be quarantined.
targetString: Shugaba Hassan Rouhani Yace A ranar 26 ga Watan Faburairu 2020 cewa Basu Shirya Kebe Bangaren Da Barkewar Ta Shafa ba, Cewa za a kebe mutane ne kawai

sourceString: Plans to limit travel between cities were announced in March, although heavy traffic between cities ahead of the Persian New Year Nowruz continued.
targetString: An ba da sanarwar takaita zirga-zirga tsakanin biranen cikin watan Maris, kodayake an sami cunkoso mai yawa tsakanin garuruwa gabanin Sabuwar shekarar Nowruz ta Farisa.

sourceString: Shia shrines in Qom remained open to pilgrims until 16 March 2020.Iran became a centre of the spread of the virus after China during February.
targetString: Hubbaren yan akidar Shia dake Qom na bude ne har zuwa 16 ga watan Maris 2020. Kasar Iran ta kasance cibiyar yaduwar kwayar cutar bayan China a cikin watan Febreru.

sourceString: Amidst claims of a cover-up of the extent of the outbreak in Iran, more than ten countries had traced their cases back to Iran by 28 February, indicating that the extent of the outbreak may be more severe than the 388 cases reported by the Iranian government by that date.
targetString: A yayin da ake zargin boye labari game da girman barkewar cutar a kasar Iran, fiye da kasashe goma sun gano tushen barkewar a kasarsu zuwa Iran a ranar 28 ga watan Febreru. Tare da nuna cewa girman barkewar na iya haurawa tare da yin tsananin fiye da mutum 388 da gwamnatin Iran ta bada rahoto a daidai wannan lokacin.

sourceString: The Iranian Parliament was shut down, with 23 of its 290 members reported to have had tested positive for the virus on 3 March.
targetString: An rufe majalisar dokokin Iran, a bisa samu yan majalisar guda 23 cikin membobi 290 rahoto ta nuna su na dauke da cutar bayan gwaji a ranar 3 ga watan Maris.

sourceString: On 12 March, the Human Rights Watch urged the Iranian prison authorities to unconditionally release the human rights defenders detained for peaceful dissent, and to also temporarily release all the eligible prisoners.
targetString: A ranar 12 ga watan Maris, kungiyar kare hakkin bil adama wato Human Rights Watch ta bukaci hukumomin gidan yari na Iran da su saki masu kariyar hakkin jama'a wanda aka tsare yayin da suke zanga-zangar lumana, kuma da su saki dukkan yan firsina da suka dace.

sourceString: It stated that there is a greater risk of the virus to spread in closed institutions like detention centres, which also lack adequate medical care.
targetString: Sanarwar na nuna cewa akwai hatsari babba wajen yaduwar kwayar cutar a wurare kamar gidajen kaso wanda kuma basu da isasshen kulawar magani.

sourceString: On 15 March, the Iranian government reported 100 deaths in a single day, the most recorded in the country since the outbreak began.
targetString: A 15 ga watan Maris gwamnatin Iran ta kawo rahoton mutuwar mutane 100 a rana daya wanda shine mafi yawa da aka samu a kasar tun barkewar cutar.

sourceString: At least 12 sitting or former Iranian politicians and government officials had died from the disease by 17 March.
targetString: Aƙalla jami'an yanzu 12 ko tsoffin yan siyasa na Iran da kuma jami'an gwamnati sun mutu daga cutar daga ranar 17 ga watan Maris.

sourceString: By 23 March, Iran was experiencing 50 new cases every hour and one new death every ten minutes due to coronavirus.
targetString: A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, Iran na zaton mutane 50 sabbi suna kamu da cutan coronavirus da ma sabuwar mutuwa a kowanne mintuna goma.

sourceString: According to a WHO official, there may be five times more cases in Iran than what is being reported.
targetString: A fadin jami'in hukumar WHO, ana iya samun labarin wadanda suka kamu da cutan cikin Iran fiye da rahoton da a ke kawo wa.

sourceString: It is also suggested that U.S. sanctions on Iran may be affecting the country's financial ability to respond to the viral outbreak.
targetString: Anyi nazari cewa ladabtarwa da Amurka ke nuna ma kasar Iran yayi sanadiyar rage karfin kudin ta wajen yaki da annobar.

sourceString: The UN High Commissioner for Human Rights has demanded economic sanctions to be eased for nations most affected by the pandemic, including Iran.
targetString: Babban Jami'in kare Hakkin Dan Adam na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya wato UN High Commission for Human Rights ya bukaci a sassauta takunkumin tattalin arziki ga kasashen da cutar ta fi shafa, ciki har da Iran.

sourceString: The outbreak was confirmed to have spread to Italy on 31 January, when two Chinese tourists tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 in Rome.
targetString: An tabbatar da barkewar cutar zuwa Italiya a ranar 31 ga Janairu, lokacin da wasu 'yan yawon bude ido biyu na China suka gwada inganci ga SARS-CoV-2 a Rome.

sourceString: Cases began to rise sharply, which prompted the Italian government to suspend all flights to and from China and declare a state of emergency.
targetString: Yaduwar tana ta hawowa wanda hakan yasa gwamnatin Italiya ta hana dukan jirage daga China sauka ko zuwan China ta kuma saka dokar ta baci.

sourceString: An unassociated cluster of COVID-19 cases was later detected, starting with 16 confirmed cases in Lombardy on 21 February.On 22 February, the Council of Ministers announced a new decree-law to contain the outbreak, including quarantining more than 50,000 people from 11 different municipalities in northern Italy.
targetString: Bangarori Marasa Haduwa Na Cutar COVID-19 Sun gano cutar Daga baya, an Fara Da Mutum 16 a Lombardy a ranar 21 ga Watan Faburairu. A Ranar 22 ga Watan Faburairu, Majalissar Ministoci Ta Fitar Da Sabuwar Doka Don Shawo Kan Barkewar, Ciki Harda Kebe Mutane guda 50,000 daga Sassa daban-daban guda Na Yankin Arewacin Italiya.

sourceString: Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte said, "In the outbreak areas, entry and exit will not be provided.
targetString: Firayam Minista Dokiki Glueseppe Conte Yace, “a yankunar yaduwar Cutan, ba za a bada izinin shiga ko fita ba.

sourceString: Suspension of work activities and sports events has already been ordered in those areas."On 4 March, the Italian government ordered the full closure of all schools and universities nationwide as Italy reached 100 deaths.
targetString: Hana yin aiki dama wassani aka saka a wuraren a rananr 4 ga watan maris, gwamnatin italia ta kafa dokar rufe makarantu da ma jami'oi duk kasa sanidiyyar isa mace-mace guda 100.

sourceString: All major sporting events, including Serie A football matches, were to be held behind closed doors until April, but on 9 March, all sport was suspended completely for at least one month.
targetString: Mafi yawancin masannin motsa jiki ciki har da Firemiyar kwallon kafa ta serie A an tsara su ne da su gudana ba tare da ma'abota masu kallo har zuwa watan Afrilu. Sai dai a 9 ga watan Maris an kaddamar da mataki na hana ko wani irin wasan motsa jiki na karancin tsawon wata guda.

sourceString: On 11 March, Prime Minister Conte ordered stoppage of nearly all commercial activity except supermarkets and pharmacies.On 6 March, the Italian College of Anaesthesia, Analgesia, Resuscitation and Intensive Care (SIAARTI) published medical ethics recommendations regarding triage protocols that might be employed.
targetString: 11 ga watan Maris Firaiminista Conte ya bada umarni na a tsayar da kasuwanci banda shagunan dake siyar da kayan masarufi da shagunan magani. A 6 ga watan Maris Kwalejin magani ta wallafa ka'idoji na kiwon lafiya ciki ta bada shawara game da matakai da za'a iya aiki dasu.

sourceString: On 19 March, Italy overtook China as the country with the most coronavirus-related deaths in the world after reporting 3,405 fatalities from the pandemic.
targetString: A ranar 19 ga Maris, Italiya ta mamaye China a matsayin kasar da ta fi yawan kamuwa da cutar kwayar cuta a duniya bayan ta ba da rahoton mutane 3,405 daga annoban.

sourceString: On 22 March, it was reported that Russia had sent nine military planes with medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: A 22 ga watan Maris rahoto ya nuna cewa Russia ta tura jiragen yaki guda tara dauke da kayan kiwon lafiya zuwa kasar Italy.

sourceString: As of 5 April, there were 128,948 confirmed cases, 15,887 deaths, and 21,815 recoveries in Italy, with the majority of those cases occurring in the Lombardy region.
targetString: Ya zuwa ranar 5 ga Afrilu, akwai mutane 128,948 da aka tabbatar da cutar, 15,887 ne suka mutu, sannan 21,815 suka warke a Italiya, inda akasarin wadanda ke faruwa a yankin na Lombardy.

sourceString: A CNN report indicated that the combination of Italy's large elderly population and inability to test all who have the virus to date may be contributing to the high fatality rate.
targetString: A wani rahoton CNN ya nuna cewa hadi da yawan dattawa a kasar Italiya da ma rashin samun yin gwajin ke haifar da yawan mace-macen da ake samu har ila yau a kasar.

sourceString: The United Kingdom's response to the virus first emerged as one of the most relaxed of the affected countries, and until 18 March 2020, the British government did not impose any form of social distancing or mass quarantine measures on its citizens.
targetString: Martanin da Birtaniya ta dauka game da kwayar cutar ta fara bayyana a matsayin daya daga cikin annashuwa daga kasashen da cutar ta shafa, kuma har zuwa 18 Maris 2020, gwamnatin Burtaniya ba ta sanya wani nau'in walwala na jama'a ko matakan tsarewa a gida kan 'yan kasarta ba.

sourceString: As a result, the government received criticism for the perceived lack of pace and intensity in its response to concerns faced by the public.On 16 March, Prime Minister Boris Johnson made an announcement advising against all non-essential travel and social contact, suggesting people work from home where possible and avoid venues such as pubs, restaurants, and theatres.
targetString: A Sakamakon Haka, Gwanatin Ta Sha Suka Wajen Nuna Rashin Matsantawa Da Kula Akan Yanda Ta Dauki Damuwar Dake Alummar Ta. A Ranar 16 ga Watan Maris, Shugaban Majalissa Boris Johnson Ya Bada Sanarwa Akan Shawartar Tafiye-tafiye Marasa Dalili Da nesantar huldawa, Da bada shawarar Kowa Yayi Aiki Daga Gida In Da Hali Da Ma Gujewa Wuraren Shakatawa, Wurin Cin Abinci Dama Wajen Wassani.

sourceString: On 20 March, the government announced that all leisure establishments such as pubs and gyms were to close as soon as possible, and promised to pay up to 80% of workers' wages to a limit of £2,500 per month to prevent unemployment in the crisis.On 23 March, the Prime Minister announced tougher social distancing measures, banning gatherings of more than two people and restricting travel and outdoor activity to that deemed strictly necessary.
targetString: A ranar 20 ga Maris, gwamnati ta ba da sanarwar cewa dukkanin cibiyoyin shakatawa kamar mashaya da wararen motsa jiki za su rufe da wuri, kuma ta yi alkawarin biyan kusan kashi 80 na albashin ma'aikata zuwa iyakokin £ 2,500 ko wace wata don hana rashin aikin yi a rikicin. A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, Firayim Minista ya ba da sanarwar daukar matakai masu nisantar da jama'a, da hana hadarin mutane sama da biyu da kuma takaitawar tafiye-tafiye da ayyukan waje zuwa abin da ake zaton ya zama tilas.

sourceString: Unlike previous measures, these restrictions were enforceable by police through the issuing of fines and the dispersal of gatherings.
targetString: Ba kamar matakan baya ba, wannan dokokin na da tabbaci daga wajen yan sanda ta hanyar cin tara, dama wargata taruka.

sourceString: Most businesses were ordered to close, with exceptions for businesses deemed "essential", including supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, hardware shops, petrol stations, and garages.
targetString: An ba da umarnin rufewar mafi yawan kasuwanai, ban da keɓaɓɓun kasuwancin da aka ɗauka "mahimmanci", ciki har da manyan kantuna, kantin magani, bankuna, kantuna kayan masarufi, gidajen mai, da kuma gareji.

sourceString: On 20 January, the first known case of COVID-19 was confirmed in the Pacific Northwest state of Washington in a man who had returned from Wuhan on 15 January.
targetString: A ranar 20 ga Janairu, an tabbatar da sanannen COVID-19 a cikin jihar Pacific ta arewa maso yamma a cikin wani mutumin da ya dawo daga Wuhan a ranar 15 ga Janairu.

sourceString: The White House Coronavirus Task Force was established on 29 January.
targetString: An kafa rundunar tsaron Coronavirus ta White House a ranar 29 ga Janairu.

sourceString: On 31 January, the Trump administration declared a public health emergency, and placed restrictions on entry for travellers from China.
targetString: A ranar 31 ga watan Janairu, gwanati karkashin jagorancin Trump sun shellar matsalar lafiyar jama'a, da ma ƙuntatawa kan tafiye-tafiye na shigan kasa daga China.

sourceString: On 28 January 2020, the Center for Disease Control—the leading public health institute of the U.S. government—announced they had developed their own testing kit.
targetString: A ranar 28 ga watan Janairu 2020, hukumar dake dakile cututtuka masu yaduwa na kasar Amurka wanda kuma shine ke kan gaba a ma'aikatun lafiya na gwamnatin kasar ta sanar cewa an samar da nata na'urar gwaji.

sourceString: Despite doing so, the United States had a slow start in testing, which obscured the true extent of the outbreak at the time.
targetString: Duk da yin hakan, U.S. tana da jinkirin fara gwaji, wanda ya tona asirin gaskiyar cutar a lokacin.

sourceString: Testing was marred by defective test kits produced by the federal government in February, a lack of federal government approval for non-government test kits (by academia, companies and hospitals) until the end of February, and restrictive criteria for people to qualify for a test until early March (a doctor's order was required thereafter).
targetString: An lalata gwajin da kayan gwaji wadanda suka baci wanda gwamnatin tarayya ta samar a watan Fabrairu, rashin amincewar Gwamnatin Tarayya na kayan aikin gwajin da ba na gwamnati ba (ta makarantu, kamfanoni da asibitoci) har zuwa karshen Fabrairu, da kuma ka'idojin hana mutane damar cancanci gwaji har zuwa farkon Maris (kuma ana buƙatar umarnin likita bayan haka).

sourceString: By 27 February, The Washington Post reported fewer than 4,000 tests had been conducted in the United States.
targetString: A rananr 27 ga watan faburairu, Washington Post walafa rahoton gwajin mutum kasa da 4,000 wadanda aka yi a U.S.

sourceString: By 13 March, The Atlantic reported that less than 14,000 tests had been conducted.
targetString: Zuwa 13 Maris, Atlantika ya ba da rahoton cewa ba a gudanar da gwajin ƙasa da 14,000 ba.

sourceString: On 22 March, the Associated Press reported: "Many people who have symptoms and a doctor's order have waited hours or days for a test."After the first death in the United States was reported in Washington state on 29 February, Governor Jay Inslee declared a state of emergency, an action that was soon followed by other states.
targetString: A ranar 22 ga Watan Maris, gammayyar Yan Jarida wato Associated Press Sun Yi Rahoton: “Mutane Da Dama Wadanda Suna da alamun rashin lafiya sun jira sa'oi ko kwanaki Domin Gwajin Su daga umurnin likita. “Bayan mutuwar Farko Da Aka samu A Birnin Washington a ranar 29 ga Watan Faburairu, Gomna Jay Inslee Ya Kafa dokar Ta baci, Wanda Bisani Wasu jahohin Ma Suka Bi Sahu.

sourceString: Schools in the Seattle area cancelled classes on 3 March, and by mid-March, schools across the country were shutting down.On 6 March 2020, the United States was advised of projections for the impact of the new coronavirus on the country by a group of epidemiologists at Imperial College London.
targetString: Makarantun da ke yankin Seattle sun soke azuzuwan a ranar 3 Maris, kuma a tsakiyar Maris, makarantu a duk faɗin ƙasar suna rufe.On 6 Maris 2020, an shawarci Amurka game da tsinkaya game da cutar sabon coronavirus a cikin kasar daga wasu gungun masana masu cutar cututtukan dabbobi a Kwalejin Imperial London.

sourceString: On the same day President Trump signed the Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, which provided $8.3 billion in emergency funding for federal agencies to respond to the outbreak.
targetString: A rana daya shugaban kasa Trump ya rattaba hanun kan Dokar shirye-shiryen da Martani Amincewar Kari, wanda zai bada kudi kimanin biliyan $8.3 na kai agajin gaggawa ga hukumomin kasa domin martani ga barkewar cutan.

sourceString: Corporations imposed employee travel restrictions, cancelled conferences, and encouraged employees to work from home.
targetString: Masana'antu sun sanya dokar hana tafiye-tafiye da soke taruka, da ma sanya ma'aikata su yi aiki daga gida.

sourceString: Sports events and seasons were cancelled.On 11 March, Trump announced travel restrictions for most of Europe, excluding the United Kingdom, for 30 days, effective 13 March.
targetString: An soke al'amuran wasanni da yanayi.Da ranar 11 ga Maris, Trump ya ba da sanarwar hana tafiye-tafiye mafi yawan Turai, ban da Burtaniya, na kwanaki 30, mai tasiri 13 Maris.

sourceString: The following day, he expanded the restrictions to include the United Kingdom and Ireland.
targetString: Washe Gari Ya Fadada ƙuntatawa Zuwa kasar Ingila da ma ireland.

sourceString: On 13 March, he declared a national emergency, which made federal funds available to respond to the crisis.
targetString: Ya kaddamar da dokar ta baci a ranar 13 ga watan Maris wanda yin haka ya bada damar samun kudin takaita tsananin annobar.

sourceString: Beginning on 15 March, many businesses closed or reduced hours throughout the U.S. to try to reduce the spread of the virus.
targetString: Tun daga farkon 15 ga watan Maris yawanci kasuwanni sun rufe wasu kuma sun takaita lokutan budewa a fadin Amurka. Wannan na daga cikin matakin rage yaduwar kwayar cutar.

sourceString: By 17 March, the epidemic had been confirmed in all 50 states and in the District of Columbia.On 23 March, it was reported that New York City had 10,700 cases of the coronavirus, more than the total number of cases in South Korea.
targetString: Daga ranar 17 ga Watan Maris, an sami tabbacin Annoban a Jahohi Guda 50  da gundumar Colombiya. A ranar 23 ga Watan Maris, An Fidda Rahoton Cewa Birnin New York Na Da mutum 10,700 wadanda su Ke Dauke da Cutar coronavirus, Fiye Da Yawan lamban masun cutar a Koriya ta Kudu.

sourceString: On 25 March, the governor said that social distancing seemed to be working, as estimates of case doubling slowed from 2.0 days to 4.7 days.
targetString: A ranar 25 ga watan Maris, gwamnan ya ce an cimma nisantawar jama'a, yadda kimanin yaduwar cutan wanda ya hau yana fadiwa daga kwanaki 2.0 zuwa 4.7.

sourceString: As of 28 March, there were 32,308 confirmed cases in New York City, and 672 people had died from the virus.On 26 March, the United States was reported to have more confirmed coronavirus infection cases than any other country in the world, including China and Italy.As of 8 April, 400,335 cases have been confirmed in the United States, and 12,841 people have died.
targetString: A 28 ga wtaan Maris an tabbatar da kamuwar mutum 32,308 a birnin New York kuma mutum 672 sun mutu sanadiyar kwayar cutar. A 26 ga watan Maris rahoto ya nuna cewa Amurka ta samu karin yawan mutane da suka kamu da cutar coronavirus fiye da sauran kasashen duniya ciki har da China da Italy. A ranar 8 ga watan Afrilu an samu tabbacin wadanda suka kamu da cutar su 400,335 a Amurka kadai yayin kuma mutum 12,841 suka rasu.

sourceString: Per media reports on 30 March, U.S. President Trump has decided to extend social distancing guidelines until 30 April.
targetString: A gameda rahoton yan jarida na ranar 30 ga watan maris shuga Trump na anurka ya kara wa'adin dokar bada tazara zuwa 30 ga watan afrilu.

sourceString: On the same day, the USNS Comfort, a hospital ship with about 1000 beds, made anchor in New York.
targetString: A wannan ranar, USNS Comfort, jirgin ruwan asibiti da ke da gadaje 1000, ya zama jagora a New York.

sourceString: On 3 April, the U.S. had a record 884 deaths due to the coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
targetString: A ranar 3 ga watan Afrilu, Amurka ta sami rikodin mutuwar 884 sakamakon ƙwayar cuta a cikin sa'o'i 24.

sourceString: In the state of New York the cases have exceeded 100,000 people on 3 April.The White House has been criticized for downplaying the threat and controlling the messaging by directing health officials and scientists to coordinate public statements and publications related to the virus with the office of Vice-President Mike Pence.
targetString: A cikin jihar New York masun kamu da cutan sun ninka mutane 100,000 a ranar 3 ga Afrilu. An soki fadar White House saboda yin watsi da barazanar da kuma sarrafa sakon ta hanyar umarni jami'an kiwon lafiya da masana kimiyya don tsara bayanan jama'a da wallafe-wallafen da suka shafi cutar tare da ofishin Mataimakin Shugaban Mike Pence.

sourceString: Overall approval of Trump's management of the crisis has been polarized along partisan lines.
targetString: Gabaɗaya amincewar da gwamnatin Trump ta yi game da rikicin ya kasance an ba da izini ta hanyar ɓangarori daban-daban.

sourceString: Some U.S. officials and commentators criticized the U.S. reliance on importation of critical materials, including essential medical supplies, from China.
targetString: Wasu jami'ai da masu sharhi a U.S. sun yi sokin kasashen U.S. kan shigo da wasu kayan masarufi, gami da kayayyakin kiwon lafiya masu mahimmanci, daga kasar Sin.

sourceString: An analysis of air travel patterns was used to map and predict patterns of spread and was published in The Journal of Travel Medicine in mid-January 2020.
targetString: Anyi amfani da bayanai na tafiya ta hannyar iskar sama wajen samar da taswira tare da yin hasashe kan yaduwar ta. An wallafa hakan ne a mujallar “The journal of Travel Medicine” na watan Janairu na shekarar 2020.

sourceString: Based on 2018 information from the International Air Transport Association, Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Taipei had the largest volume of travellers from Wuhan.
targetString: Dangane da bayanin 2018 daga Kungiyar Duniya Haɗin Jigilar Jirgin Sama wato Internation Air Transport Association Bangkok, Hong Kong, Tokyo, da Taipei suna da mafi yawan matafiya daga Wuhan.

sourceString: Dubai, Sydney, and Melbourne were also reported as popular destinations for people travelling from Wuhan.
targetString: Dubai, Sydney, Da Melbourne Suma Suna Cikin Rahoton Da Ke Cewa Wajen Zuwa Mutanen Da Suka Taho Daga Wuhan.

sourceString: Bali was reported as least able among the 20 most popular destination cities in terms of preparedness, while cities in Australia were considered most able.Australia released its Emergency Response Plan for Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) on 7 February.
targetString: Birnin Bali shine mafi karanci ta fuskar shiryawa cikin jerin birane 20 da suka shahara a duniya yayin da birane a kasar Australia suka zamanto mafi shiryawa. Kasar ta fitar da tsarin bada agajin gaggawa na COVID-19 a ranar 7 ga watan Febreru.

sourceString: It stated that much was yet to be discovered about COVID-19, and that Australia would emphasize border control and communication in its response to the pandemic.
targetString: Ya ce har yanzu ba a gano abubuwa da yawa game da COVID-19 ba, kuma Australiya za ta jaddada ikon kan iyaka da sadarwa a cikin martanin ta game da cutar.

sourceString: On 21 March, a human biosecurity emergency was declared in Australia.
targetString: A ranar 21 ga watan Maris an kaddamar da mataki na gaggawa na tsaron halittu nan kasar Australia.

sourceString: Owing to the effective quarantine of public transport in Wuhan and Hubei, several countries have planned to evacuate their citizens and diplomatic staff from the area, primarily through chartered flights of the home nation, with Chinese authorities providing clearance.
targetString: Duk da samun tasirin kebe kai a motocin haya a wuhan da hubei, kasashe da dama sun shirya kwashe yan kasar su da ma'aikatan jakadancin su da ga bangaren, da fari ta hanyar shattar jiragen kasa, tare da hukumomin china su bada izinin fita.

sourceString: Canada, the United States, Japan, India, Sri Lanka, Australia, France, Argentina, Germany, and Thailand were among the first to plan the evacuation of their citizens.
targetString: Kanada da kasar amurka, japan, india, sri lanka, austrailia, fransa, argentina, jamus, da thailad su na daga cikin kasashen farko da suka tsara kwaso yan kasar su.

sourceString: Pakistan has said that it will not be evacuating any citizens from China.
targetString: Pakistan tace baza ta fitar da yan kasar ta dake nan kasar China.

sourceString: On 7 February, Brazil evacuated 34 Brazilians or family members in addition to four Poles, a Chinese person, and an Indian citizen.
targetString: A ranar 7 ga watan Fabrairu, Brazil ta kori 'yan kasar Brazil 34 ko kuma wasu dangin ban da ‘yan folan huɗu, mutumin China, da kuma Ba'indiya.

sourceString: The citizens of Poland, China, and India deplaned in Poland, where the Brazilian plane made a stopover before following its route to Brazil.
targetString: Yan kasar Poland da China da India sun sauka daga jirgi a nan kasar Poland yayin da jirgin su wanda asalin masaukin ta Brazil ne ya tsaya domin hutawa.

sourceString: Brazilian citizens who went to Wuhan were quarantined at a military base near Brasília.
targetString: ‘Yan Kasar Brazil Wanda Suka je Wuhan An Kebe Su A Wani Sansanin Soja Kusa Da Brasillia.

sourceString: On the same day, 215 Canadians (176 from the first plane, and 39 from a second plane chartered by the U.S. government) were evacuated from Wuhan to CFB Trenton to be quarantined for two weeks.
targetString: A Rana daya, mutanen Kanada guda 215 (176 daga Jirgin Farko, da 39 daga Jirgi na Biyu Wanda Gwamnatin U.S. Ta Yi Shattar sa) An Fitad da Su Daga Wuhan Zuwa Sansanin Trenton CFB Don Kebe Su zuwa Sati Biyu.

sourceString: On 11 February, another plane of 185 Canadians from Wuhan landed at CFB Trenton.
targetString: Ranar 11 ga watan Febreru wani jirgi dake dauke da yan kasar Canada guda 185 daga birnin Wuhan ya sauka a filin jirgi na CFB Trenton.

sourceString: Australian authorities evacuated 277 citizens on 3 and 4 February to the Christmas Island Detention Centre, which had been repurposed as a quarantine facility, where they remained for 14 days.
targetString: Ma'aikatan Australia sun kubutar da yan kasar su 277 tsakanin ranar 3 da 4 na watan February zuwa tsangayar Christmas Island wanda aka gyara musamman domin killace jama'a. an killace su har tsawon kwana 14.

sourceString: A New Zealand evacuation flight arrived in Auckland on 5 February; its passengers (including some from Australia and the Pacific) were quarantined at a naval base in Whangaparoa, north of Auckland.
targetString: Wani jirgin tashi daga New Zealand ya isa Auckland a ranar 5 ga Fabrairu; Fasinjojinsa (ciki har da wasu daga Australia da Pacific) an keɓe su a wata tashar jirgin ruwa a Whangaparoa, arewacin Auckland.

sourceString: On 15 February, the United States announced that it would evacuate Americans aboard the cruise ship Diamond Princess.
targetString: A ranar 15 ga watan Febreru gwamnatin Amurka ta sanar cewa zata kubutar da yan kasar ta hanyar babban jirgin ruwa na Diamond Princess.

sourceString: On 21 February, a plane carrying 129 Canadian passengers who had been evacuated from Diamond Princess landed in Trenton, Ontario.
targetString: A ranar 21 ga Fabrairu, wani jirgin sama dauke da fasinjojin Kanada 129 wadanda aka kora daga Diamond Princess sun sauka a Trenton, Ontario.

sourceString: In early March, the Indian government began evacuating its citizens from Iran.On 14 March a South African Airways aircraft chartered by the South African Government repatriated 112 South African citizens.
targetString: A Farkon Watan Maris, gwamnatin India Ta Fara Kwashe Yan Kasar Daga Iran. A 14 ga Watan Maris, Jirgin Afifrka ta Kudu Wanda Gwamnatin Afirka ta KuduS Tayi Shatta Ta Kwashe Mutanen Guda 112.

sourceString: Medical screening was performed prior to departure, and four South Africans who were showing signs of coronavirus were left behind to mitigate risk.
targetString: Anyi gwajin likita kafin tashi, kuma 'yan Afirka ta Kudu hudu wadanda ke nuna alamun cutar Coronavirus an bar su a baya don rage haɗarin.

sourceString: Only South Africans who tested negative were repatriated.
targetString: Yan kasar Afrika ta kudu da ba'a tabbatar da sun kamu da cutar aka mayar gida.

sourceString: Test results cleared all the South Africans, including the flight crew, pilots, hotel staff, police and soldiers involved in the humanitarian mission who, as a precautionary measure, all remained under observation and in quarantine for a 14-day period at The Ranch Resort.
targetString: Sakamakon gwaji ya share dukkan 'yan Afirka ta Kudu, ciki har da ma'aikatan jirgi, matukan jirgi, ma'aikatan otal, ‘yan sanda da sojoji da ke da hannu a aikin agaji wadanda, a matsayin matakin kariya, dukkansu suna cikin kulawa kuma suna kebewa na tsawon kwanaki 14 a Ranch Resort.

sourceString: On 20 March, the United States began to partially withdrawal its troops from Iraq due to the pandemic.
targetString: A ranar 20 ga Maris, Amurka ta fara cire dakarunta daga Iraki sakamakon kamuwa da annoban.

sourceString: On 5 February, the Chinese foreign ministry stated that 21 countries (including Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad and Tobago, Egypt, and Iran) had sent aid to China.
targetString: A ranar 5 ga Fabrairu, ma'aikatar harkokin waje ta kasar Sin ta bayyana cewa, kasashe 21 (ciki har da Belarus, Pakistan, Trinidad da Tobago, Egypt, da Iran) sun aika da taimako ga kasar Sin.

sourceString: Some Chinese students at American universities joined together to help send aid to virus-stricken parts of China, with a joint group in the greater Chicago area reportedly managing to send 50,000 N95 masks to hospitals in the Hubei province on 30 January.The humanitarian aid organization Direct Relief, in coordination with FedEx, sent 200,000 face masks along with other personal protective equipment, including gloves and gowns, by emergency airlift to the Wuhan Union Hospital by 30 January.
targetString: Wasu daliban Sinawa a jami'o'in Amurka sun hadu tare don taimakawa kan aika da taimako ga sassan kasar Sin da kwayar cutar ta kashe, tare da wata rukunin hadin gwiwa a cikin babban yankin Chicago da aka bayar da rahoton cewa za su tura mashin 50,000 na N95 zuwa asibitoci a lardin Hubei a ranar 30 ga Janairu. Kungiyar ba da agaji ta jin kai ta kai tsaye, tare da hadin gwiwar FedEx, sun tura kayan rufe fuska 200,000 tare da sauran kayan kariya na sirri, gami da safofin hannu da kayan kwalliya, ta hanyar saukar jiragen sama na gaggawa zuwa Asibitin Wuhan a ranar 30 ga Janairu.

sourceString: On 5 February, Bill and Melinda Gates announced a $100 million donation to the WHO to fund vaccine research and treatment efforts along with protecting "at-risk populations in Africa and South Asia".
targetString: A rananr 5 ga watan Faburairu, Bill da Melinda Gates sun sanar da tallafin millyan $100 ga WHO don samar da magani da waraka da ma kariya a alummar africa da kudancin asia wanda ke fuskantar barazanar cutar,

sourceString: Interaksyon reported that the Chinese government donated 200,000 masks to the Philippines on 6 February, after Senator Richard Gordon shipped 3.16 million masks to Wuhan.
targetString: Interaksyon Sun bada Rahoton Cewa Gwamnatin Sinawa Sun Kai Tallafin Kayan Kariyar Fuska Guda 200,000 Zuwa Ga Philippines A Ranar 6 ga Watan Faburairu, Bayan Sanata Richard Gordon Ya Kai Kayan Kariyar Fuska Guda Milliyan 3.16 Zuwa Wuhan.

sourceString: On 19 February, the Singapore Red Cross announced that it would send $2.26 million worth of aid to China.
targetString: A ranar 19 ga watan febrairu, kungiyar agaji ta Red Cross ta kasar Singapore ta ba da sanarwar cewa, za ta aika wa kasar Sin taimakon miliyan 2.26.

sourceString: Japan donated one million face masks to Wuhan, Turkey dispatched medical equipment, Russia sent more than 13 tonnes of medical supplies to Wuhan, Malaysia announced a donation of 18 million medical gloves to China, Germany delivered various medical supplies including 10,000 Hazmat suits, and the United States donated 17.8 tons of medical supplies to China and promised an additional $100 million in financial support to affected countries.After cases in China seemed to stabilize, the country has been sending aid to various nations hit by the pandemic.
targetString: Kasar Japan ta ba da abin rufe fuska miliyan daya ga Wuhan, Turkiyya ta tura kayan aikin likita, Rasha ta tura kayan agaji sama da tan 13 ga kasar Wuhan, Malaysia ta sanar da ba da gudummawar safar magunguna miliyan 18 ga kasar Sin, kasar ta Jamus ta ba da kayayyakin jinya daban-daban ciki har da rigar Hazmat 10,000, da kuma Kasar Amurka ta bayar da gudummawar tan ton 17.8 na kayayyakin kiwon lafiya ga kasar Sin, kuma ta yi alkawarin karin dala miliyan $100 na tallafin kudi ga kasashen da abin ya shafa.Bayan da yanayin da ake ciki a kasar Sin da alama ya daidaita, kasar tana ta aike da taimako zuwa ga kasashe daban-daban da suka kamu da annoban.

sourceString: In March, China, Cuba and Russia sent medical supplies and experts to help Italy deal with its coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: A Watan Maris, China, Cuba, Rasha Sun Tura Kayayyaki da Maiakatan Lafiya Don Taimakawa Italiya Shawo kan yaduwan Cutar Coronavirus.

sourceString: Businessman Jack Ma sent 1.1 million testing kits, 6 million face masks, and 60,000 protective suits to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia for distribution by the African Union.
targetString: Dan kasuwa Jack Ma ya aika da kayan gwaji miliyan 1.1, abin rufe fuska miliyan 6, da kuma rigar kariya 60,000 zuwa Addis Ababa, Habasha domin Kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta rarraba.

sourceString: He later sent 5,000 testing kits, 100,000 face masks and 5 ventilators to Panama.
targetString: Daga baya ya tura kayan gwaji 5000, abin rufe fuska 100,000 da kuma na'uran bada iska guda 5 zuwa Panama.

sourceString: Ma also donated medical supplies to Canada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkey, Georgia, and the Czech Republic expressed their concerns over Chinese-made masks and test kits.
targetString: Ma ya ba da gudummawar magunguna ga Kanada.The Netherlands, Spain, Turkiya, Georgia, da Czech Republic sun nuna damuwarsu game da abubuwan rufe fuska da na'urorin gwaji.

sourceString: For instance, Spain withdrew 58,000 Chinese-made coronavirus testing kits with an accuracy rate of just 30%, meanwhile, the Netherlands recalled 600,000 Chinese face masks which were defective.
targetString: Spain ta janye na'urar gwajin coronavirus guda 58,000 kirar kasar China wanda sahihancin ta ya tsaya 30%. Kasar Netherland kuma ta mayar da takunkumin fuska guda 600,000 masu aibu.

sourceString: Belgium recalled 100,000 unusable masks, thought to be from China, but were in fact from Colombia.
targetString: Belgium ta tuna abin rufe fuska 100,000 da ba a ayi amfani dasu ba , waɗanda ake tsammani sun fito ne daga China, amma a zahiri sun fito ne daga Kolombiya.

sourceString: On the other hand, Chinese aid has been well-received in parts of Latin America and Africa.On 2 April, the World Bank launched emergency support operations for developing countries.
targetString: A Wani Hanun, Tallafin chinese Ya Karbu Sosai A wasu yankunan Na Amurka masu Latin da ma Africa. A Ranar 2 ga Watan afrilu, Bankin Duniya ya Kaddamar Da aikin Tallafin Gaggawa ga Kasashe masu Tasowa.

sourceString: The WHO has commended the efforts of Chinese authorities in managing and containing the epidemic.
targetString: Hukumar ta WHO ta yaba da kokarin hukumomin kasar Sin wajen shawo kan shawo kan cutar.

sourceString: The WHO noted the contrast between the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak, where Chinese authorities were accused of secrecy that impeded prevention and containment efforts, and the current crisis where the central government "has provided regular updates to avoid panic ahead of Lunar New Year holidays".
targetString: WHO ta lura da sabanin da ke tsakanin barkewar SARS a 2002 - 2004, inda aka zargi hukumomin China da tona asirin da ke kawo cikas ga kokarin kare da hana kokarin, da rikicin yanzu inda gwamnatin tsakiya "ta samar da sabuntawa na yau da kullun don guje wa fargaba kafin hutun sabuwar shekara." .

sourceString: On 23 January, in reaction to the central authorities' decision to implement a transportation ban in Wuhan, WHO representative Gauden Galea remarked that while it was "certainly not a recommendation the WHO has made", it was also "a very important indication of the commitment to contain the epidemic in the place where it is most concentrated" and called it "unprecedented in public health history".On 30 January, following confirmation of human-to-human transmission outside China and the increase in the number of cases in other countries, the WHO declared the outbreak a Public Health Emergency of International Concern (PHEIC), the sixth PHEIC since the measure was first invoked during the 2009 swine flu pandemic.
targetString: A 23 ga watan Janairu a yayin da yake mayar da martani game da matakin hana safara da hukumomin tsakiya suka dauka jami'in hukumar WHO Gauden Galea ya furta cewa “ A gaskiya wannan bata daga cikin shawara da WHO ta bada” kuma “ Matakin ne babba na jawo bala'in inda tafi taruwa. yace hakan hatsari ne a tarihin kiwon lafiya. Bayan tabbatuwar kamuwa da cutar tsakina mutum da mutum a 30 ga watan Janairu a wajen China tare da karuwar adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar a sauran kasashe hukumar WHO ta kaddamar da barkewar a matsayin lamari na samar da lafiyar jama'a gaggawa wanda ta shafi kasashe, wannan shina kaddamarwa na shida bayan na farkon da ya faru yayin da aka samu barkewar annobar cutar swine Flu na shakarar 2009.

sourceString: WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom said that the PHEIC was due to "the risk of global spread, especially to low- and middle-income countries without robust health systems.
targetString: Babban direkta na hukumar WHO Tedros Adhanom yace an kaddamar da ita a matsayin bayar da lafiya ga jama'a na gaggawa wanda ta shafi kasashe bisa ga illar yaduwar ta musamman ga kasashe masu karancin tattalin arziki da kuma cibiyoyi neman lafiya nagari.

sourceString: In response to the implementations of travel restrictions, Tedros stated that "there is no reason for measures that unnecessarily interfere with international travel and trade" and that the "WHO doesn't recommend limiting trade and movement."
targetString: Cikin martanin sa game da matakin takaita tafiya Tedros ya sanar cewa “ Babu bukatar kaddamar da mataki wanda ke haifar da katsalanda da kasuwanci da tafiya kasashen waje. Ya kuma kara da cewa hukumar WHO bata bada shawarar tak, aita kasuwanci da kuma zirga-zirga.

sourceString: On 5 February, the WHO appealed to the global community for a $675 million contribution to fund strategic preparedness in low-income countries, citing the urgency to support those countries which "do not have the systems in place to detect people who have contracted the virus, even if it were to emerge".
targetString: A ranar 5 ga Fabrairu, Hukumar ta WHO ta yi kira ga kasashen duniya kan dala miliyan $675 don ba da gudummawar shirin a kasashe masu karamin tatalin arziki, tare da yin kira da a gaggauta tallafawa wadancan kasashen da “ba su da tsarin a wurin don gano mutanen da suka kamu da kwayar cutar , ko da kuwa zai fito ne”.

sourceString: Tedros further made statements declaring that "we are only as strong as our weakest link" and urged the international community to "invest today or pay more later".On 11 February, the WHO in a press conference established COVID-19 as the name of the disease.
targetString: Tedros ya kara bayyanawa cewa “muna da karfi gwargwadon mahadi mafi rauni”, tare da yin kira ga sauran kasashen duniya da su dauki na gaggawa domin magance sakamako mara dadi nan gaba. A ranar 11 ga watan Febreru hukumar WHO a wata zantarwa da tayi da manema labarai ta kaddamar da COVID-19 a matsayin sunan cutar.

sourceString: On the same day, Tedros stated that UN Secretary-General António Guterres had agreed to provide the "power of the entire UN system in the response".
targetString: A rana daya, Tedros ya sanar da cewa babban Sakataren majalissar dinkin duniya UN Antonio Gueterres ya yarda zai samar da “ikon dukkan tsarin UN a cikin martani”.

sourceString: A UN Crisis Management Team was activated as a result, allowing coordination of the entire United Nations response, which the WHO states will allow them to "focus on the health response while the other agencies can bring their expertise to bear on the wider social, economic and developmental implications of the outbreak".
targetString: An tayar da Kwamitin Gudanar da Rikicin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya wato UN Crisis Management Team a sakamakon, an ba da izinin daidaitawar amsan dukkan Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, wanda ƙasashen WHO za su ba su damar "mai da hankali kan amsar kiwon lafiya yayin da sauran hukumomin za su iya kawo ƙwarewar su don tallafawa mafi yawan zamantakewar al'umma, tattalin arziki, da cigaban nuna yada yaduwar annobar ta ke ".

sourceString: On 14 February, a WHO-led Joint Mission Team with China was activated to provide international and WHO experts on the ground in China to assist in the domestic management and evaluate "the severity and the transmissibility of the disease" by hosting workshops and meetings with key national-level institutions and to conduct field visits to assess the "impact of response activities at provincial and county levels, including urban and rural settings".On 25 February, the WHO declared that "the world should do more to prepare for a possible coronavirus pandemic," stating that while it was still too early to call it a pandemic, countries should nonetheless be "in a phase of preparedness".
targetString: A anar 14 ga Watan Faburairu, wani Gammayar Kungiyar WHO MaI Jagoranci Da Wasu Yan China Aka Fitar Don Samar Da Kwarewa A Kasar China Domin Tallafin Cikun gida Na Gano “Tsananin da Ma Yaduwar Cutar” Ta Hanyar Daukan nauyin Taruka da Koyarwa Tare Da Hukumomin Kasa Na Mussaman Da kuma Su Ziyarci Alumma Don Tabatar da “ayukan agaji Da Ke Gudana a Yankunan Da Matakin Kauyuka, Daga Birni har ma da karkara a ranar”. A ranar 25 ga Watan faburairu, WHO Ta Sanar Cewa “Duniya Ta kokari ta Shirya ga Barkewar Amobar Coronavirus mai yiwuwa,” Da cewa tun Da Cutar Ba ta kai matakin Annoba Ba, Amman Kasashe “su Fara Shiri Don Kar Ko Ta Baci”.

sourceString: In response to a developing outbreak in Iran, the WHO sent a Joint Mission Team there to assess the situation.On 28 February, WHO officials said that the coronavirus threat assessment at the global level would be raised from "high" to "very high", its highest level of alert and risk assessment.
targetString: Don kawo karshen barkewar cutar yayin da take yaduwa hukumar WHO ta tuwa tawaga ta musamman domin yin duba. A 28 ga watan Febreru jami'an WHO sun bayyana cewa hadarin coronavirus idan aka makala ta ga matakin duniya zata haura matuka haka zai zamanto kololuwar halin takatsantsan.

sourceString: Mike Ryan, executive director of the WHO's health emergencies program, warned in a statement that "This is a reality check for every government on the planet: Wake up.
targetString: Mike Ryan, darektan zartarwa na shirin kiwon lafiya na WHO, ya yi gargadin a cikin wata sanarwa cewa, "Wannan bincike ne na gaskiya ga kowace gwamnati a duniyar nan: Farka.

sourceString: This virus may be on its way and you need to be ready," urging that the right response measures could help the world avoid "the worst of it".
targetString: Wannan kwayar cutar na iya kasancewa a kan hanyarta kuma kuna buƙatar kasancewa a shirye, "suna kira cewa matakan da suka dace na iya taimakawa duniya su guji" mafi munin ta ".

sourceString: Ryan further stated that the current data did not warrant public health officials to declare a global pandemic, saying that such a declaration would mean "we're essentially accepting that every human on the planet will be exposed to that virus."
targetString: Ryan Ya cigaba da Cewa Wannan Bayanai Na Yanzu Bai ba wa Jami'an kiwon lafiya Su Tabbatar Da Cutar A Matsayin Annoba A Duniya ba, Cewa Wannan sanarwa Na Nufin “musamman muna yarda cewa ko wane mutun a Duniya Na Fuskantar Barazanar Daukar Wannan Cuta”.

sourceString: On 11 March, the WHO declared the coronavirus outbreak a pandemic.
targetString: WHO ta kaddamar da barkewar cutar Korona a matsayin annoba a ranar 11 ga watan Maris.

sourceString: The Director-General said that the WHO was "deeply concerned both by the alarming levels of spread and severity, and by the alarming levels of inaction".The WHO has faced significant criticism for what is seen as inadequate handling of the pandemic, including the late declaration of a public health emergency and the classification of the virus as a pandemic.
targetString: Babban darektan ya ce hukumar ta WHO ta damu matuka game da matakan yaduwar cutar da kuma tsananin rauni, da kuma matakan rashin tsaro ". WHO ta fuskanci babban zargi game da abin da ake gani da rashin isasshen maganin cutar, ciki har da Bayanin sanarwar gaggawa ta lafiyar jama'a da kuma rarrabuwa da kwayar cutar a matsayin annoba.

sourceString: The backlash included a petition for the WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom to tender his resignation, signed by 733,000 people as of 6 April.
targetString: Wadanda suka gabatar da kara sun hada da wata takarda kai tsaye ga babban daraktan hukumar ta WHO Tedros Adhanom don gabatar da murabus din nasa, wanda mutane 733,000 suka sanya hannu tun daga ranar 6 ga Afrilu.

sourceString: On 26 March 2020, dozens of UN human rights experts emphasized respecting the rights of every individual during the COVID-19 pandemic.
targetString: Ranar 26 ga watan Maris 2020, da yawa daga cikin kwararrun Majalisar Dinkin Duniya suka jaddada mutunta hakkin kowane mutum lokacin annoban COVID-19.

sourceString: The expert group stated that everyone is entitled to life-saving interventions and the government holds this responsibility.
targetString: kungiyyar masaman ta ce kowa na da damar matakan kare rayuwar shi kuma gwanati za ta rike wannan da huja.

sourceString: The group stressed that the lack of resources or health insurance should never serve as a justification for discrimination against a specific group.
targetString: Kungiyar ta jaddada cewa rashin abubuwa na bukata ko na insoran lafiya bai kamata ya zamanto sabbabi wajen aibanta wasu tsirarrun kungiya ba.

sourceString: The experts underscored that every individual has the right to health, including people with disabilities, belonging to minority groups, older people, internally displaced people, the homeless, those living in extremely poor conditions, people in detention, as well as refugees and other unspecified groups in need of government support.
targetString: Kwararru sun bayyana cewa ko wani dan Adam na da yancin samun lafiyar jiki kama daga nakasaasu zuwa gajiyayyu da mara sa hali da masu gudun hijira da wadanda ke garkame da sauran makamacin mutane dake bukatar gudumawa daga gwamnati.

sourceString: International governmental organizations are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.
targetString: Kungiyoyin gwamnatocin duniya suna magance tasirin tattalin arziki da zamantakewar rikicin COVID-19.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Kungiyar haddin da bunkasa tattalin arziki ta kaddamar da tsari na fitar da kayyataccen labari cikin lokaci akan matakai da kuma matsaya tare da shawarwari daga kasashen duniya.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Daga manufofi don karfafa tsarin kiwon lafiya da tattalin arzikin duniya zuwa magance tasirin ƙulli da ƙuntatawa akan tafiye-tafiye, ƙungiyar dijital ta haɗa da Policyabilar Siyasar Countryasa, da nufin taimakawa ƙasashe suyi koyo daga juna da kuma sauƙaƙa matakan daidaitawa na duniya game da kalubalan coronavirus.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Gwamnatin China Ta Sha suka daga U.S., Da Ministan Harkokin Kasar ingila Micheal Gove, Da Shugaban Kasar Brazil Eduardo Bolsonaro Dan Jair Bolsonnaro Yanda Suka Dauki Annobar, wanda ta barke a Kasar China a lardin Hubei.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Da yawa daga cikin shugabannin lardi na jam'iyyar kwaminis ta kasar Sin(CPC) an kore su saboda yadda suke gudanar da ayyukanta a yankin tsakiyar kasar Sin, wata alama ce ta nuna rashin gamsuwa da yadda aka kafa tsarin siyasa game da barkewar annobar a yankunan.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Wasu masu sharhi sun gani ewa wannan yunkuri an yi shi ne domin kare sakatare janar na jam'iyyar kwaminis ta Sin Xi Jinping daga fushin jama'a game da barkewar cutar Coronavirus.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Wasu Ma'aikata Sinawa, Kamar Zhao Lijian SuN Ki Karbar Lamarin Bullar Cutar Corona A Wuhan, A Biyewa Rubuce-rubucen Da Akayi Akan COVID-19 Daya Fara A U.S Ko Italiya.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Gwamnatin U.S. ta Donald Trump ta kira coronavirus a matsayin "kwayar cutar China" ko "virus ta Wuhan" tana mai cewa "takukunmi ya habaka wata kwayar cuta wacce ta zama yanzu ta zama annoba ta duniya", wanda a yayin haka wasu masu sukar lamiri ke suka a matsayin wariyar launin fata da "nisan[tawa] daga gazawar gwamnatin sa na shawo kan cutar".

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Gidan watsa labarai na The Daily Beast ta kama tashar telibijin gwamnatin Amurka na musamman yayyin da take bayyana tsarin da za'a dauka wadda ta asalin daga majalisar tsaro na kasar. Ta ruwaito daya daga cikin tsarin da cewa “ Alkaluma sun karkata zuwa kasar China”.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: An fada mana da muyi kokarin yada wannan sako a ko wata hanya, ciki harda taron manema labarai, fita gida talabijan, tarukan siyasa, dokokin waje kuma bloomberg na da yakinin china na kokarin tura tallafi kasashen da cutar tayi musu illa na daga cikin turin zuzzuta domin rinjayin alamuran duniya.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: shugaban hukumar dokokin kasashen nahiyar Turai Josep Borell ya yi gargadin cewa akwai siyasay yanki mai hade da kokawa wajen samun rinjaye ta hanyar murdiyya da salon siyasa na jan hankali.

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borrel Ya Kara Da Cewa China Na Kokarin Tura Sakon Cewa ba Kamar Amurka, Ita Amintacciyar Abokiya Ce Wanda Za A Iya Dogaro Da.

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: China na kira da amurka da su daga dokokin da aka sa wa syria da venezuela da iran, tare da tura tallafi zuwa kasashen biyun farko.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: U.S. ta toshe Tallafin Jack Ma Na Kariyar Fuska 100,000 Zuwa Cuba Da Dokokin US Na 3 Ga Watan Afrilu.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: An zargi hukumomin US Da Karkata Tallafin Wasu Kasashen Zuwa Kasar Su.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Kuma an samu sabani game da abin rufe fuska tsakanin wasu kasashe , kamar su Jamus, Austria da Switzerland; da Jamhuriyar Czech da Italiya.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Kari akan haka, Turkiyya ta kwace daruruwan na'aurorin ba da iska wadanda za a kai su a kasar Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: A farkon watan Maris gwamnatin kasar Italy ta kalubalanci majalisar kasashen turai da nuna rashin kulawa yayin da cutar ta bazu a kasar.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, jakadan Italiya ga EU, ya ce "China ce kawai ta mayar da martani baki daya.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Tabbas, wannan ba alama ce mai kyau ba ta hadin kan Turai. "

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: A ranar 22 ga watan Maris, bayan kiran waya tare da Firayim Ministan Italiya Giuseppe Conte, shugaban Rasha Vladimir Putin ya shirya sojojin Rasha don aika da magungunan sojoji, motocin yaƙi na musamman da sauran kayan aikin likitanci zuwa Italiya.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Jaridar La Stampa ta Italiya ta buga wani muhimmin "matattarar siyasa" da ke cewa kashi 80 na taimakon Rasha “ba su da wani amfani ko amfani ga Italiya”.

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Tushen ya zargi Rasha da goyon bayan siyasar yanki da diflomasiya wato “geopolitical and diplomatic” mai barna matuka.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Shugaban Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, da Ministan Harkokin Wajen Italiya Luigi Di Maio sun yi watsi da rahotannin kafafen yada labarai kuma sun nuna godiyan su.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Hakanan Rasha ta aika da jirgin sama mai daukar kaya tare da taimakon likita zuwa Amurka.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Kakaki mai maganan Kremiln wato Dmitry Peskov yace yayinda ake taimakawa abokan aiki zuwa U.S., [putin] ya na daukar cewa idan masana'antar kayayyakin asibiti a US sun sami karfi, za su iya mayar da gurbi in ta zama tilas.

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Wanan shirin NATO "Defender 2020" na ayyukan soja a Jamus, Poland, da kuma kasashen Baltic, mafi girman aikin yakin NATO tun karshen yakin Yaki mai Sanyi, za a gudanar da shi kan rage girman.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Babban Sakataren kamfe dake wayar da kai wajen hana amfani da nukuliya Kate Hudson ta soki wasu matakai da aka dauka a 2020. tana mai cewa “rikicin rashin lafiyar jama'a dake wakan ya saba ma rayukan dakarun Amurka da na sauran kasashen nahiyar turai haka zalika ta saba ma yan garin kasar da dakarun ke aiki. “ Barkewar cutar ya shafi gwamnatin Iran matuka yayin da aka samu yan majalisa sama da ashirin da hudu tare da yan siyasa na yanzu da tsofaffi da suka kamu.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Shugaban kasar Iran Hassan Rouhani ya rubuta wata wasika ta jama'a ga shugabannin duniya da ke neman taimako a ranar 14 ga Maris 2020, yana mai cewa kasarsa tana iya bakin kokarinta don yakar barkewar sakamakon rashin damar zuwa kasuwannin duniya sakamakon takunkumin da Amurka ta kakaba wa Iran. ya haifar da kira ga U.S. ta aiwatar da tsarin zamantakewar yau da kullun a wasu ƙasashe masu arziki, game da kula da lafiyar duniya, kula da yara baki ɗaya, biyan tafiyar hutun iyali, da kuma mafi bada kudaden girma lafiyar jama'a.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Masana siyasa na yan wani tunani akan samun nasarar Donald Trump a zabukan 2020 na shugaban kasa, huldar jakadanci da ke tsakanin japan da korea ta kudu ya baci sabosa wannan annoba.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Koriya ta Kudu ta soki "kokarin kwantar da hankali Japan" bayan Japan ta ba da sanarwar duk wanda ya fito daga Koriya ta Kudu za a sanya shi cikin kebewa na makwanni biyu a wuraren da gwamnati ta tsara.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Kawunan jama'a ya rabu a kasar Korea ta kudu yayin da shugaba Moon Jae-in ke bada amsar barkewar cutar.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Yan koriya da yawa sun sanya hannu kan takarda ko dai suna kiran a tsige Moon saboda abin da suka ce gwamnati ne ke miskilanci barkewar, ko yabon amasar sa. Annoban ya sa kasashe da yawa su kafa dokar ta-baci cikin gaggawa domin amsawa.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Wasu masu sharhi sun bayyana damuwar cewa hakan na iya ba gwamnatoci damar karfafa ikonsu.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: A Hungary, Majalissar Dokokin Ta Bada Dama Cewa Shugaban Majalissar Viktor Orban, Da Yayi Shugabanci Na Doka Na Dindindin, ya Bawa Majalissar Hutu Da Ma Zabuka Kuma A Hukunta Wanda Ke Yada Jita-jita Akan Cutar Dama Yanda Gwanati Ke Daukar Matakan Fadan.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Barkewar Cutar Coronavirus Yasha Korafi Da Dama Akan Yankewar Kaya, Farawa Daga Karuwar Yawan Bukatar Kayakin Fada Da Cutar A Duniya, Siyayya Na Rashin Zato, Dama Rashin Daidaito A Tafiyar Da Kamfanoni Da Ma Hada-hada.

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Hukumar Kula da Abinci da Magunguna ta U.S. ta ba da gargadi game da karancin magunguna da kayayyakin asibiti sakamakon karuwar nema daga masun amfani da su don damuwar rashin rabawa

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Yawancin yankuna sun shaida sayan tsoro wanda ya haifar karewar kayayyakin shaguna irin su abinci, takarda bayan gida, da ruwan kwalba, tare da haifar da karancin kowowa.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Tun ba yau ba fannin fasaha take jan hankali akan jinkiri na shigowar kayan fasaha daga kasashen ketare.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: A cewar babban darecta na WHO Tedros Adhanom, bukatar kayan aikin kariya na mutum ya haura kashi 100.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Bukatar ta sanya karin farashi sama da kaso aishirin daga ainahin farashin kuma hakan ya sanya an samu jinkiri a wajen kawo kayakin kiwon lafiya na tsawon wata hudu zuwa shida.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Ya Kuma Kawo Karancin Kayan Kariya A Duniya, Da Gargadin WHO cewa Ma'aikatan Kiwon Lafiya Na Fuskantar Barazana A Bangaren Aikin Su A Sanadiyyar.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Daga bisani barkewar annobar a kasar Autralia ya baiwa yan kasuwar Daigou damar siyar da kayayyakin Australia zuwa China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Ayyukan sun haifar da ƙarancin tsarin samar da jarirai a wasu manyan kantunan kuma daga baya gwamnatin Ostireliya ta dakatar da ita.Domin jin ƙarancin cutar ta COVID-19 a arewacin Italiya da yankin Wuhan, da kuma yawan bukatar kayayyakin abinci, ɓangarorin biyu suna da an kare shi daga matsanancin karancin abinci.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Matakan China da Italiya akan boye kayan amfani na sosai ya yi nasara, an rage rashin kayan abinci da akayi kintaci a nahiyar turai da yankin amurka ta arewa.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: A arewacin Italy duk da tasirin noma da take dashi ba'a taba samun raguwar amfanin gona ba sai dai farashi na iya haurawa a bisa tsarin hukumomi na ma'aikata.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Rashin wajen ajiyar abinci yar matala ce wanda a ka samu na dan wani lokaci har ma a wuhan, sanda gwantin chinese ta fitar da ajiyar ta na aladu don samun kayan gina jiki ga daukacin alummar.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Wasu makamantan dokokin na nan a Italiya masu bukatar ajiyar abinci sabo da ko ta kwana.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Ɓarna ga tattalin Arzikin Duniya an Ji Shi A China: Bisa ga Rahoton Yan Jarida na 16 ga Watan Maris, Cewar Tattalin arzikin China Ya Jijiga A Watanni biyu Na Farkon 2020 saboda Matakan Da Gwamnati Ta Dauka Don Shawo Kan Cutar Cinnikayya Kanana Sun fadi Zuwa Kashi 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Kasancewar kasar Sin babbar kasa ce kuma ta masana'antar samar da kayayyaki, ana ganin bullar cutar za ta iya zama babbar barazana ga tattalin arzikin duniya.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Ma'aikaciya a sashin basira ta jaridar Economist Agathe Demarais tayi hasashe cewa kasuwanni zasu kasance a cikin hali na rashin tabbas har sai an samu bulowar sakamako mai nuna habbaka.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: A watan Janairu na 2020, wasu manazarta sun kiyasta cewa fadiwar tattalin arziki domin annobar kan ci gaban duniya zata iya fi barkewar SARS daga 2002 zuwa 2004.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Wani kintaci na wani kwarare a jami'ar washington na st louis yace illar hada-hada kimanin billiyan $300 ka iya samuwa a cikin shekara biyu.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Rahotanni sun nuna cewa Majlisar OPEC tayi jan jiki bayan darewar farashin man fetur sakamakon karancin bukata daga kasar China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Hanun jari na duniya ya fadi a ranar 24 ga watan Faburairu saboda yawan masu cutar covid-19 a wajen kasar china.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: A ranar 27 ga watan Fabrairu, saboda damuwa game da barkewar cutar coronavirus, U.S. bayanin jari wanda ya hada da NASDAQ-100, S&P 500 Index, da Matsayin Masana'antu na Dow Jones sun ba da sanarwar faduwarsu tun daga 2008, yayin da Dow ke faduwa da maki 1,191, mafi girma. kwana daya kasa tun lokacin da aka fara rikicin kudi na 2007-08.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Jerin guda uku sun kawo karshe a makon da ya gabata inda ta samu fiye da 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: A 28 ga watan Febreru ma'aunin GmbH ta gasgata hasashen daukar kasada na kasar China amma bata sauya mummunar fahimta da ake mata.
