sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Hannun jari ya sha kayi kuma saboda tsoron cutar coronavirus, mafi munin faduwar shine na ranar 16 ga watan Maris.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Dayawa na duban yiwuwar rushewan tattalin arziki.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Masani a fannin tattalin arziki Mohammed EL-Erian ya yaba ma babban bankunan kasa da na jihohi bisa ga matakin gaggawa da suka dauka cikin lokaci.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Manyan banki na tsakiya suna yin hanzari da sauri fiye da yadda suka yi wa faduwar tattalin arzikin 2008.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Yawon shakatawa na fuskantar kalubale saboda hana shiga da fita,rufe wajen alamuran yau da kullum da ma takaita tafiye-tafiye don daukan hankali, da shawarar gwamnati akan ko wace irin tafiye-tafiye a duniya.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: daga cikin sakamakon barkewar manyan kamfanonin jirgin sama sun dakatar da safara kasancewa bukatu sun ragu. Cikin manyan kamfonin da lamarin ya shafa akwai British Airways da China Eastern Airlines da Qantas ita kuma kamfanin Flybe dake nan Birtaniya ta tashi daga aiki.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Tasirin ta ga fanin safara ta hanya ruwa ta haura zuwa mataki wanda ba'a taba samu ba a fannin

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Yawancin tashoshin Jirgin Kasa Da Na Jiragen ruwa su Ma Rufe Su.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Aukuwar annobar ta faru ne lokaci guda da bikin Chunyun. Wato bikin hutu na farin cikin shiga sabuwar shekara.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Da dama daga cikin gwamnatocin jihohi da na yanki sun soke abubuwa da yawa da suka hada da taron jama'a, wadanda suka hada da bikin Sabuwar shekara, tare da kamfanoni masu zaman kansu su rufe shagunansu da wuraren shakatawa irin su Hong Kong Disneyland da Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: An rufe galibin wuraren murnar sabuwar shekara da na baki masu yawon bude ido domin hana taron jama'a. Cikin wuraren da matakin ya shafa akwai Forbidden city dake nan Beijing da kuma wuraren bauta na gargajiya.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: A cikin 24 daga cikin lardi da alkarya da yankuna 31 dake kasar China hukuma ta tsawaita hutun sabuwar shekar zuwa ranar 10 ga wata Febreru tare da umurtan masa'antu kada su bude har sai wannan ranar.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Wadanan yankuna sun wakilta kashi 80% na tattalin arziki kasa wato GDP da cinikin waje kashi 90%.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong sun daukaka matsayin mayar da martanin akan cutar su mai yadduwa ga mafi girma da kuma ayyana dokar ta-baci, rufe makarantu har zuwa Maris da kuma soke bikin sabuwar shekarar su.ya shafi sashin ciniki a duniya baki daya, tare da raguwar yawan sa'o'in aikin kanti ko kuma rufewa na wani dan lokaci.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Ziyara ga kananan yan kasuwa ta ragu a Turai da yanki Amurka na Latin ga kashi 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: ‘Yan kasuwan yankin Amurka ta Arewa da Gabas ta Tsakiya sun ga fadiwa kashi 50-60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Hakan ya jawo raguwar cinkoson masu yawo da kafa a wuraren siyar da siyarwa daga 33% zuwa 43% tsakanin Febreru da Maris.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Ma'aikata kantin sayar da kayayyaki a duk duniya sun sanya karin matakan, irin wannan karuwar tsafta, shigar da na'urar sikirin na daskararru don duba zafin jiki na masu siyayya, da kuma soke abubuwan da suka faru.Bayan da kidayar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta Latin Amurka ta kiyasta cewa, annobar ta barke tsakanin mutane miliyan 14 zuwa 22 cikin matsanancin talauci a Latin Amurka fiye da yadda za ta kasance a wannan yanayin in ba tare da cutar ba.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: A watan Janairu da Fabrairu na 2020, a yayin da cutar ta bulla a Wuhan, mutane miliyan 5 na kasar Sin sun rasa rayyukansu.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Yawancin ma'aikatan kasar Sin da ke ƙaura daga ƙauyuka kusan milliyan 300 sun ƙawance a gida a cikin lardunan ko kuma sun shiga tarko a lardin Hubei.A cikin Maris 2020, fiye da Amurkawa miliyan 10 suka rasa ayyukansu kuma sun nemi taimakon gwamnati.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Barkewar cutar Coronavirus na iya kashe ayyuka miliyan 47 a U.S. kuma yawan marasa aikin na iya kaiwa kashi 32%, in ji alkalumman da Bankin Reserve na St. Louis. kullewar a Indiya ya sanya dubun-dubatar bakin haure 'yan kasar Indiya (wadanda aka biya su ta hanyar albashi na yau da kullun) marasa aikin yi.The binciken daga Cibiyar Angus Reid ta gano cewa 44% na gidaje na Kanada sun sami wasu nau'in rashin aikin yi. Kusan ma'aikata 900,000 suka rasa ayyukansu a Spain tun lokacin da suka shiga cikin yanayin zaman wuri daya a tsakiyar Maris 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: A tsakiyar watan Maris ma'ikata kasar Faransa miliyan 4 suga shigar da takardar neman tallafi na rashin samun aiki na takaitaccen lokaci haka kuma mai'katan Birtaniya Miliyan 1 sun nemi tallafi daga gwamnati. Ma'aikata dab da rabbin miliyan a kasar Jamus sun shigar da ma'aikatan su ga tsarin aiki cikin karamin lokaci wanda ke da goyon bayan gwamnati kuma wanda aka fi sani da Kurzarbeit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Faransa da Burtaniya sun karɓi tsarin aikin na ɗan gajeren lokaci na Jamus.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Bangaren Aladun gargajiyya dama na gado Sun Fuskanci kalubale a wannan annobar, ya Taba alamuran tafiyyar da Hukumar dama mutane Da Maaikata dama masu Zaman Kansu a duniya.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Kungiyoyin al'adu sun yunkura wajen tallafawa kamar yadda suka saba wajen samar asalin al'adar al'umma da kuma kare lafiyar ma'aikata da jama'ar gari tare da taimakawa yan nishadi iya bakin gwargwado.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: A Maris 2020, a Duniya Da kewaye, gidajen Tarihi, dakunan karatu, Dandalin wassani, Da Wajen Bukukuwa na Gargajiyya, An Rufe Su Dindindin Da Alamuran Su Kamar nishadi da Ma Bikin Wasu An Soke Zwasu kuma An Dage.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: A cikin martanin da aka samu akwai kokarin da ake yi na samar da wasu ayyukan ta hanyar dandamali na dijital. Wani sabo da ke hanzarta kawo karshen cutar shi ne soke ayyukan addini, manyan bukukuwan wasanni, da sauran wasannin zamantakewa, kamar bikin kida da kide-kide da tarukan fasaha, da kuma wasan nunan kayayyakin sa jiki.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Masana'antar wassani finafinai na fuskantar rushewa, Vatican ya sanar da makon addini don kiblacewa a Rome, wanda ya faru a makon da ya wuce a kakar ibada na kiristocin lent, da cewar an soke shi.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Da yawa daga cikin dattijan sun ba da shawarar tsofaffi Kiristoci su zauna a gida maimakon halartar Mass a ranar Lahadi; wasu majami'u suna sujada ta hanyar rediyo, bidiyon-take na kan layi ko talabijin yayin da wasu suke ba da wata sujadar zaman cikin mota.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Tare da Darikar Katolika ta Rome ta Rome tana rufe majami'unta da wuraren ibadarta da kuma filin St. Peter's Square da maharan kiristocin suka yi, sauran kungiyoyin addini ma sun soke aiyuka da iyakance taron jama'ar majami'u, masallatai, majami'u, gidajen ibada da gurdwara.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Ma'aikatar lafiya ta Iran ta sanar da soke sallar Juma'a yankunan da annobar ta shafa da wuraren bautar da abin ya shafa daga baya, yayin da Saudi Arabiya ta hana shigowa da mahajjata kasashen waje da kuma mazaunan ta zuwa wuraren tsarkakakku a Makka da Madina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Annobar ta haifar da batawa mafi girma ga kalandar wasanni ta duniya tun bayan Yaƙin Duniya na biyu.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: An soke ko dage mafi yawan wassani na guje-guje, ciki ma harda, kakar gasar cin kofin masu nasara na UEFA, 2019-20, kakar wassani ta firemiar 2019-20, UEFA euro 2020, 2019-20 kakar NBA, da kakar NHL 2019-20.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Barkewar fashewar tsare-tsaren shirya wasannin Olympics na lokacin zafi na 2020, wanda aka shirya farawa a karshen Yuli; Kwamitin wasannin Olympic na kasa da kasa ya sanar a ranar 24 ga Maris cewa "za a sake shirya bikin har zuwa ranar 2020 amma ba za a wuce lokacin bazara 2021 ba". Casino da sauran wuraren wasannin caca a duk duniya sun rufe kuma an sake dakatar da gasar wasannin na cikin gida ko dai an dakatar da su.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Wannan ya haifar da komawar masu caca yanar giza inda kuma shafukar caca ke karuwa da yawan sabbin ma'abota. Lamarin dai ya shafi fannin nishaantarwa inda da mafi yawancin kungiyoyin mawaka sun takaita ko soke wasannin su.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Dandalin wassani da yawa kamar wanda ke kan titin broadway sun hana dukkan wasanni.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Wasu Gamayyar Masu Wasa Sun Samar Da Hanyoyin Cigaban Hada Da Kuma raba Ayyukan Su Ta Hanyar Yanar Gizo A Maimakon Hanyar Wasa a fili wanda aka saba da ita, Kamar kallon bidiyo nan take a Yanar Gizo Da Ma Kirkiro Bukkukuwa a shafukan Yanar Gizo Domin Masu Wasa Su Samu Su Yi Kuma Su Yada Wassanin Su.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: A kafafen sadarwa an samu yaduwar hotunan barkwanci da lakanin coronavirus yayin da yawa a cikin su suka mayar a hankali zuwa ga nishadi domin dauke hankali na rashin tabbacin karshen annobar.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Tun bayan barkewar COVID-19, nuna bambanci, nuna wariyar launin fata, da wariyar launin fata ga mutanen Sinawa da Gabas ta Tsakiya, da kuma mutane daga wuraren fada a Turai, Amurka da sauran kasashe.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Lamari na tsoro, zargi, da garkuwa aka fuskanta a kasashe da dama musamman a nahiyar turai, gabashin asia, arewacin amurka da ma bangaren teku na asia.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Rahotanni daga watan Febreru (Yayin da adadin wadanda suka kamu da cutar ya kebanta a China) na dauke da bayanai na yadda sauran yan kasashen duniya ke nuna wariyar launi tare da aibata yan kasar China. Da yawa sun nuna cewa kasar ta cancanci sakamakon da ta same ta.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Wasu Kashashen a Africa sun Ga Karin Kabilanci akan yan China.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Yawancin mazauna Wuhan da Hubei sun ba da rahoton wariyar launin fata dangane da asalin yankinsu.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Ana bawa Sinawa goyon baya, a kan layi da kuma ba kan layi ba, da wadanda ke cikin wuraren da cutar ta fi kamuwa.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Bayan ci gaba da barkewar cutar a wasu sabuwar kasashe, mutane daga Italiya, farkon kasa a Turai da ta sami mummunar barkewar COVID-19, ana iya fuskantar shaka da nuna wariyar kasa. ‘Yan kasa cikin kasashe hade da Malesiya, New Zealand, Singapore, da Koriya ta Kudu sun fara sanya hannu kan koke-koken neman haramtawa Sinawa shiga cikin kasashen su a kokarin tsayarwa da cutar.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: A cikin Japan, hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan yayi tasiri akan Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Mutanenen China da ma wasu yan nahiyar Asiya a Birtaniya da ma kasashen U.S. sun ba da rahoton karin nuna wariyar fata, da ma wasu hare-hare.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Shugaban Kasar U.S Donald Trump Ya Fuskanci Suka A Dalilin Kiran Cutar Coronavirus Da Suna “Kwayan Cutar Sinawa”, ajalin da masu sukar ke dauka a maseyin wariyar launin fata kin-Sinawa

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Masu zanga-zanga a Ukrain sun kai hari ga motoci dake dauke da yan kasar da sauran wadanda neman tsira daga birnin Wuhan zuwa Novi Sanzhary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Dalibai Da Suka Zo Daga Arewa Maso Gabas na India Wanda Ke Da iyaka Da China, wanda suke Karatu A Wasu Biranen India Sun Fuskanci Kyama A Dalilin Barkewar Cutar Coronavirus.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Shugaban Jam'iyyar na yankin Bharatiya Janata a West Bengal Dilip Ghosh ya bayyana cewa, Sinawa sun lalata dabi'ar kuma “shi ya sa Allah ya dauki fansa a kansu.”

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Daga baya ne qungiyar qwadagon ta China ta yi Allah wadai da jawaban da aka yi a Kolkata, tana mai cewa "kuskure ne". A China, barkewar nuna wariyar launin fata da wariyar launin fata game da mazaunan Sinawa ba su barke ba sakamakon barkewar cutar, inda aka bayyana 'yan kasashen waje a matsayin "datti na kasashen waje" da niyyar "zubarwa".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Mafi yawan jaridu sun Cire Labarun Bango A Dukkan rahotanin Su Daya Kula Da Cutar Corona.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Yawancin masu wallafa ilimin kimiyya sun sanya takaddun ilimin kimiyya mai alaƙa da barkewar da ke akwai a inda kowa zai karanta.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Wasu masan kimiya sun zabi fitar da sakamakon su cikin lokaci ta hanyar manhaja bugu na bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Aukuwar kwayar cuta mai saurin yaduwa - Aukuwar kwayar cuta mai saurin faruwa, sau tari a cikin yanayin barkewa ko yanayin watsawa

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Duniya baki daya da cuta - Bayyanin duniya da yaduwar cuta

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Jerin cututtukan annoba da cututtukan cuta - Jerin yawan mutane da suka mutu saboda cutar kwalara

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Sumogar namun daji da cutar zoonoses - Hadarin lafiyan da ke alaka da kasuwancin namun daji masun tsada.

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Dakin gwaji don cutar hanyar numfashin coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) da mai alaƙa da cutar SARS-CoV-2 ya hada da hanyoyin gano kasancewar kwayar cutar da wadanda suka gano kwayoyin halittun kariya da suka samar sakamakon kamuwa da cuta.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: RT-PCR ke tabbatar da kwayoyin cuta a cikin samfuri, wanda ke gano cutar coronavirus RNA.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Gwajin an yi shi ne na musamman akan ya gano RNA na cutan SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Ana amfani dashi wajen tabbatar da ciwo wanda aka gano ko kuma yake ayanzu.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Gano garkuwar jikin (serology) akan yi amfani dashi ta wajen gwaji da sa ido kan jama'a.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Gwajin garkuwan jiki na nuna mutane nawane suka kamu da cutar, har da wadanda alamomin su kadan ne wanda aka sanar.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Samun adadin mace-macen da ciwon keyi da yanayin garkuwa a cikin mutane na iya samuwa a gwajin da akayi.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Saboda karancin gwaji, a watan Maris 2020 babu wata kasar da bayanan dogaro domin mamayewar kwayar cutan cikin yawan jama'ar su.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, Babu wata kasa da ta yi gwajin kashi 3% na yawan jama'ar kasa, kuma akwai bambanci sosai a yawan gwajin da aka yi a dukan kasashe.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Wannan saɓani kuma yana iya shafar mahimmancin rahoton yawan tsananin masun kamuwa da cutan, wanda yakan yuwuwar akan iya ƙimanta su fiye da ha a wasu ƙasashe.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Yin amfani da juyi na ainihin-lokacin haduwar plymerase chain (rRT-PCR) ana iya gwajin hanyoyin numfashi wanda an samo shi ta hanyoyi daban-daban, hade da juyin nasopharyngeal ko samfurin sputum.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: akan samu sakamakon cikin sa'oi kadan zuwa kwana 2.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Gwajin RT-PCR anayin sane da swab din makogwaro amma yana yiwuwane kadai a farkon makon da aka kamu da ciwon.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: daga bisani kuma kwayar cutar sai ya bance a makoshi lokacin da ya cigaba da hayayyafa a huhu.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Ga wadanda suka kamu da cutar kuma an gwada su a mako ta biyu, banda haka za a iya daukan samfuri daga cikin wurin numfanshi ta wurin amfani da catheter ko zubar da tari (sputum).

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: An haɓaka daya daga cikin gwajin PCR a Charite cikin Berlin a watan Janairu 2020 ta yin amfani da real-time transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), da tsara tushen kaya 250,000 don rabawa daga Hukumar Lafiya ta duniya. (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: Nahiyar turai sun hada wani gwaji a 23 Janairu 2020. Kamfanin Koriya ta arewa Kogenebiotech ta samo sabon tsari, PCR-based SAR-CoV-2 abun gwaji (Powercheck Corona virus) a ranar 28 Janairu 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Yana neman "E" wanda aka raba ta duk beta coronaviruses, da kuma RdRp takamaiman kwayar halita ga SARS-CoV-2. A kasar Sin, kungiyar BGI ta kasance daya daga cikin kamfanoni na farko da suka samu amincewar amfani da gaggawa daga Hukumar Kula da Lafiya ta Kasar don PCS-CoV-2 gano kayan kitse-A Amurka, Cibiyar Kula da Cututtukan (CDC) tana rarraba kan ta sabuwar Coronavirus-2019 (2019-nCoV) Lokaci-Kai Tsaye RT-PCR Binciken Cibiyoyin lafiya ga wurin gwajin lafiyar jama'a ta hanyar International Reagent Resource.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Daya daga cikin kwayoyin gwajin na da wanda ya zama ba cikakkeba saboda matsala mahadi kuma a bakin kwalbar gwajin ta CDD a Atlanta; wannan ya kawo kusan samfuri 100 wanda sukai daidai a cikin watan Febrairu 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Amfani da abun gwaji biyu bai nuna inganci ba har 28 Febrairu 2020, kuma har sai sanda aka ba jihohi da dakin gwaji damar yin gwaji.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: An samu yarda gwajin ne da ga hukumar abinci da magunguna karkashin bangaren gudanarwa ta gaggawa. dakin gwaji na kudin a US sun fara gwajin a farko Maris 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: A ranar 5 ga watan Maris 2020 LabCorp ta bada sanarwar samun gwaji daga cutar COVID-19 a kasa gaba daya wanda ya danganta ga RT-PCR.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics wanda aka yi iri daya a duk fadin kasa akwai gwajin COVID-19 daga ranar 9 ga watan Maris 2020

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Ba a sanar da babu iyakar yawan ba, samfurin da aka dauka kuma an yi aiki da su dole ne a yi shi ta hanyar yadda CDC suke bukata

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: A kasar Rasha an haɓaka gwajin COVID-19 kuma Binciken Jihar ne wato State Research na Virology da Biotechnolgy VECTOR suka sarrafa.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: A ranar 11 ga watan Febrairu 2020 gwajin da aka shigar daga Federal Service for Surveilance a bangaren kiwon lafiya. A ranar 12 ga watan Maris 2020, Asibitin Mayo sun ruwaito cewa akwai tsarin gwajin ciwon COVID-19. A ranar 13 ga watan Maris 2020, Roche Diagnostics sun samu yardar FDA don yin gwajin da za'a yi cikin awanni 3.5 mafi yawa, duk da cewa zasu bar na'ura tayi gwajin kusan 4,128 a cikin sa'a 24

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: A ranar 19 Maris 2020, FDA ta ba da izini na amfani da gaggawa (EUA) ga Abbott Laboratories don gwaji akan tsarin m2000 na Abbott; FDA ta ba da izini iri ɗaya ga Hologic, LabCorp, da kuma Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: A ranar 21 ga watan Maris 2020, Cepheid ya karɓi EUA daga FDA don gwaji da zai dauki mintuna 45.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA ta amince da wani gwajin da ke amfani da fasahar fadadarwa ruwan yacid isothermal nucleic a maimakon PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Tunda wannan baya bukatar wani tsarin yanayi to hanyar ka iya haifar da sakamon tabbarwa mai yan mintuna biyar kuma sakamakon rashin tabbas cikin mintuna 13.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Ayanzu haka akwai kimanin 18,000 na nairan nan a US kuma Abbott na saran cewa za'a kara samar da gwajin 50,000 a rana. Gwajin da ke dauke da garkuwan jiki na monoclonal wanda ke gusar da nucleacapsid protein (N Protein) na cibiyar korona virus ana hadashi a Taiwan, tare da tsammanin cewa ai iya bada sakamako cikin mintuna15 zuwa 20 kamar ciwon mura mai hauhawa.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Wani bita da aka yi game da wallafe-wallafen Maris na 2020 ya kammala cewa "hotunan rediyo na kirji ba su da ƙima sosai game da ganewar asali a farkon matakai, alhali CT [ƙididdigar tomography] binciken na iya kasancewa har ma kafin bayyanar cututtuka. "

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Sanene Sifofin CT sun hada da bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities da periheral, asymmetric da rarrabawar posterior.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: yada cutar ke fitowa an haɓaka mamayewar Subpleural, tsagewar fata wato crazy paving da karfafawa.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Binciken gwajin PCR zuwa CT cikin Wuhan a matsayin asalin annoban ta yanzu ya nuna cewa CT ya fi kamuwa fiye da PCR, kodayake ba shi da takamaiman bayani, da yawancin fasahar hoto wanda ke hade da wasu cututtukan huhu da tafiyar matakai na cuta.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: A watan Maris shekarar 2020. Kolejin Daukar Hoton Jiki na Amurka wato American college of Radiology ta bada shawaran cewa ayi kada a yi amfani da CT wajen gwajin farkon COVID-19". A watan Maris 2020, CDC ta bada shawarar yin amfani da PCR domin gwajin farko.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Bangaren garkuwan jiki dake kariya daga cutar shine a habakar da garkuwar jiki wanda suka hada da Igm da IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Za a iya amfani da su domin gano mutanen da suka kamu da cutar wanda ya fara daga kwana 7 ko haka bayan farin alamar cutan, domin gano da kariya, da kuma kiyaye da yawan jama'a. Za a iya amfani da Assays cikin dakin gwaji (CLT) ko ta gwajin point-of-care (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Na'urar sanya aiki da kai wato high-throughput cikin dakin gwajin asibitoci da yawa can iya aikata wadanan gwaje-gwajen amma samun su zai danganta ga nawa ake samarwa ga ko wace na'ura.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: Don CLT samfurin guda ɗaya na jini na gefe wanda aka saba amfani dashi, kodayake za'a iya amfani da samfuran na yauda kullun don bibiyar maganin rigakafi.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: PoCT samfurin jini daya na jini akan debane ta hanyar huda fata.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Ba kamar da hanyoyin PCR ba a buƙatar matakin haɓaka kafin assay ba. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, 2020, FDA ta bawa mutane 29 damar bada sanarwa ga hukuma kamar yadda ake buƙata kuma a yanzu suna da ikon rarraba gwajin garkuwar jikin su.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: FDA sun amince gwaji a watan Aprilu 7 2020, a karkashin amfanin gaggawar izini a karshen watan Maris 2020. Euriommum Medical Laboratory Diagnostics da Epitope Diagnostics sun samu Yardar European domin kayan gajin su wanda zai iya gano IgG da igAna garkuwan jiki akan kwayar cutar a samfurin jini.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: Yanayin girman gwajin yana da yawan darukan samfuri cikin awanni kuma na da sauri sosai fiye da PCR assay na viral RNA wanda aka saba.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: Ana iya gano garkuwan jikin kwana 14 bayan farawar cutan. A farkon watan Afrilu, kasar UK ba ta sami wani abun gwajin garkuwan jikin da aka saya da amfani ba.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: Hong Kong ta tsara wata makirci inda wadanda ake gani suna da cutar kan zauna a gida, "sashen gaggawa za su bada bututun samfuri wa marasa lafiyan", za su tofa miyau ciki, tura shi wurin su kuma a sami sakamakon gwajin nan gaba. NHS na Birtaniya sun sanar da makirci gwajin farko domin gwajin wadanda ake ganin suna da cutan a gida, wanda ya cire hadarin yaduwar cutan daga marasa lafiyan zuwa wasu idan suka zo asibitin ko ta wurin wankewar kwayar cutan daga motar daukan gawa wato ambulance idan an yi amfani da ita. A ta wuring gwajin COVID-19 na kowa ga wadanda ake zaton sun kamu da cutar, kwarare ma'aikatar kiwon lafiya zai dauke samfurin ta wuring yin amfani da ko wande irin matakan kariya.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: Wuraren gwajin da suke kusa sun taimaka ma Kasar Korea ta Kudu yin gwaji mai sauri da tsada a kowace kasa. A Jamus, likitoci a National Association of Statutory Health Insurance sun ce a rana 2 ga watan Maris, cewa suna da damar yin gwaji guda 12,000 a rana a tsarin kuma 10.700 aka gada a makon da ya gabata.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: Farashin wajen Ma'aikatan inshora lokacinda likita ya odar yin gwajin.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Bisa ga shugaban makarantar Robert Koch, Jamaus yana da karfin iya gwajin 160,000 a mako guda.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: Daga ranar 19 ga watan Mari anyi gwajin mai yawa a manyan birane.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: A ranar 26 ga watan Mari 2020 an samu adadin lambar gwajin da aka yi a Jamus ba'a san su ba, sai dai kawi wanda aka sani sun kamu da cutar.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: Binciken farko na dakin gwaji sun tabbatar da cewa a makon 12/2020 an gwada samfuri kimanin 483,295 har zuwa hade da makon 12/2020 da kuma samfuri 33.491 (kashi 6.9 bisa dari) wanda ya nuna akwai SARS-COV-2. A Isra'ila, masu bincike a Technion da Asibitin Rambam sun habaka da kuma yin wani salon gwajin don gwajin samfuri daga masu jinya 64 atare, ta hanyar gwajin samfurin da tabbatar da cewa hadadden samfurin ne kawai ya tabbata. A Wuhan an samu kimanin 2000-sq-meter a dakin gwaji na gaggawa wanda ake kira ‘'Huo-Yan'' (da China: 火眼, ko "Fire Eye" a turance) wanda BGI suka budeshi a ranar 5 February 2020, wanda zai iya yin gwajin samfuri kimanin 10.000 a rana.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: Tare da mai lura da ginin wato mai kafa BGI Wang Jian wanda ya dauka kwanaki 5, gwajin ta nuna akwai mai kamu da cutar a Hubei da zai fi kashi 47% da kuma daidai kudin da za a kashe domin kebewa da zai ninka kudin sau biyu inda yawan gwajin bai za kan layi ba.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: Dakin gwajin Wuhan wanda dakin gwajin Hou-Yan ke bi a Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijin, da Shanghai a cikin dukan birane 12 a kewayar kasar Sin.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: A ranar 4 a watan Maris 2020 dukan gwajin ko wace rana sun kai 50,000. Origami Assays sun zana kuma sun saki Tushen budewa wato Open Source, Multilexed an saki su domin gwajin samfurin wadanda suka kamu da COVID19 dayawa kamar guda 1122 ta yin amfani da assays 93 ba tare da bukatar ruwan robotic handlers ba.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: A watan Maris, karanci da rashin mahadin gwaji (reagent) ya hana yin gawji da yawa a kasashen turai (EU) da kuma UK da kasar Amurka.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: Wannan ya sanya wasu marubuta su karanci shiryawar samfurin tsarin aikin wanda ya hada da dumawar samfuri a 98 °C (208 °F) na mintuna 5 don fitar da RNA genomes don karin gwajin. A ranar 31 ga watan Maris aka sanar cewa hadaddiyar daular larabawa sun fara gwajin coronavirus a cikin yawan jama'ar ta fiye da kowace kasa, kuma suna kan kokari domin kara yawan gwajin domin kai ga dukan yawan jama'a.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: Wannan ya kasance ta hanyar haɗuwar karfin gwajin shiga wato drive-through, sayan na'uran gwajin population-scale mass-throughput daga kungiya 42 da BGI (bisa ga “Huo-Yan” dakunan gwajin ganowar gaggwa cikin kasar Sin).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: An gina shi a kwana 14, dakin gwajin zai iya gudanar da gwaji dubu goma Na RT-PCR a rana kuma shine na farko da yake aiki a wajen kasar sin.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: Kayayyakin gwaji daban-daban na sasan kwayoyin halitar coronavirus an haɓaka su a kasar Sin, Faransa, Jamus, Hon Kon, Japan, da kasar U.S.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: Hukumar lafiya ta dunia ta dauki tsarin kasar Jamus na sarrafa abin gwaji wanda aka tura ƙasashe masu ƙarancin kuɗi wanda ba su da albarkun kasa domin sarrafa nasu.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: An buga girke-girke na Jamusanci a ranar 17 Janairu 2020; ba a samu yarjejeniya da Cibiyar Kula da Cututtukan Amurka ba har zuwa 28 ga Janairu, jinkirta samar da gwaje-gwaje a cikin U.S.China da Amurka suna da matsaloli game da amincin kayan gwaji a farkon fashewar, kuma waɗannan ƙasashe da Ostiraliya sun kasa samar da isassun kayan sawa don gamsar da buƙatun da shawarwari na ƙwararrun masana kiwon lafiya.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Banda haka, masana sun ce taimakon yawan gwajin da akwai a Koriya ta Kudu ya taimaka wajen rage yaduwar cutar coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: Yanayin gwajin, yawanci dakin gwaji masu zaman kansu an gina su shekaru da yawa daga Gwamnatin Koiya ta Kudu.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: Ranar 16 ga watan Maris, Hukumar Lafiya ta duniya tace yin gwaji shine hanya mafi kyau da inganci na wannan annobar COVID-19. Akwai bukatar gwai sosai don cutar yana yaduwa hakan ya kawo koma baya wajen gwajin a dakin gwajin U.S. da kuma bada samfurin da kuma sinadarin gwaji na da illa.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: A watan Maris 2020 Kasar Sin ta rawaito matslolin wanda ya shafi kyawun kayan aiki.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: A kasar Amurka,  abin gwaji da ka dabakar daga CDC yana da matsaloli sai gwamnati ta cire bangaranci wanda ke hana dakin gwaji masu zamna kasu suyi aiki. Kasar Spain ta sayi abin gwaji daga kasar sin wato Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology co ltd sai ta samu cewa sakamakon bai da inganci.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: Kamfanin ya bayyana cewa ba daidai ba sakamakon na iya zama sakamakon gazawar tattara samfurori ko amfani da kaya daidai.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: Hukumar Spanish sunce zasu jany kayan gwanjin da bai da sakamako mai kyau, kuma zau sauya da wasu nau'in daban wan Shnghen Bioeasy 80% na abin gwajin na Czech Republic suka saya a kasar sin sun samu sakamako ba daidai ba. Slovakia sun say kusan abin gwaji miliyan 1.2 a kasar sin wan suka samu baiyi daidai ba.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: Firayin Minista Matovic ya bada shawarar a aje shi cikin Danube Ates Kara na ma'aikatan kiwon lafiyar kasar Turkiyya yace abin gwajin da Kasar Turkiyya ta saya daga kasar Sin yana da kurakurai sosai kuma basa amfani dashi. Kasar UK ta sayi abin gwajin na kimanin miliyn 3.5 daga kasar Sin amma a farkon watan Aprilu 2020 sun ce wannan ba za'a iya amfani da su ba.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: Gwadawa, da bin bayan kebewa wadanda aka same su da cutan da neman wadanda suka hadu da wadanda suka kamu da cutar SaRS-CoV-2 wadanda suka kamu da cutar suna da huldawa mara kyau wanda ke haifar kamuwa da cutan.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: Masu bincike wadanda suke aiki a kasar Italy na VO a wurin da aka gano farin mutuwa ga CoVID-19 cikin Italy, sun gudanar da wasu gwaji kan dukan yawan jama'a guda 3,400, kusan kwanaki goma a rabe.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: Kusan rabin masu dauke da cutar basa nuna alamomin ciwon kuma an kebe dukan wadanda aka same su da cutar.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: Akan tsarin hana zirga-zirga, hakan sai ya kashe wasu ciwukan gaba daya.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: Da bibiyan wanda suka hadu da marasa lafiya, tafiye-tafiye na cikin gida, gwaji da kebewa, cutar coronavirus na 2020 a Singapore na tafiya kadan-kadan fiye da wasu cikin kasashen da kasashen da suka yi girma, amma babu wata kuntatawa ba kamar rufewar dakin cin abinci da wuraren tsayar da kayayyaki.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: An dakatar da duk wasu al'amuran, da kasar Singapore tayi ta sanar iyan gida cewa su zauna a gidan su ranar 28 ga watan Maris, amma an sake bude makarantu a ranar 23 ga watan Maris.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: Kasashe da dama sun hana yaduwar annoban ta hanyar nemo wandanda sun cudanya da masu cutan, hana tafiye-tafiye, gwaje-gwaje da kuma tafiye-tafiyen masu cutar tare da kebancewar su amma banda hana mutane yawo kamar kasar Iceland da Koriya ta Kudu.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: Binciken kididdiga ya nuna cewa kasashe wadanda suka yi gwaji sosai, abin da ya shafi adadin mutuwa, suna da karancin wanda suka jikata, watakila domin wadannan ƙasashen sun fi iya gano waɗanda ke da karami ko babu alamun kamu da cutan.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: WHO ta ba da shawarar cewa ƙasashen da ba su da ƙarfin gwaji da dakunan gwaje-gwaje na ƙasa ba da ƙarancin kwarewa kan COVID-19 su aika farkon tabbatattun gwaji guda biyar da samfurin wadanda ba a tabatar ba duda goma COVID-19 samfurin daya daga cikin 16 na shaidar dakin gwajin WHO tabbatarwar gwajin.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: Daga cikin shaidar dakin gwaji 16, 7 suna Asia, 5 a nahiyar turai, 2 a Afirka, 1 a Amurka ta arewada, 1 a Nahiyar Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: A wadanan ginshiƙi, al'amudi “tabbaci kamar % na gwaji” yana tasiri ta hanyar tsarin gwajin kasa.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: Kasar da ke gwajin mutane kawai aka shigar da su a asibitoci za su sami inganci sosai a matsayin kashi % na gwaje-gwajen dukan ‘yan kasa, ko sun nuna alamun cutar ko babu, idan sauran abubuwa sun zama daidai.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: Wanke hannu wadda aka sani da tsaftan hannu, hanya ce ta wanke hannye domin cire kasa, man shafawa, kananan halittu, ko kuma wasu abubuwa da ba a bukata.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: Wanke hannu da sabulu akai-akai "Lokaci mai mahimmanci" da rana yana hana yaduwar cututtuka da yawa, misali zawo da kwalara wanda ake yaɗa ta hanyar kashi-baki.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: Hakanan mutane na iya kamuwa da cutar ta huhu ko kuma mura na yau da kullum, misali idan basu wanke hannayensu ba kafin su taɓa idanunsu, hanci da bakinsu.

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Lokaci biyar da suke da mahimmaci a rana sune ayayin da wanke hannu da sabulu yanada mahimmanci hadi da:kafin da bayan fitowa daga bayan gida, bayan yiwa yaro tsarki kokuma canza wa yaro napkin, kafin bawa yaro abinci, kafin cin abinci, kafin da kuma bayan dafa abinci, dakuma bayan ta'ammali da danyen name, kifi ko gidan gona.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: Idan ba'a samu ruwa da sabulu ba za'a iya wanke hannun da toka, WHO ta bada shawarar wanke hannu:

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: Kafin, lokacin, da bayan dafa abinci.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: kafin ko kuma bayan lura da mara lafiya.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: Bayan canza wa yaro zanin diapers ko tsaftace yaron da ya yi amfani da wurin bayan gida.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Bayan hura hanci, tari ko atishawa.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: Bayan taɓa dabba, abincin dabbobi da kashin dabbobi.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: Tsabtace hannu na tsarin likita yana nufin tsabtace aikin da ya shafi aikin likita.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: Wanke hannu kafin bayar da magani ko jiyya kan iya hana ko ya rage yaduwan cutan.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: Asalin dalilin lafiya na wanke hannaye shi ne domin cire wasu kananan halittu daga hannu (pathogens kamar bacteria, viruses, ko sauran kananan kwayoyin halitta masu kawo cuta) da sinadarai dake iya jawo illa ko cutuka.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: Wannan yana da muhimmanci musamman ga mutane wadanda suke aikin abinci ko suna aiki a fannin lafiya, kuma yana da muhimmanci wa dukan al'umma.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: Wanke hannaye nada anfani sosai game da ragewar cutar mura, cutar corona da sauran cututtukan da wani yakan shafawa wani, hana la'anar kamuwa da zawo da raguwar cutar lumfashi.

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: Da kuma rage mutuwar jarirai a haihuwar gida.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: Wani bincike na 2013 ya nuna cewa ingantattun ayyukan wanke hannu na iya haifar da ƙananan ci gaba a cikin tsayi da girma a yara kasa da shekaru biyar.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: A cikin kasashe masu tasowa, Ana iya rage yawan mace-macen kananan yara da suka danganci cutar numfashi da zawo ta hanyar gabatar da sauye sauyen halaye kamar wanke hannaye da sabulu.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: Wannan matakin mai sauqi na iya rage yawan mace-mace daga wadannan cututtukan da kusan kashi 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: Kariya wanda ke kara matsayin wanken hannu na iya rage yawan zawo har kimanin kashi daya cikin uku, kuma za a iya kwatanta wannan da samar da ruwa mai tsabta a cikin matalauta.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: 48% na raguwar cututtukan zawo na iya haɗuwa da wanke hannu da sabulu. Wanke hannu da sabulu ita ce hanya mafi inganci kuma mai sauki don hana cutar gudawa da kamuwa da cutar huhu kamar yadda aka a cikin makarantu, gida da al'umma a duk duniya.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: Kwayar cutar huhu, babbar cutar ARI, ita ce ta farko da ke haifar da mace-mace a tsakanin yara ‘yan kasa da shekara biyar, da ke ɗaukar kimanin yara miliyan 1.8 a shekara.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: Cutar gudawa da na nimoniya suna kawo mutuwar yara kussan milliyan 3.5 a kowace shekara.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: A cewar UNICEF wanke hannun da sabulu kafin cin abinci da bayan amfani da bayan gida yazama al'ada hakan zai ita ceton rai fiye da kowane allurar riga kafi kokuma magani, Yanke mace daga gudawa da kusan rabin kuma mutuwa daga kamuwa da cutar rashin iya lumfashi quater daya.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: Wanke hannu koyaushe ana hade tare da sauran hanyoyin tsabtace ruwa a matsayin ɓangare na ruwa, tsabta da kuma tsabta (WASH).

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: Wanke hannu ma yakan kare daga impetigo (cutar fata) wadda ake samu ta wajen haduwa ta zahiri.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: Karamin matsalar wanke hannu shine yawan wanke hannu na iya jawo lalacewar fatan jiki saboda bushewar fatan.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: A wata binciken skarar 2012, an gano cewa yawan wanke hannu na iya jawo kaikayi, laushin hannu wanda ya fi yawa a cikin ma'aikatan lafiya.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: Wanke hannu akai-akai shi ma ana ganinsa a matsayin daya daga cikin alamun yawan tunani mara fasali wato obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Akwai lokuta guda biyar duk rana da wanke hannu da sabulu ke da muhimmanci domin rage yaduwar cutan ta fuska da baki: bayan amfani da gidan wanka (fisari, ba haya), bayan gyara ma yaro ko yarinya duwawu (canza nafkin), kafin ciyar da yaro ko yarinya, kafin cin abinci da kuma kafin/bayan sarafa abinci ko rike danyen nama, kifi, ko kaza.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: Sauran lokuta da ya kamata a dauki matakan wanke hannu da kyau domin guje wa yaduwar cutan ya hada da kafin ko kuma bayan jiyyan yanka ko rauni; bayan taba kashin daba ko rike dabbobi; da bayan taba datti.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: A cikin ƙasashe da yawa akwai ƙarancin wanke hannuwa da sabulu.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: Binciken wanke hannu a cikin kasashe 54 a shekarar 2015 ya gano cewa a matsakaici kashi 38.7% na mutanan gida suna wanke hannu da sabulu. Wani bincike na shekarar 2014 ya nuna cewa Saudiyya tana da mafi girman kaso na kashi 97% na jihar sai kasar amerika da ke kusa da tsakiya tare da kashi 77% sai china mai mafi karancin kashi 23%. Da yawa daga canjin yanayin canji yana karuwa da matakan wanke hannu da sabulu a lokaci mai mahimmanci Kungiyar wanke hannu na eh yara na makaranta a lokutan rana shine zaɓi ɗaya a cikin ƙasashe masu tasowa don sanyawa yara kudurin wanke hannu a cikin halayensu.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: "Shirin Tubalin Lafiya" (“Essential Health Program”) wanda Hukumar Ilimi a Philippines ta aiwatar misali ne kan daukan matakin inganta lafiyar yara da iliminsu.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: Ragewa sau biyu a shekara, wanda yake taimakawa da wanke hannu kullun tare da sabulu, goge baki yau da kullun tare da Fluoride, shine ainihin wannan shirin na ƙasa.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: Hakanan an sami nasarar aiwatar da shi a Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: Cire kananan halittu da ido ba zai iya gani ba daga fata na kara ingantuwa idan aka hada da sabulu ko garin sabulu a ruwa.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: Asalin mataki na sabulai da garin sabulu ana yi ne domin rage shinge ga nasara da karin narkewa.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: Ruwa kadai muhimin abu ne na wanke fata ba domin mai da furotin, wadanda suna asali daga cikin kasa, wadda ba su narkewa cikin ruwa.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: Ana tsarkakewa da taimakon ruwa mai gudu.

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: Sabulu na ruwa saboda shi za'a iya sake anfani dashi a kowane lokaci, zai iya riƙe kwayoyin cuta da aka samu daga amfanin da suka gabata.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: ƙaramin nazarin karatu sun nuna canja wurin ƙwayoyin cuta daga gurbataccen sabulu an kammala canja wuri ba kamar yadda kwayoyin cuta suka tafi tare da kumfa.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: CDC tana kan bayyana cewa “sabulun ruwa da hanyan zuba ruwa domin fitarwa ya fi kyau”.

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: Ana gargadin al'umma da su yi amfani da sabulu mai kashe kwayoyin cuta.

sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: Zuwa yau, babu wata hujja da ke nuna amfani da ita don maganin rigakafin ƙwayar cuta ko kuma kwayoyin halittun da suke jure kwayoyin cuta a yanayi.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: Duk da haka, Sabulun kariya daga kwayoyin cuta suna dauke da wakilai na kashe kwayar cuta irinsu triclosan, wanda yake dauke jerin abubuwa masu yawa na tsarin kwayoyin.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: Don haka koda ba'a zabi kwayoyin juriyar garkuwan jiki ba don sabulun kariya daga kwayoyin cuta, yiwuwa ba za su zama da inganci yadda ake tallata su ba.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: Bayan surfactant da fata mai wakilin kariya, Tsarin sararin samaniya yana iya ƙunsar ruwan yacid(acetic acid, ascorbic acid lactic acid) A matsayin mai tsara PH, antimicrobial active benzoic acid da kara yanayin fata (aleo vera, vitamin, menthol, plant extract) Takaitaccen bincike daga Jami'ar Orogon makarantar kula da lafiyar yanuna cewa sabulu a bayyane yake kamar sabulu masu kashe kwayoyin cuta mai kushe da triclosan don kariya daga rashin lafiya dakuma kashe kwayoyin cuta daka hannu.

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: Ruwan zafi da yake da dadin wanke hannu ba shi da zafin da zai iya kashe kwayoyin cutan.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: Kwayoyin cuta sun fi girma idan jiki na da zafi wato a yanayin (37 °C).

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: Ko da shike, ruwan dumi, ruwan sabulu ya fi na sanyi aiki, ruwan sabulu ya fi cire mai da ke kasa, da kananan hallitu da ido ba zai iya gani ba.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: Akasin abin da mutane suka gaskanta, bincike na kimiya ta nuna cewa amfani da ruwan dumi ba shi da wani amfani wajen rage yawan kananan halittu a hannaye.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: Mai tsabtace hannu ko man kariya daga kwayar cuta wanda asalin wakilin tsaftar hannu mara ruwa.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: A karshen sheakarun 1990 da farkon karni na 21, abubuwan tsaftace hannu masu sinadarin alcohol kuma wadanda ba ruwa a cikinsu (kuma akan kira su da man hannu mai sinadarin alcohol, man hannu na magani, ko man tsaftace hannu) sun samu shahara.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: Yawancinsu sun dogara kan sinadarin isopropyl alcohol ko ethanol da aka hada tare da sinadarin sa abu ya yi kauri kamar Carbomer (polymer na acrylic acid) a cikin wani mai, ko hemectant kamar glycerin a cikin ruwa, ko kumfa don saukin amfani sannan don rage tasirin bushewa na sinadarin alcohol.

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: Dingara ƙara da aka samar da hydrogen-peroxide,, don ci gaba da ake dasu da ayyukan, sinadarin tsabtace hannu waɗanda ke ɗauke da mafi ƙarancin kashi 60-95% sune sukafi tasiri a kashe ƙwayoyin cuta.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: Man shafawa a hannu maisinadarin kashe kwayoyin cuta, mai maganin juriya, Magungunan ƙwayoyin cuta masu guba da yawa(MRSA and VRE) cutar tarin fuka da wasu ƙwayoyin cuta (Ciki harda cutar HIV, cutar dabbobi, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, mura da hepatitis) da fungi.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: Mai tsftace hannu mai sinadarin Alcohol dauke da sinadarin alcohol kashi 70% suna kashewa kashi 99.97% (raguwar log 3.5, mai kama da raguwar decbel 35) na ƙwayoyin cuta akan hannaye secan 30 bayan shafawa da kashi 99.99% zuwa 99.999% (Raguwar log 4 zuwa 5) na ƙwayoyin cuta akan hannu minti 1 bayan bayan shafawa. Man tsaftacewan hannu suna da tasiri kan kwayoyin cutar bacteriya kuma da reshin tasiri kan kwayoyin cuta birus.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: Man sabtace hannu na giya ba su da tasiri a kan cutar norovirus, mafi jawo gastroenteritis (ciwon ciki) mai yaduwa. Dole ayi amfani da antiseptic ko giya domin jika ko kuma rufe duka hannaye.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: Ana goge gaba da baya na hannaye da kuma tsakanin iyakar dukkan yatsunsu kusan sekan 30 har sai ruwa, ta yi kumfa ko sinadarin tsaftar ya bushe.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: Dole a wanke yatsa da kyau, a share duka tafin hannayen. US Center for Disease Control and Prevention sun ba da shawara da a wanke hannu tare da man tsaftace hannu, musamman idan hannaye sun nuna datti a zahiri.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: kara amfani da wadannan wakilan Ya dogara ne akan sauƙin amfani da ayyukan kashewa da sauri akan kwayoyin cuta Koyaya ya kamata suyi amfani da matsayin sauyawa don wankin da ya dace saidai kuma idan babu ruwa ko sabulu.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: Yawaita amfani da man tsaftace hannu mai sinadarin alcohol na iya jawo bushewar fata sai dai in an hada da sinadarin emollients da/ko sinadaran hana fata bushewa a cikin hadin.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
