targetString: Ana iya rage tasirin bushewar ko a cirewar sinadarin wanke hannu ta hanyar ƙara glycerin da/kokuma emollient ta dubara.

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: A cikin gwaji na asibiti, mayukan tsaftace hannu masu sinadarin alcohol waɗanda ke ɗauke da emollients sun haifar da ƙarancin kaikayin fata da bushewar fata fiye da sabulu ko sabulu mai maganin kananan halittu.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: Rashin lafiyan kusanci dermatitis, kusancin urticaria ciwo ko rashin lafiyar jiki ga sinadari ko qari a cikin sinadarin wanke hannu baya faruwa.

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: Rashin karfin halin jawo matsalan haduwa da dermatitis ya zama abin jan hankali a bisan wanke hannu da sabulu da ruwa.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: Duk da ingancinsu wakilin dabana ruwa bane baya tsabtace hannun, amma yana lalata su.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: Dalilin haka ne man wanke hannu mai kashe kwayar cuta ba shi da tasiri kamar wanke hannu da ruwa da sabulu saboda hana yanduwar kwayoyin cuta da yawa, tun da ana samun sauran cututtukan a hannaye.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: Aikin mai na tsaftace hannu ya dangana ga sinadaransa da inda aka sarafa shi, kuma bisa ga tarihi bai da wani amfani sosai da shafawa.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: Kwanan nan, an nuna hanyoyin da ake hadin sinadarai benzalkonium chloride sun nuna suna da wadatarwa da kuma tarawar ayyukan antimicrobial bayan amfani, ba kamar sinadarin alcohol ba, ragewar inganci bayan maimaitawa amfani da ita, wataƙila sakamakon cigaban tsananin batawar fata.

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: Mutane da yawa cikin al'umma da ke da rashin kudi  ba za su iya siyan sabulu ba sai su yi amfani da toka ko ƙasa maimako su.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: Toka ko kasa na iya zama da amfani fiye da zallan ruwa, amma ba zai kai sabulu aiki ba.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: Wata abin damuwa shine idan kasa ko toka ta gurbata da kananan halittu da ido ba su gani, zai iya kara yaduwan cutan a maimakon ya rage ta.

sourceString: Like soap, ash is also a disinfecting agent because in contact with water, it forms an alkaline solution.
targetString: Kamar sabulu, toka shima wakilin sabulune saboda yana iya fitar da kwayar cuta idan aka hada daruwa yana samar da sinadarin Alkaline.

sourceString: WHO recommended ash or sand as alternative to soap when soap is not available.
targetString: Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ba da shawara ayi amfani da toka ko kasa a madadin sabulu idan babu sabulu.

sourceString: Correct handwashing technique recommended by the US Centers for Disease Control  for prevention of transmission of disease includes the following steps:
targetString: Ingantattun hanyoyin wanke hannu da US Centers for Disease Control domin kiyaye yaduwar cuta suna nan kamar haka:

sourceString: Wet hands with warm or cold running water.
targetString: Jika hannaye da ruwan dumi ko ruwan tsanyi wanda ke gudu.

sourceString: Running water is recommended because standing basins may be contaminated, while the temperature of the water does not seem to make a difference.
targetString: An ba da shawaran amfani da ruwa mai gudana saboda ruwa a cikin kwari na iya zama gurbatacce yayinda dumi ko sanyin ruwa ba zai canza komi ba.

sourceString: Lather hands by rubbing them with a generous amount of soap, including the backs of hands, between fingers, and under nails.
targetString: Sa kumfa a hannu ta hanyar gaga su da sabulu sosai, hada da bayan hannu, tsakanin yatsu, da karkashin kusar yatsun.

sourceString: Soap lifts germs from the skin, and studies show that people tend to wash their hands more thoroughly when soap is used rather than water alone.
targetString: Sabulu yana cire ƙwayar cuta daga fata, kuma bincike ya nuna cewa mutane sukan wanke hannayensu sosai lokacin da ake amfani da sabulu maimakon ruwa kaɗai.

sourceString: Scrub for at least 20 seconds.
targetString: Goge na tsawan akalla daƙiƙa 20.

sourceString: Scrubbing creates friction, which helps remove germs from skin, and scrubbing for longer periods removes more germs.
targetString: Gogewa na haifar da karfin rikewa, wanda ke taimakawa wajen cire kwayar cuta daga fata, Kuma goga na tsawon lokaci yakan cire kwayoyi cutan da yawa.

sourceString: Rinse well under running water.
targetString: A dauraye da kyau a ruwa mai gudana.

sourceString: Rinsing in a basin can recontaminate hands.
targetString: Daurayar hannaye acikin kwano yakan iya sake kama hannu.

sourceString: Dry with a clean towel or allow to air dry.
targetString: Bushewa da tawul mai kyaw kokuma a shanya a iska a barshi ya bushe.

sourceString: Wet and moist hands are more easily recontaminated.The most commonly missed areas are the thumb, the wrist, the areas between the fingers, and under fingernails.
targetString: jikaken hannaye ko sukan saurin gurbantawa. Wurare da an fi samun haka sune babban yasa, wuyan hannu, tsakanin hannu da tafin hannu, tsakanin yatsu, da karkashen yatsu.

sourceString: Artificial nails and chipped nail polish may harbor microorganisms.
targetString: Yatsun hannu wanda mutum ya sa da sinadarin goge ƙusan yatsu na iya riƙe ƙwayoyin cuta.

sourceString: Moisturizing lotion is often recommended to keep the hands from drying out; dry skin can lead to skin damage which can increase the risk for the transmission of infection.
targetString: An bada shawarar anfani da ruwan shafa fuska don hana hannayen daga bushewa, fata mai bushewa na iya haifar da lalacewar fata wanda zai iya lalata haɗarin kamuwa da cutar.

sourceString: Various low-cost options can be made to facilitate hand washing where tap-water and/or soap is not available e.g. pouring water from a hanging jerrycan or gourd with suitable holes and/or using ash if needed in developing countries.In situations with limited water supply (such as schools or rural areas in developing countries), there are water-conserving solutions, such as "tippy-taps" and other low-cost options.
targetString: Akwai hanyoyi da yawa masu sauki wadda za a bi don inganta wanke hannu a inda babu ruwan famfo da/ko sabulu misali, zuba ruwa daga jarka da ke a rataye ko kwarya mai ramuka ko kuma amfani da jikin kankana da ramuka da/ko toka in bukata ta tashi a kasashe masu tasowa. A yayinda babu isashen ruwa (kamar makarantu ko kauyuka a kasashe masu tasowa), akwai hanyoyin kiyaye da ruwa kamar ratayayyen jarka da wasu hanyoyi masu sauki.

sourceString: A tippy-tap is a simple technology using a jug suspended by a rope, and a foot-operated lever to pour a small amount of water over the hands and a bar of soap.
targetString: Magudanan ruwa na takawa da kafa ba tare da an sa hannu ba wata fasaha ce mai sauki wanda ya kunshi daura buta da igiya, da inda za a taka da kafa domin ya zubo ruwa kadan a hannaye da sandan sabulu.

sourceString: Effective drying of the hands is an essential part of the hand hygiene process, but there is some debate over the most effective form of drying in public washrooms.
targetString: Busar da hannaye da kyau hanya ce ta tsabtan hannu amma akwai muhawara a kan hanya mafi inganci a busarwa a gidan wankan jama'a.

sourceString: A growing volume of research suggests paper towels are much more hygienic than the electric hand dryers found in many washrooms.
targetString: Binciken haɓaka yanuna kuma yabada shawarar tawul ɗin takarda sun fi bada tsabta fiye da na'urar bushewar hannu ta lantarki da ake samu a ɗakunan wanka da yawa.

sourceString: In 2008, a study was conducted by the University of Westminster, London, and sponsored by the paper-towel industry the European Tissue Symposium, to compare the levels of hygiene offered by paper towels, warm-air hand dryers and the more modern jet-air hand dryers.
targetString: A shekarar 2008, wata bincike da University na Westminster, London, ta yi wanda masana'antan sarafa tawul takarda wato European Tissue Symposium, don kwatanta matakan tsabta da ake samu daga tawul takarda ta yi, dumin-iskar na'uran busar da hannu da na'urar iskar busar da hannu.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with the warm-air dryer, the total number of bacteria was found to increase on average on the finger pads by 194% and on the palms by 254%.
targetString: Bayan wankewa da busar da hannaye da warm-air dryer, an gano da cewa duka lambar kananan hallitu da ba a gani da ido na karuwa a kunbuna da akalla 194% da kuma tafin hannu da 254%.

sourceString: Drying with the jet-air dryer resulted in an increase on average of the total number of bacteria on the finger pads by 42% and on the palms by 15%.
targetString: Bushewa tare da na'urar iskar busarwa a karuwar matsakaicin yawan adadin ƙwayoyin cuta a kan yatsun hannu da 42% kuma a cikin tafin hannu da 15%.

sourceString: After washing and drying hands with a paper towel, the total number of bacteria was reduced on average on the finger pads by up to 76% and on the palms by up to 77%.The scientists also carried out tests to establish whether there was the potential for cross contamination of other washroom users and the washroom environment as a result of each type of drying method.
targetString: Bayan wankewa da busar da hannu da tawul din takarda, duka adadin kwayar cutar bacteria kan kasan yatsu ya ragu da gwargwadon kashi 76% sannan kan tafin hannu har gwargwadon kashi 77%. Masanan kimiyan kuma sun yi wasu gwaje-gwaje domin tabbatar ko za a iya samun gurbata tsakanin masu amfani da bandaki da shi kanshi muhallin bandakin saboda kowanne irin hanyar busarwa.

sourceString: The jet-air dryer, which blows air out of the unit at claimed speeds of 180 m/s (650 km/h; 400 mph), was capable of blowing micro-organisms from the hands and the unit and potentially contaminating other washroom users and the washroom environment up to 2 metres away.
targetString: Mabushin iska mai qirar jirgi mai sauqar ungulu, wanda ke busa iska daga cikin rukunin a kan gudu 180m/s (650km/h; 400mph) yana iya busar da kananun kwayoyin halitta daga hannu da na'urar kuma yakan iya lalata masu anfani da sauran wajan wanke-wanken da muhallin wajan wanke wanken har tsayin meter 2.

sourceString: Use of a warm-air hand dryer spread micro-organisms up to 0.25 metres from the dryer.
targetString: Amfani da na'urar bushewa da dumin iska yana yada kananan kwayoyin cuta har zuwa mita 0.25 daga na'urar bushewar.

sourceString: Paper towels showed no significant spread of micro-organisms.In 2005, in a study conducted by TÜV Produkt und Umwelt, different hand drying methods were evaluated.
targetString: Tawul tarkada ya nuna babu wani yaduwan kananan halittu da ido ba ya iya gani, wato micro-organism. A 2005, a wata bincike da kayyayakin TUV da yanayi, kimanta hanyoyin busar da hannu dabam-dabam.

sourceString: The following changes in the bacterial count after drying the hands were observed:
targetString: Canje-canje masu zuwa a cikin ƙididdigar ƙwayoyin cuta bayan lura da bushewar hannaye:

sourceString: Many different hand dryer manufacturers exist, and hand driers have been compared against drying with paper towels.
targetString: Yawancin masana'antun kayan bushewar hannu sun wanzu, kuma an kwatanta na'urar bushewar hannu da bushewa da tawul ɗin takarda.

sourceString: Hand washing using hand sanitizing wipes is an alternative during traveling in the absence of soap and water.
targetString: Wanke hannu ta hanyar amfani da tsabtace tsutsa hannu shine madadin yayin tafiya yayin da babu sabulu da ruwa.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizer should contain at least 60% alcohol.
targetString: Man tsabtace hannu mai dauke da sinadari alcohol yakamata ya ƙunshi aƙalla kashi 60% na sinadarin alcohol.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing became mandatory long after Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis discovered its effectiveness (in 1846) in preventing disease in a hospital environment.
targetString: Wanke hannu na tsarin likita ya zama tilas wani dan kasar Hungary Ignaz semmelwais ya tabbatar da ingancin sa a shekara ta 1846 don hana yaduwar cutar a farfajiyar asibiti.

sourceString: There are electronic devices that provide feedback to remind hospital staff to wash their hands when they forget.
targetString: Akwai na'urorin lantarki waɗanda ke ba da ra'ayi don tunatar da ma'aikatan asibitin don wanke hannayen su lokacin da suka manta.

sourceString: One study has found decreased infection rates with their use.
targetString: Nazari daya ta samo rage kamuwa da cuta tare da amfanin su.

sourceString: Medical hand-washing is for a minimum of 15 seconds, using generous amounts of soap and water or gel to lather and rub each part of the hands.
targetString: Wankewar hannu na tsarin likitanci yana kai wa akalla tsawan dakikoki 15, tare da amfani da sabulu da ruwa mai yawa ko mai don kumfa da shafawa kowane bangare na hannu.

sourceString: Hands should be rubbed together with digits interlocking.
targetString: A shafa hannaye tare, ta yadda 'yan-yatsu za su yi tsifa.

sourceString: If there is debris under fingernails, a bristle brush may be used to remove it.
targetString: Idan akwai tarkace a karkashin yatsun hanu, ana iya amfani da buroshi domin cire shi.

sourceString: Since germs may remain in the water on the hands, it is important to rinse well and wipe dry with a clean towel.
targetString: Tunda kwayoyi cuta na iya zama cikin ruwan da ya rage a hannayan mu, yana da mahimmanci a dauraye sosai kuma a goge da busasshen tawul mai tsafta.

sourceString: After drying, the paper towel should be used to turn off the water (and open any exit door if necessary).
targetString: Bayan busarwa, ayi amfani da tawul na takardan domin rufe ruwan (bude duk wani kofar fita in ta yiwu).

sourceString: This avoids re-contaminating the hands from those surfaces.
targetString: Wannan yana kiyaye sake gurbata hannaye da wadannan farfajiya.

sourceString: The purpose of hand-washing in the health-care setting is to remove pathogenic microorganisms ("germs") and avoid transmitting them.
targetString: Dalilin wanke hannu a cikin tsarin kula da lafiya shine a cire kwaya cututtukan jini wato pathogenic microorganisms (kwayar cutar) kuma su guji yada su.

sourceString: The New England Journal of Medicine reports that a lack of hand-washing remains at unacceptable levels in most medical environments, with large numbers of doctors and nurses routinely forgetting to wash their hands before touching patients, thus transmitting microorganisms.
targetString: Sabuwar mujalla na magani ta ba da rahoto da cewa wanke hannu a yawancin ma'aikatun lafiya ba abin karbuwa bane, yawancin likitoci da ingozomai sukan manta wanke hannu kafin taba marasa lafiya, wanda ke jawo yaduwan kananan halittu masu yada cuta.

sourceString: One study showed that proper hand-washing and other simple procedures can decrease the rate of catheter-related bloodstream infections by 66 percent.The World Health Organization has published a sheet demonstrating standard hand-washing and hand-rubbing in health-care sectors.
targetString: Bincike ya nuna wanke hannu yadda ya dace kuma dabin sauran hanyoyin masu sauki zasu iya rage adadin catheter-cutar jini mai alaqa da kamuwa da cuta da kashi 66%, hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) ta wallafa wata takarda dake nuna daidaitaccen wanke-wanke da kuma shafa hannu a sassan Lafiya.

sourceString: The draft guidance of hand hygiene by the organization can also be found at its website for public comment.
targetString: Ana iya samun wannan ka'idoji na tsabtan hannu na kugiyan daga sashin yanar gizon ra'ayin jama'a.

sourceString: A relevant review was conducted by Whitby et al.
targetString: Whitby et al. Sun gudanar da bita mai dacewa.

sourceString: Commercial devices can measure and validate hand hygiene, if demonstration of regulatory compliance is required.
targetString: Na'urorin kasuwanci na iya auna tsaftan hannu, idan ana bukatan tsari, ana bukatan yarda.

sourceString: The World Health Organization has "Five Moments" for washing hands:
targetString: Kungiyar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) na da lokuta biyar (Five Moments) na wanke hannaye:

sourceString: after exposure to blood/body fluids
targetString: bayan alaka da abin da ya kunshi jini ko ruwan jiki.

sourceString: before an aseptic task, and
targetString: Kafin aiki aseptic, dakuma

sourceString: after patient care.The addition of antiseptic chemicals to soap ("medicated" or "antimicrobial" soaps) confers killing action to a hand-washing agent.
targetString: bayan jiyyan mara lafiya. Karin sinadarin kashe cuta a sabulu (sabulun "maganin cuta" ko "maganin kwayoyin cuta) yana kara karfin kashe cuta ga man wanke hannu.

sourceString: Such killing action may be desired prior to performing surgery or in settings in which antibiotic-resistant organisms are highly prevalent.To 'scrub' one's hands for a surgical operation, it is necessary to have a tap that can be turned on and off without touching it with the hands, some chlorhexidine or iodine wash, sterile towels for drying the hands after washing, and a sterile brush for scrubbing and another sterile instrument for cleaning under the fingernails.
targetString: Ana iya son irin wannan kisan kafin a yi aikin tiyata ko a saiti, acikin kwayoyin juriya masu daukaka sosai, cuda hannuwa don aikin tiyata, wajibi ne a sami famfo wanda za'a iya kunna da kashewa ba tare da taɓawa da hannu ba, Wasu chlorhexidine ko aidin na wanke abu, bakararren tawul don bushewar hannu bayan an wanke, da bakararren burushi saboda cudawa da kuma wasu bakararren kayan aiki don tsaftace karkashin farce.

sourceString: All jewelry should be removed.
targetString: A cire dukan kayan ado.

sourceString: This procedure requires washing the hands and forearms up to the elbow, usually 2–6 minutes.
targetString: Wannan hanya na bukatan wanke hannaye akalla mintuna 2 zuwa 6.

sourceString: Long scrub-times (10 minutes) are not necessary.
targetString: Dogon lokacin-gogewa (minti 10) ba lallai ba ne.

sourceString: When rinsing, water on the forearms must be prevented from running back to the hands.
targetString: Yayinda ake wanke hannaye, kada a yarda a bar ruwa a gaban hannu yana komawa bayan hannu.

sourceString: After hand-washing is completed, the hands are dried with a sterile cloth and a surgical gown is donned.
targetString: Bayan an gama wanke hannu, hannayen sun bushe da kayan mara tabarau kuma an yi wa kayan wanki tiyata.

sourceString: To reduce the spread of germs, it is better to wash the hands or use a hand antiseptic before and after tending to a sick person.
targetString: Don rage yaduwar kwayar cuta, yana da kyaw a wanke hannuwa ko anfani da sabulun kariya kafin da kuma bayan dubawar mara lafiya.

sourceString: For control of staphylococcal infections in hospitals, it has been found that the greatest benefit from hand-cleansing came from the first 20% of washing, and that very little additional benefit was gained when hand cleansing frequency was increased beyond 35%.
targetString: Domin magance kamuwa da cutan staphylococcal a asibitai, an gano cewa babban amfanin wanke hannu har kashi 20% da karamar karin amfanin wanda aka samo lokacin wanke hannu kullum ya karu fiye da kashi 35%.

sourceString: Washing with plain soap results in more than triple the rate of bacterial infectious disease transmitted to food as compared to washing with antibacterial soap.Comparing hand-rubbing with alcohol-based solution with hand washing with antibacterial soap for a median time of 30 seconds each showed that the alcohol hand-rubbing reduced bacterial contamination 26% more than the antibacterial soap.
targetString: Wankewa da sabulu na yau da kullun yana haifar da sakamako sama da sau uku na ƙwayar cuta ta kwayar cutar zuwa abinci idan aka kwatanta da wanka tare da sabulu mai ƙwayar cuta. Kwatanta hannun-shafa tare da maganin shaye-shaye tare da wankewar hannu tare da sabulu na kwayar cuta na tsawon mintuna 30 na kowannensu ya nuna cewa barasa mai amfani da giya ya rage gurbatar kwayar cuta 26% fiye da sabulu na kwayar cuta.

sourceString: But soap and water is more effective than alcohol-based hand rubs for reducing H1N1 influenza A virus and Clostridium difficile spores from hands.Interventions to improve hand hygiene in healthcare settings can involve education for staff on hand washing, increasing the availability of alcohol-based hand rub, and written and verbal reminders to staff.
targetString: Amma sabulu da ruwa yafi inganci akan sinadarin man alcohol wanda ake gogawa don raguwar H1N1 na cutar amai da gudawa dakuma clostridium defficile spores daga hannu, Ayyuka don inganta tsabtace hannu a cikin tsarin kula da lafiya na iya haɓaka ilimi ga ma'aikata a kan wanke hannu, da wadatar samar da sinadarin wanke hannu na goga wa da rubutattun fi'iloli da tunatarwa ga ma'aikatan.

sourceString: There is a need for more research into which of these interventions are most effective in different healthcare settings.
targetString: Akwai buƙatar ƙarin bincike, a gano aciki wannen suka fi tasiri a tsarin kulawa da lafiya daban-daban.

sourceString: In developing countries, hand washing with soap is recognized as a cost-effective, essential tool for achieving good health, and even good nutrition.
targetString: A kasashe masu tasowa, ana ganin wanke hannu da sabulu a matsayin hanya mai sauki, hanya mai kyau na samun lafiya, da ma cin abinci mai kyau.

sourceString: However, a lack of reliable water supply, soap or hand washing facilities in people's homes, at schools and at the workplace make it a challenge to achieve universal hand washing behaviors.
targetString: Ko da yake rashin ingantaccen ruwan sha, sabulu da kayan wanke hannu a gidaje, makarantu da wurin aiki ya sa yazama ƙalubale don cimma yanayin wanke hannu na duniya.

sourceString: For example, in most of rural Africa hand washing taps close to every private or public toilet are scarce, even though cheap options exist to build hand washing stations.
targetString: Misali a mafi yawan yankunan karkara na afirca famfunan wanke hannu na kusa da bayan gida na gwamnati kona gida yana da karanci, dukda cewa akwai zaɓuɓɓuka masu arha don gina tashoshin wanke hannu.

sourceString: However, low hand washing rates rather can also be the result of engrained habits rather than due to a lack of soap or water.
targetString: Kodayake ƙarancin filin wanke-wanke yana iya zama sakamakon al'ada maimakon rashin sabulu da ruwa.

sourceString: The promotion and advocacy of hand washing with soap can influence policy decisions, raise awareness about the benefits of hand washing and lead to long-term behavior change of the population.
targetString: Bayar da shawarwari a kan wanke hannu da sabulu na iya yin tasiri wurin yanke shawara, kara sani a kan muhimmancin wanke hannu kuma na iya kawo canjin halayan mutane.

sourceString: For this to work effectively, monitoring and evaluation are necessary.
targetString: Don wannan yayi aiki yadda yakamata, saka idanu da kimantawa wajibi ne.

sourceString: A systematic review of 70 studies found that community-based approaches are effective at increasing hand washing in LMICs, while social marketing campaigns are less effective.One example for hand washing promotion in schools is the "Three Star Approach" by UNICEF that encourages schools to take simple, inexpensive steps to ensure that students wash their hands with soap, among other hygienic requirements.
targetString: A wata bita na bincike guda 70 ta nuna hanyan wayar da kai kan wanke hannu cikin al'umma ta fi inganci a wajen kara amincewa da wanke hannu a LMICs, sannan camfen na tallan jama'a ba shi da wani inganci mai kyau. Wata misali domin wayar da kai kan wanke hannu a makarantu shine “Three Star Approach” wadda UNICEF ta kago wanda ke karfafa makarantu su dauki matakai marasa sada domin ganin cewa dalibai sun wanke hannayensu da sabulu, tare da wasu hanyoyi na tsafta.

sourceString: When minimum standards are achieved, schools can move from one to ultimately three stars.
targetString: Idan aka iya cimma burin,makarantu na iya masawa zuwa fanni na tauraron karshe.

sourceString: Building hand washing stations can be a part of hand washing promotion campaigns that are carried out in order to reduce diseases and child mortality.
targetString: Gina wuraren wanke hannu na iya zama hanya ta kamfen da gabatarwa da ake yi domin rage cututtuka da mutuwan yara kanana.

sourceString: Global Hand washing Day is another example of an awareness-raising campaign that is trying to achieve behavior change.As a result of the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, UNICEF promoted the adoption of a handwashing emoji.
targetString: Ranar wanke hannu na duniya wata misali ce ta kara sani da ke kokarin canza halaya. Sakamakon anobar cutan coronavirus 2019-20, UNICEF ta inganta amfani da emoji na wanke hannu.

sourceString: Few studies have considered the overall cost effectiveness of hand washing in developing countries in relationship to DALYs averted.
targetString: ''Yan nazarin kalilan sun yi la'akari da tasirin farashin wanke hannu a kasashe masu tasowa, a cikin alaƙar da aka hana DALY.

sourceString: However, one review suggests that promoting hand washing with soap is significantly more cost-effective than other water and sanitation interventions.
targetString: Koyaya, an bada shawara cewa inganta wanke hannu da sabulu yana da matukar tasiri fiye da sauran ruwa da tsabta.

sourceString: The importance of hand washing for human health – particularly for people in vulnerable circumstances like mothers who had just given birth or wounded soldiers in hospitals – was first recognized in the mid 19th century by two pioneers of hand hygiene: the Hungarian physician Ignaz Semmelweis who worked in Vienna, Austria and Florence Nightingale, the English "founder of modern nursing".
targetString: Muhimmancin wanke hannu domin lafiya mutum musamman ma mutanen da ke mummunan yanayi kamar uwaye da suka haihu ko kuma sojoji da suke da rauni a asibiti tana da asali ne a tsakiyan karni ta sha tara (19th Century) ta wurin majagaba na tsabtan hannu guda biyu. ikitan Hugary Ignaz Semmelweis wanda ya yi aiki a Vienna, Austria da Florence Nightingale, baturiya “da ta kafa reno na zamani”.

sourceString: At that time most people still believed that infections were caused by foul odors called miasmas.
targetString: A lokacin can yawancin mutane sun gaskanta cewa kamuwa da cutar na faruwa ne ta wurin wani wari mai suna miasmas.

sourceString: In the 1980s, foodborne outbreaks and healthcare-associated infections led the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to more actively promote hand hygiene as an important way to prevent the spread of infection.
targetString: A shekarun 1980, barkewar cuta daga abinci da haɗarin kamuwa da cuta don rashin kulawa da lafiya ya kai Cibiyar Kula da Cututtuka da Kariya na U.S. wato U.S Center for Disease Control and Prevention ga karfafawar tsabtacewar hannu a matseyin hanya mai dacewa ga kariya daga yaduwar cututtuka.

sourceString: The outbreak of swine flu in 2009 and the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 led to increased awareness in many countries of the importance of washing hands with soap to protect oneself from such infectious diseases.
targetString: Cutar amai da gudawa a shekara ta 2009 da cutar ta COVID-19 a 2020 ta haifar da fadakarwa a kasashe da dama mahimmancin wanke hannu da sabulu don kare kai daga irin wannan cutar.

sourceString: For example, posters with "correct hand washing techniques" were hung up next to hand washing sinks in public toilets and in the toilets of office buildings and airports in Germany.
targetString: A misali, an rataya takaddan wayar da kai mai dauke da “hanyoyi ingantattu na wanke hannu,” kusa da inda ake wanke hannu a wurin bayi na jama'a da kuma wurin ba haya na ma'aikatu da filiayen jiragen sama a Jamus.

sourceString: The phrase "washing one's hands of" something, means declaring one's unwillingness to take responsibility for the thing or share complicity in it.
targetString: Kalamai nan "wanke hannun wani" wani abu, yana nufin ayyana waɗanda basu yarda ba su ɗauki alhakin abin ko kuma suka yi tarayya cikin wahala.

sourceString: It originates from the bible passage in Matthew where Pontius Pilate washed his hands of the decision to crucify Jesus Christ, but has become a phrase with a much wider usage in some English communities.
targetString: Ya samo asali daga nassi na Baibul a cikin matthew, inda Pontius Pilate ya wanke hannun sa don giciye Yesu Kristi, amma sun zama zance tare da yawan yin amfani cikin al'uman Turanci.

sourceString: In Shakespeare's Macbeth, Lady Macbeth begins to compulsively wash her hands in an attempt to cleanse an imagined stain, representing her guilty conscience regarding crimes she had committed and induced her husband to commit.
targetString: A takaddan Shakespeare mai suna Macbeth, Lady Macbeth ta fara naciyan wanke hannaye da tunanin share tabo da take tunani, wadda ya nuna lamirinta ya kasheta a kan laifi da ta aikata kuma ta sa mijinta aikatawa.

sourceString: It has also been found that people, after having recalled or contemplated unethical acts, tend to wash hands more often than others, and tend to value hand washing equipment more.
targetString: An kuma gano cewa wasu mutane sukan wanke hannayensu sau da yawa, fiye da sauran jama'a bayan sun yi tunanin aikata wani abin da ya saba wa doka, kuma sukan martaba kayan wanke hannu fiye da saura.

sourceString: Furthermore, those who are allowed to wash their hands after such a contemplation are less likely to engage in other "cleansing" compensatory actions, such as volunteering.
targetString: Bugu da kari, wadanda aka barsu su wanke hannayensu bayan irin wannan ayukan ba a samani za su yi wani aikin tsaftacewa na ramako, kamar sadaukarwa.

sourceString: Religions prescribe hand washing for both hygienic and symbolic purposes.Symbolic hand washing, using water but no soap to wash hands, is a part of ritual hand washing featured in many religions, including Bahá'í Faith, Hinduism, tevilah and netilat yadayim in Judaism, Lavabo in Christianity, and Wudhu in Islam.Religions also prescribe hygienic hand washing, especially after certain actions.
targetString: Addinai suna gargadin wanke hannu domin tsabta da alaman ibada. Wanke hannu domin ibada, amfani da ruwa amma banda sabulu domin wanke hannaye, yana cikin wanke hannu domin ibada a addinai da yawa, ya hada da Imanin Baha'i, Hinduism, tevilah da netilat yadayim a Judaism, Lavado a Kiristanci, da wundu a Islam. Addinai su ma suna gargadin tsabtan wanke hannu, musamman bayan wasu ayuka.

sourceString: Hinduism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands after using the toilet.
targetString: Addinin hindu, juda da addinin musulunci sun yarda da wanke hannaye bawai anfani da bayan gida.

sourceString: And, Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism and Islam mandate washing of hands before and after every meal.
targetString: Sannan Hinduism, Buddhism, Sikhism, Judaism da Islam suna da umurnin wanke hannu kafin a ci abinci ko bayan kowanne cin abinci.

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19
targetString: Kula da hadarin wurin aiki domin cutar COVID-19

sourceString: Workplace hazard controls for COVID-19 are the application of occupational safety and health methodologies for hazard controls to the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Lura da hadarin wurin aiki daga CoVID-19 suna kariya a wurin aiki da hanyoyin kiwon lafiya don lura da hadari zuwa kare mutane daga kamuwa da cutar coronavirus COVID-19 shekarar 2019.

sourceString: The proper hazard controls in the workplace depend on the worksite and job task, based on a risk assessment of sources of exposure, disease severity in the community, and risk factors of individual workers who may be vulnerable to contracting COVID-19.
targetString: Lurawa na kwarai ga hadari a wurin aiki ya danganta ga yanayin wurin aikin da aikin, dangane da bincikan hadari dake tare da wurin yaduwan cutar, tsananin cutar a al'uma, da kuma hadari dake tare da ma'aikata wanda suna iya kamuwa da COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers, for which basic infection prevention measures are recommended, including hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Dangane da Hukumar Kula da Lafiya da Kiwon Lafiya wato Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), hadarin bayyana ga kankantan aikin huldawa tare da jama'a da wasu abokan aiki wanda ake bada shawarar matakan kariya na kamuwa da cuta, hade da wanke hannu, karfafa ma'aikata su kasance a gida idan ba su da lafiya, Da'awar numfashi, shara na yau da kullun, share da kashe kwayar cuta a yanayin wurin aiki.

sourceString: Medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact with people who are not known or suspected with COVID-19, but may be infected due to ongoing community transmission or international travel.
targetString: Aiki wadanda suke da haɗarin cutar sun haɗa da waɗanda ke buƙata kulum ko huldawa da mutane ba a san su ba ko zaton suna da cutar COVID-19, amma suna iya kamuwa saboda yaduwar da ke kan faruwa cikin al'umma ko tafiya kasar waje.

sourceString: This includes workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.
targetString: Hakan ya hada da ma'aikata wadanda suke da hulɗa da jama'a kamar makarantu, yanayin da akwai yawan jama'a, da wuraren da ake yawan saye-saye.

sourceString: Hazard controls for this group, in addition to basic infection prevention measures, include ventilation using high-efficiency air filters, sneeze guards, and having personal protective equipment available in case a person with COVID-19 is encountered.
targetString: Kulawar haɗari ga wadannan rukuni, bugu da kari game da hanyoyin karewar daga kamuwa da cuta ya hada da, na'urar bada iska wanda ke amfani da abun tacewar iska maikyau, abin rufe atishawa da samun kayayyakin sa a jiki idan har akwai wanda ya kamu da cutar COVID-19.

sourceString: OSHA considers healthcare and mortuary workers exposed to known or suspected person with COVID-19 to be at high exposure risk, which increases to very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected person with COVID-19.
targetString: OSHA tana ɗaukar ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya da ma'aikatan gidan da aka fallasa ga sanannen mutum ko wanda ake zargi da COVID-19 kasance cikin haɗarin haɗari sosai, wanda ke ƙaruwa zuwa babban haɗarin haɗuwa idan ma'aikata suka bi ka'idar fesawar aerosl, ko tattarawa ko sarrafa samfuran daga, sanannu ko mutumin da ake zaton yana da cutar COVID-19.

sourceString: Hazard controls appropriate for these workers include engineering controls such as negative pressure ventilation rooms, and personal protective equipment appropriate to the job task.
targetString: Lurawar hadari wanda ke daidai ga ma'aikata na hade da lurar Injiniya kamar su dakin matsin na'urar iska, da kayayyakin kariyar ma'aikata wanda ya dace ga aikin.

sourceString: COVID-19 outbreaks can have several effects within the workplace.
targetString: Barkewar cOVID-19 na iya samun matsaloli dayawa daga wuring aiki.

sourceString: Workers may be absent from work due to becoming sick, needing to care for others, or from fear of possible exposure.
targetString: Ma'aikata ka iya yin fashi aiki saboda rashin lafiya, ko don su kula da wasu, ko don tsoron kamuda da cutar.

sourceString: Patterns of commerce may change, both in terms of what goods are demanded, and the means of acquiring these goods (such as shopping at off-peak hours or through delivery or drive-through services).
targetString: Tsarin kasuwanci na iya canzawa, har ta bangaren wande irin kaya ake bukata, da yadda za ‘a samar da kayayyakin (Kamar sayen kaya a cikin dare ko ta hanyar drive-through sabis wato).

sourceString: Lastly, shipments of items from geographic areas severely affected by COVID-19 may be interrupted.An infectious disease preparedness and response plan can be used to guide protective actions.
targetString: A karshe, kuma kayan da aka turo a nahiyoyi wuraren da ke da tsananin cutar COVID-19 na iya katsewa. Shiryawa don cuta wanda ke yaduwa za a iya amfani da tsarin amsa a mataseyin jagorar aikin kariya.

sourceString: Plans address the levels of risk associated with various worksites and job tasks, including sources of exposure, risk factors arising from home and community settings, and risk factors of individual workers such as old age or chronic medical conditions.
targetString: Tsari mai kyau ne yake rage hadarin dake tattare da wuraren ayuka da aikin yi, ya hada da inda aka kamu da cuta, lamuran tasowar hadarin daga gida da yanayin al'umma, da lamuran hadarin masun aiki kamar yawan shekaru ko wata yanayin lafiya mai tsanani.

sourceString: They also outline controls necessary to address those risks, and contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of outbreaks.
targetString: Sun nuna tsarin lura wanda sun dace ga hadarorin, da tsarin gaba domin irin wannan hali wanda zai iya faruwa kum domin barkewar.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: Shirin cututtuka masun yadawa da shirin amsawa za su iya zama taken shawarwarin kasa ko gefen kasa.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: Manufofin samun bayanai idan an samu bulluwar cuta ya hada da rage yaduwarsa a tsakanin ma'aikata, kare lafiyar mutanen da ake ganin yafi saurin kamasu, gyara tsarin kasuwanci da muka rage cakuduwar wasu wanda suke kan tsarin.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: CUtar na da tasiri a unguwani inda sana'o'i ke gudana.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: Bibiyar lurawan hadari wata tsari ne wanda ake amfani da ita ko ina cikin lafiyar wuring aiki da lafiya zuwa hadarin rukuni ta muhimanci.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: Inda baza a iya cirewar hadarin COVID-19 ba, lura mafi kyau su ne lurar injiniya, lurar gudanarwa ke bi, a karshe kayayyakin kariyar sa a jiki.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: Lurar Injiniya ya danganta ga warewar ma'aikata daga hadarin da ta shafi aiki ba tare da dogara kan halayen ma'aikata ba, kuma zai zama mafita mai arha wanda aka aiwatar.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: Hukumar lura na canja yanayin aiki da tsari da zai bukaci hobbasa na ma'aikaci.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.
targetString: Kayayyakin kariya wato Personal Protective Equipent (PPE) ana ganin kamar baida karfin kariya amma zai taimaka wajen rage wata cutar, amma zai iya rage kamuwa da cutan.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: Duk na'uin PPE dole a zabe su kafin hadarin ya afku ga ma'aikaci, asa shi yadda ya kamata (Ms. abin numfashi), asahi akoda yaushe kuma da kyau, kuma a rika duba shi akai-akai, a kuma canja idan ya kama kuma a cire, a wanke, a addana shi da kyau don gudun shina ya jirkita.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.
targetString: Bisa ga Kariyar Wurin Aiki da Gudanarwar Lafiya wato Occupational Safety and Health Administration na U.S. (OSHA), karamin bayyana cikin hadarin wurin aiki na da kankancin huldawar ma'aikaci da jama'a da wasu ma'aikaci.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.
targetString: Asali tsarin kariya daga kamuwa da cuta ya bada shawarar ga duk wuraren aiki sun hada da cikakken wanke hanu kullum, karfafarwa ma'aikata su kasance a gida idan ba su da lafiya, da'ar hanyoyin numfashi tare da rufin tari da atishawa, samarwar rumbun takarda da shara, shirya wajen aiki daga gida ko kuma juyin jefi-jefi idan an buƙaci haka, hana ma'aikata daga amfani da kayan aikin da kayan wasu, da kiyaye tsabtatawar rage cutan da kuma lalata yanayin aiki.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: Saurin Ganowa da kuma kebe wanda suke da cutar shine hanya mafi inganci wanjen kare lafiyar ma'aikat, kwastamomi. baki da kuma wanda suke wuraren aikin su.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.
targetString: Sashen bangaren kula da cututtuka da kariya na U.S. wato U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) tace ma'aikata da suke da alamomin ciwon numashi su zauna a gida har sai sun warke, idan alamun zazzabi ya dade har ya kai tsawon awa 24 batare da ya ragu ba ko alamar bai jin magani kuma hutun rashin lafiya yayi daidai to abar ma;aikaci ya zauna agida ya yi jinyar mara lafiyar tunda sun san tsare-tsaren.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.
targetString: A fadawar OSHA, aiki wadanda suke da haɗarin cutar sun haɗa da waɗanda ke buƙata kulum ko huldawa tsakanin ƙafa shida (1.8 m) na mutanen da ba a san su ba ko kuma waɗanda ake ganin suna da cutar COVID-19, amma suna iya kamuwa da SARS-CoV-2 saboda yaduwar cutar tsakanin al'umma a wuraren kasuwanci, ko kuma saboda wani yayi tafiya a wata ƙasa zuwa wani wuri mai wanda yaduwar COVID-19 ya faru.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers' concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.
targetString: Waɗannan sun haɗa da ma'aikata waɗanda ke da hulɗa tare da dukan jama'a kamar a makarantu, wuraren aiki mai yanayin aiki wanda akwai yawan jama'a kwarai da gaske, da wuraren da ake yawan saye-saye. Sarrafawar injiniya don wannan da rukuni masun hadari ya hada da girkawar ingantaciyar mataciyar iska, karin adadin na'urar iska, girkawar shingen zahiri kamar na'uran roba na kariyar atishawa, da girkawar tagar drive-through domin hidimar abokan ciniki. Lura na mai gudanarwa domin wannan da rukuni mafi hadari wanda suka hada da karfafa ma'aikacin da ba su da lafiya su zauna a gida, canza haduwar fuska-ta-fuska da sadarwar nesa, kaddamar da juying aiki, bar tafiye-tafiyen da babu kan ta zuwa inda akwai barkewar cutar COVID-19, haɓaka tsarin sadarwa na gaggawa hade da taron amsa damuwan ma'aikatan, samar da ma'aikata ingantaccen ilimi da horo kan dalilan haɗarin COVID-19 da halayyar kariya, ma'aikatan horo waɗanda suke buƙatar yin amfani da kare sutura da kayan aiki yadda za a yi amfani da shi, samar da albarkatu da yanayin aiki wanda ke inganta tsabtace mutum, buƙatar wanke hannu na yau da kullun, iyakance abokan ciniki da kuma damar samun dama ga masu aiki, da kuma sanya hannu kan batun Wanke hannu da sauran matakan kariya na COVID-19.Doke kan aikin, ma'aikatan da ke da hatsarin aƙalla na matsakaici na iya buƙatar sa kayan kariya na sirri da suka haɗa da wasu safofin hannu, gown, garkuwar fuska ko abin rufe fuska, ko goggles.

sourceString: Workers in this risk group rarely require use of respirators.
targetString: Ma'aikaci wanda suke a cikin rukunin masun hadari suna bukatar amfani da na'uran iska.

sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Idan mutum ya kamu da rashin lafiya a cikin jirgin sama, madaidaiciyar iko don kare ma'aikata da sauran fasinjoji sun haɗa da rarrabe mara lafiya da wasu tazara ta ƙafa 6, zayyana daya daga cikin matukan jirgin don bautar da mara lafiya, da kuma bayar da abin rufe fuska ga mara lafiya ko tambayar mai mara lafiyar ya rufe bakinsu da hanci da kyallen takarda yayin tari ko atishawa.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.
targetString: Masu bin jirgin ruwa su sa safar hannun asibiti lokacin da ake kula da matafiyin mara lafiya ko tabawar ruwan jiki ko yiwuwar gurbatan muhalli, da yiwuwar ƙarin kayan aikin kariya idan matafiyi mara lafiyan na da zazzabi, tari mai dauriya, ko wahalar numfashi.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.
targetString: Safar hannu da sauran abubuwan da za'a iya zubar dasu a cikin jakar hadarin kwayoyin, fuskar abubawa wanda suna da cutar yakamata a tsabtace shi kuma a cire cutar bayan haka. Don jigilar kasuwanci, hade da jiragen shakatawa da sauran jiragen fasinjoji, sarrafa haɗari sun haɗa da jinkirta tafiya lokacin rashin lafiya, da waren kai da kuma sanar da cibiyar kula da lafiya kai tsaye idan mutum ya kamu da zazzabi ko wasu alamun yayin da ake tafiya.

sourceString: Ideally, medical follow-up should occur in the isolated person's cabin.For schools and childcare facilities, CDC recommends short-term closure to clean or disinfect if an infected person has been in a school building regardless of community spread.
targetString: Mafi kyawu abi da tsarin kiwon lafiya a wurin da ake kebe mutane. A makarantu da wurin kula da yara, CDC tace yakamata a dan rufe su don a samu a tsaftace wurin koda an samu mai dauke da ciwon da makaratar batare da dubiya da yaduwarsa a unguwaba.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.
targetString: Idan akwai dan yaduwa cutar kadan a al-umma, sai a samu tsarin bada tazara kamar hana zirga-zirga, taro, harda manya tarurruka kamar daura or ajin choir, ko wurin cin abinci, sai a matsar da tebura, da lokutan tashi, rage masu ziyara wandanda basu zama wajibi ba, da kuma ware wani sashe na yare wanda suke da alamun mura.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.
targetString: Lokacin da akwai yaduwar cuta cikin al'umar gida, bugu da kari ga zaman nesa, dogon kwanakin hutu daga makarantu ana iya sa cikin lisafi. Ga ma'aikacin iyansanda wadanda su ke aikinsu na yau da kullum, hadarin kamuwa da cutan yana kasa haka CDC suka fada.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.
targetString: Jami'an mahukunta wadanda dole ne su hadu da mutanen da aka same su da cutar ko ake zaton suna da COVID-19 ana shawartarsu da bin dokokin gaggawa na masun aikin asibiti, tare da ingantaccen kayan aikin kariya.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: idan an samu huldawa lokacin tsoro, ma'aikaci su share da tsaftace kayayyakin aikin su kafin a sake aiki da su ta amfani da abin fesawa na gida ko sharewa, da bin umurin amfani da su domin isawa da yarwa da PPE wanda aka yi amfani da ita da wanke kayan sa wa.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: OSHA na duba yiwuwar wani bangaren kiwon lafiya da ma'aikata wurin ajiye gawa domin zama a tsaye domin hadarin kamuwa da cutan.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Hadarin ayuka wadanda ke da bayyanarwar mutum sun hadu da ma'aikan kiwon lafiya, tallafi, dakin gwaji da ma'aikatan jigilar asibiti wadanda a bayyanai suke ga mai kamu da cutan ko wanda ake zato na da COVID-19.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Sukan zama cikin hadari sosai idan ma'aikata suka bi ka'idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating, ko amsar abun gwaji daga wanda ake zargin nada coVID-19.

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: ka'idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosal generating pocedures ya hada da shigarwa, kakalo tari , da kuma ain da ya shafiy huhu da sauransu.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: Wanda hadarin yafi akansu sune aikin gidan ajiye gawa sun hada da ma'aikaci wadanda ke gyara gawakin mutanen da aka san su ko ana ganin kamar suna dauke da COVID-19 a lokacin mutuwar su; wadanan suna da hadari sosai idan sun gwada gawan. Karin sarrafawar injiniya a wadannan rukuni masun hadarin cutar ya hada da dakunan kebe wadanda suka kamu da cutar ko wadanda ake zato suna da COVID-19 duk lokacin ka'idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating procedures.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Na'urar bada iska na musamman ya kan iya zaman daidai a wasu wuraren kiwo lafiya wuraren dakunan ajiye gawaki.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Ya kamata a rike dukan samfura da matakan kariya uku na lafiyar halita wato Biosafety Level 3 prcaution.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) sun bada shawarar cewa a kebe sabbin marasa lafiya a wasu wurare daban zai dangata ko wani ne wanda ya kamu da cutar COVID-19.. Bugu da kari zuwa wasu PPE, OSHA an shawarta yin amfani da na'urar bada iska ga wadanda suke aiki tsakanin kafa 6 ga marasa lafiyan da aka sani ko wanda ake gani na da cutar, SARS-COV-2, da wadanda ke yin ka'idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating procedures.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: A kasar Amurka, NIOSH ta amince da N95 don tace abin numfashi ko ma yin amfani dasu da kyau, an samu kariya wanda ya hada da gwaji mai kyau, karantarwa da kuma gwajin asibiti.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Wasu na'uran iska suna iya karewa mai kyau tare da inganta jin dadin ma'aikata. WHO ba ta amince yin amfani da kabido ba, don COVID-19 ciwon ne na hanyar numfashi wanda ke yaduwa ta hanyar ruwan jiki.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO ta shawarta cewa abun rufe fuska na asibiti ya dace ga ma'aikan dubawa don point-of-entry.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Ga wadanda ke karban samfuring gwajin hanyar numfashi daga, lura wa, ko tafiyar da wanda ya kamu da COVID-19 ba tare da ka'idar fesawar aerosl ba wato aerosol-generating procedure, WHO ta shawarta cewa, abin rufe fuskar tiyata, tabarau, ko garkuwar fuska, babban riga, da safar hannu.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Idan an bi ka'idar fesawar aerosl wato aerosol-generating akayi, zai mayar da gurbin amfani da abin rufe fuskar asibiti wato N95 ko abin numfashi FFP2.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Ganin cewa wadatarwar PPE a duniya bai isa ba, WHO ta ba da shawarar rage buƙatar PPE ta hanyar ba da magunguna ta hanyar sadarwa, shinge na jiki kamar wani budadeyar abun rufe fuska, barin waɗanda ke da hannu cikin kulawa kai tsaye su shiga daki da mai kamu da cutar COVID-19 yake, yin amfani da PPE kawai don takamaiman aikin, ci gaba da amfani da na'urar bada iska wanda aka saba ba tare da cire shi ba yayin da kulawa da marasa lafiya da yawa da cuta iri daya, lura da daidaita wadatarwar yawan PPE, da kuma hana amfani da abin rufe fuska ga mutane da suke da alamar cutar.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: DAGA: Katherine Maher, Shugaban Gidauniyar Wikimedia

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: ZUWA: Dukka Ma'akacin Gidauniyar Wikimedia

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: LAYIN TAKE: [Covid-19] Ragewar kayan da kuma shiri don gaba

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: TURA KWANA/LOKACI: Ranar 14 ga watan Maris, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: Bada dama: CC0: No rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Mun samu kanmu cikin wani yanayi kwarai a wannan watan.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Annobar COVID-19 wani abu ne da ke bayyanarwar dangantakar mu a duniya da kuma nauyin da ya rataya ga kowanen mu.

sourceString: We don't have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Ba mu da fi son domin kalubale, amma mun tsani cewa, amsar mu ya danganta ga tausayawa, hadin gwiwa da ginan al'uma wanda yake zaune cikin zuciyar gungiyar.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Zaman tare da kulawa da muka gani a cikin dukkanin abokan aikin namu kan imel, kira, da taɗi wani tabbaci ne na tabbataccen mutane muna da sa'a sosai don aiki tare.

sourceString: I couldn't be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Bazan yi kasa a gwuiwa ba na insaku cikin abokan aikina ba.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Makon jiya, wani ya raba godiyar sa ga aikin mu

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Sun tunastar da ni yaddan duniyar ta iya sauya Wikipea ayanzu, wanda ta zama zakaran gwajin dafi ta kasance bude a yanar gizo kuma ga kowa

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Ayyukan ka sun sa wannan ya yiwu, shin ka kiyaye shafukan yanar gizon su tsaya ko abokan aikinmu sun biya ko kuma daga ajiyar al'ummomin mu.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Duniya tana bukatar bayanan da Wikipeidia ka bayarwa, fiye da haka yanzu.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Wannan lokaci ne wanda ba abin da mu ke yi ba ne, amma yadda muka yi shi, hakan zai tasiri sosai ga duniya.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Saboda amfani mqnufqr wannan da kuma irin rawar da zaka taka zamu yi wasu yan canje-canje a tsarin aikin namu wanda hakan zai fara a mako mai zuwa.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Daidaitawa ga aikin mu da tsarin aiki

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Kamar yadda Robyn ya ce, su kungiya c wato c-team sun hadu a daren jiya sun tattauna kusantar mu da tsari don kwanaki da watanni masu zuwa.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we're facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: A wannan zancen, mun duba abin da mu ka ga zai dace ga amsar abin da mu ke fuskanta da kuma kyakyawar hanya wanda zai rike kungiyar ta dace a wannan lokacin.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Muna so mu cire damuwa da tallafawa manufan mu ga dogon lokacin.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that's okay.
targetString: Idan kana son kara kira, shikenan.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Don duka ma'aikata, Yan kwangila da ma'aikatancu/

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: Zatan aikin mu na ko wace rana zai zama kamar sa'oi 4 a rana, ko sa'oi 20 a mako har sai sanarwan nan gaba.

sourceString: We're not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Ba zamu ba da hutu ba - idan zaka iya aiki sosai a sa'oin da aka saba, kungiyar za to iya aiki da kai.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Duk da haka, ba za a iya annabtar duniya a yanzu ba, kuma ya kamata a lura da kaunattatu, saya kayan miya, ko je wurin likita, lafiyar ku shine fifikon mu.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Ba mu bi lokacin ka

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Idan ba ku da lafiya, kada ku yi aiki

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we're saying it.
targetString: Wannan ya tafi batare da an yi magana ba, amma muna maganan sa.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Babu ranar ciwo ko bukatar PTO fada wa manajan ku da taimakon sake kalandar kungiyar ku da tsarin tabbatar muhimin panin aiki.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Idan an maku gwaji aka tabbatar kuna dauke da cutar COVID-19, to kabar Bryan cikin T&C Ops san haka T&C zai taimaka wajen tabbatar da cewa lamarin ya samu kulawa ta mussamman).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Za a biya cikakke Jama'ar sa'oi.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Mun riga mun ce, kuma muna girmama dukkanin sadaukarwar mu ga iyar kwangilar mu da ma'aikata abokanin aikin sa'oi.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Za a biya kowa daidai da yanayin aikin da suka yi na awoyi kamar yadda yake.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Wannan ya hada da idan kana ciwo kuma ka kasa yin aiki.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Idan zaku yii aiki, zamu tallafa maka.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Mutane da yawa suna mafani da aiki a matsayin hanyar turo matsalolin su a duniya kewaye da mu.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Abin da muke yi na iya zama mai bada ladan gaske, musamman irin wadannan lokutan.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Haka kuma wannan game da kula da kaine

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Aikin mu shine yin magana da manajanka, sabo da mu san me muke bukata da yadda za mu iya daidaita.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Wasu ayyukan suna da muhimmanci.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Akwai wasu abubuwan da ya kamata mu ci gaba da yi.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: SRE, HR Ops, Dogaro da aminci, da teamsungiyoyin tara kuɗi (a tsakanin sauran) suna yin aiki mai mahimmanci wanda ke buƙatar ƙarin tallafi.

sourceString: We'll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what's essential for our mission.
targetString: Za mu fara aiwatar da dukkan sashin don tantance manufofin yanzu kuma musanya hankali kan tallafawa abin da ke da muhimmanci a aikin mu.

sourceString: There's plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Akwai sauran aiki mai yawa akanmu, amma zamu mai da hankali akan masu muhimmanci.

sourceString: Slowing now won't hurt later.
targetString: Raguwa yanzu ba zai cutar ba nan gaba.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Bama shirin tafiya “karo-lokaci sau biyu don a cimma buri” idan annoban ta kare..

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Baza a so ku yin aiki da karin awa ba domin yanzu lokacin gama aikin ba abu ne mai yiwuwa ba.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Mun yardacewa yanayi ya canja, kuma zamu yi aikin da zai samar da sabbin tsare-tsare aka lokaci idan ya kama.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Me ya faru da APP (Tsarin Shekara)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Don iya canza zuwa yanayin yanzu da sa'oin ayukan mu na yau da kullum, muna tunanin canza lokacin domin iya kai ga tsarin mu na shekara 2020-2021

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: NIyyarmu shine mu kara jan tsarin mu na shekara 2019-2020 wanda zai bada lokacin kasafin kudi sosai don barin ma'aikata su bada hankalin su ga muhimin ayyuka, kulawar kai, da kulawar kaunatattu yayinda ake barin wadanda suke bukatar ko son aiki a ragen tsarin lokaci a cikin makonai masu zuwa.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Karin wannan lokacin ya kara rage shirin nauyin aiki da matsi a fadin kungiyar.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Zamu tura tsarin mu ga tsangayarmu mako mai zuwa tare da sabbin jami'ai da kungiya a kan tsarin mu na gaba don tabbatarwa.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Na gode wa kungiyar APP saboda jagoranci ku a wannan.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Matsayin ofishi, cikin hadari, da tsaftacewa

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: A makon da ta gabata mun samu cewa daya daga cikin ma'aikacin na SF-BASEDya kamu da cutar COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Duk da haka, cikin yawaltar kiyayewa, mun samo wata ƙungiya masu tsabtacewar kwayan cuta domin su share dukan farfajiya a ofishin mu na San Francisco.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: A goge ko ina da abin kashe kwayoyin cuta don hana yaduwar cuta a wuri, harda hanyoyi da bangaren lungu na kasa.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Ginin na samun sabon yanayi na tsarin kulawa da lura na kayyayaki don tabbatar da lafiyar mutanenta.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Muna jin dadin cewa za a shirya ofishin duk lokacin da muka shirya dawowa.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Ofishin mu na DC wanda yake WeWork, wanda ya baiyanar da tsarin CoVID-19 damu da duk wani ma'aikacin DC-BASED

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: A makon da ta gabata, Ofishin mu na DC suka zama cikakken wuri tare da bayanan kariya daga San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Kamar wasu abokan aikinmu wandanda ke da zama a NYC sun san,muna cikin tattaunawa game da bayar da wata wuri Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Ana cin gaba da wadannan zance amma ya kan yi jinkiri.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Wasu ma'aikatanmu suna aiki daga nesa akaro na farko.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Abokai aikinmu na nesa sun san cewar zai iya zaman daidaitawa ne, kuma suna son su bada shawara.

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: A rage tsawon tattaunawa zuwa dai awa daya ko biyu a jere.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Idan ana buƙatar tsawan lokaci, yi tunani yadda za a rarraba su a cikin kwanakin gaba da yawa.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Ƙayyade haduwar sosai, sami dalilin taron, da tura da kayayyakin karatu.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Ka sanya bidiyo yazama na ainihi, da kayan aiki irin su Google Docs da Zoom don sauƙaƙe saduwa da sadarwa na kai tsaye ta hanyar intanet.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Yi jagora don sauƙaƙewar kowane taro, wani don saka idanu akan tattaunawa don tambayoyi da bibiyar jerin masu magana, da kuma wani don taimakawa wajen daukar bayanan (ko hadin gwiwan daukan-rubutu).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Ka tura sakon imel ga tech support idan kan bukata na'urar sa a kune wato headset wanda ke da dadi.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Yi amfani da abin kara lafiyar ka a matsayin abun ciye-ciye.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Shiga tashar #remoties a Slack domin tatauna da abokan aiki game da rarrabawar aiki.

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Ayyukan HR tana neman jagora cikin jagorar tushen ginin gizon ergonomics don tallafawa karuwan rarraba aikin a fadin Gidauniyar.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Mun tambayi dukan al'uma a makon da ta gabata su ba magajiya su sauke tallafin kudin Wikimedia ga jama'a, kamar editathons, har sai WHO tace annobar ya kare.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Mun sanar da cewa mun fahimta bukatun mu na dakatar da wasu ƙuntatawa zai sa gamawar yarjejeniyan tallafin kudin su da wuya da cewa babu wani wanda za a hukuna domin bata lokaci ko gyara manufofin.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Zamu sake bi da karin jagorori cikin mako mai zuwa kan Wikimedia da wasu yanki da taron al'uma yadda aka saba.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Tunanin mutane gabaki daya daga al'uman duniya ya nuna zaman a matsayin bakin ciki da rushewa amma an sake a ganawa maikyau da karfin mai da hankali a kan al'umai, Wikimedia da in ba haka ba.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Cin gaba, CRT tana aiki wajen samar da shafi ta META-WIKI don samar da fili don al'uma zasu lura kuma su rika bin dukkanin bayananmu da su.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Kasance cikin lura da duk abinda ya shafi COVID-19

sourceString: We'll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Zamu tura muku da gayyatar ta kalanda Ranar Alhamis mai zuwa, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT don taron na mussamma ga ma'aikatan mu.

sourceString: We'll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Za mu yi amfani da wannan lokacin don raba ƙarin sabuntawa, amsa tambayoyin kuma kashe ɗan lokaci kaɗan don haɗu da juna.

sourceString: We're in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Muna cikin wannan tare kuma muna nan mu taimaki duk yadda za mu iya.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: A dan lokaci nan, zaku iya samun bayanan na ta wannan imel, da kuma wurin da ya shafi bayanai iri daya na COVID-19 kan Office Wiki,

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT kan aje shafukan ne da kyau da dukan bayanaia wuri guda.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Muna aiki don ci gaba da sadarwa tare da ma'aikata waɗanda suke zaune a cikin ƙasashen da a halin yanzu suke shafa.
