sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don't hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Idan kana da tambaya game da yin tafiya, ko wani sha'ani, ko wani aiki, ko cike gurbi ko wani abu to kana bukatar taimako kar kaji komai ka sanar damu ka ba CRT goyon baya.

sourceString: We're here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Muna nan don mu bada taimakon mu da tallafi idan an bukaci hakan.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Idan kana da wani abu mai muhimmanci ko al'amari mai bukatar kulawa, don Allah ka tura sakon imel ga Bryan Judan - Darectan HR International Global Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Kada a ga wadannan canje-canje a matsayin barin aiki gaba daya da takalifi.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Maimakon haka, suna sanen cewa a wannan lokacin, aikin mu da takalifin kan iya buƙaci daidaitawa ta hanyar da ba mu yi ba a da.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Wadannan sune matakan da muke gani yana da muhimmanci domin tallafawa juna sabo da mu ci gaba da gudanar da aiki, mu samar wa kungiyar mu da taimakon da suke bukata, da aikin da duniya ta dogara.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Tsarin aikin mu na nan kuma na kan jiran mu idan lokacin ya yi.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: A yanzu, lokaci ne na kula da juna a kuma samar da wuri domin muhimancin aikin da ke zuwa cikin makonai da watakila watanai masu zuwa.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Muna bukatan goyon bayan ku wajen tabbatar da hakan ta yiwu, don haka muna so ku kula da kan ku da iyalan ku don kusamu damar taimakawar idan bukatan haka ta taso.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don't touch your face!
targetString: Yanzu, don Allah - ku wanke hannuwanku kuma kada ku taɓa fuskarku!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, ita CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), tare da sauran shuwagabanni (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, da Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: Juyawar b'Angiotensin enzyme na 2 (ACE2) wani enzyme ne wanda aka haɗe zuwa saman farfajiya (membranes cell) na sel a cikin huhu, arteries, zuciya, koda, da hanji.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 yana ƙididdige ayyukan aikin enzyme mai alaƙa da haɗin gwiwa (ACE) ta hanyar rage yawan ƙwayar angiotensin-II da haɓaka Ang (1-7) yana sanya shi manufa mai mahimmanci don magance cututtukan zuciya. ACE2 kuma yana aiki azaman hanyar shiga cikin sel don wasu coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Irin ra'ayi enzyme na dan Adam ana kiransa hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Ingantaccen enzyme na Angiotensin 2 shine zinc wanda ke dauke da ironloenzyme wanda yake a saman endothelial da sauran sel.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Abubuwan gina jiki na ACE2 ya ƙunshi yanki na N-terminal peptidase M2 da yankin C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transportar domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 nau'ikan furotin membrane ne mai wucewa, tare da yanki mai aiki na enzymatically wanda yake fallasa saman sel a cikin huhu da sauran kyallen jiki.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Yankin extracellular na ACE2 an barke shi daga yanki mai ƙwayar cuta ta wani enzyme da aka sani da zubar da jini, kuma sakamakon furotin mai narkewa ana fitar dashi cikin magudanar jini kuma a ƙarshe ya kasance cikin fitsari.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 yana nan cikin yawancin gabobin: ACE2 na haɗu da fatar mafi yawa nau'in huhu II na tantanin halitar alveolar, enterocytes na ƙananan hanji, jijiya da ƙwayoyin jijiyoyin tantanin halita na zuciya da kuma ƙwayoyin tsoka mai laushi a cikin yawancin gabobin.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: ACE2 MRNA bayanana ana iya samun su a cerebral cortex, straitum hypotamalamus da briainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Aikin farko na ACE2 shine tsaya a matsayin daidaita ma'auni ga ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE ta kuntatawa angiotensin I hormone cikin vasoconstricting angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2 bi da bi ya kuntatawa da carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine daga angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) da hydrolyses shi cikin vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg -Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 na iya share wasu peptides da suka hada da [des-Arg9] -bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, da ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 kuma yana daidaita fataucin membrane na tsaka mai ɗaukar amino acid SLC6A19 kuma yana da nasaba da cutar ta Hartnup.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: A matsayin transmembrane furotin, ACE2 na aiki a matsayin babban hanyar shiga cikin tantanin halita (Cell) ga wasu coronavirus, hade da HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (kwayar cuta da ke haifar da SARS); da SARS-CoV-2 (kwayar cuta da ke haifar da COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: mussaman kamar dai hadewar protein spike s1 na sars-cov da sars-cov2 do hadewa majinyacin a ACE2 a sansanin kwayar halitta wanda sakakmakon haka na haifar da endocytosis da translocation na cutar da ma kwayar hallitar a cikin endosome wanda ce a cikin cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: mashigar na tar-tare da dukkan kaidojin priming na S protein na daga maajin serine protease TMPRSS2, da samuwar wanda ake bincikawa a yanzua matsayin babban thrapeutic. wanan ya jagoranci saukar kintaci a matakin na ACE2, a cikin cells, wada ka iya taimakawa wajen kokawa da cutar.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: ko da kuwa ya yawan su alummar kwarraru dama sun bukaci cigaba da tsarin ACE inhibitor dama ARB therapyh.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: wane sake duba aka wallalfa a yuly 11 na 2012 wanda ya gano ACE inhibitiors nada alaka da kaso 34% na ragin sanyi in ka kwatanta da maaunan.

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: kura hadarin sanyi aka bawa majinyatan ACE inhibitors wanda ka daf da kamuwa da sanyoi. ko mutuwar jiki ko zuciya.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Amfani da masu hana kwayoyin cuta na ACE shima yana da alaƙa da rage yawan mace-macen huhu, kodayake sakamakon da aka samu ba shi da ƙima baya ga haɗarin cutar huhu.

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Haduwar tantanin halita mutum wato Recombination human ACE2 (rhACE2) ana zaton zaman jinyar tsanani ciwon huhu, ya bayyana zuwa ingantawar aikin huhun da isashen iska a cikin kananan aledu da jawowar cututtukar lipopolysaccharide wanda ke haifar alamun tsananin gajiyar hanyar numfashi.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: rabin ran RHACE2 a mutane na da sa'a 10 da aikin dakika 30 ciki harda karin aikin sa'a 24.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Yawancin binciken da aka samu sun nuna cewa rhACE2 na iya zama magani wadanda basa jureyar renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) ko a cututtuka in da kewayewar anglotensin II na ɗaukaka. An kimanta rhACE2 wanda aka cika a gwajin asibiti domin jinyar alamun tsananin gajiyar hanyar numfashi.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 sune aikace-aikacen software na wayar hannu waɗanda aka tsara don taimaka wajan tuntuɓar ganowa don mayar da martani ga cutar ta coronavirus ta 2019-20, watau aiwatar da gano mutane ("lambobin sadarwa") waɗanda wataƙila sun kasance suna hulɗa da mutumin da ya kamu.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: neman shiga da dama aka kero ko samo, amman da tallafin gwamnati a wasu yankunan da mazaunan bayannane.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: tsari da dama dan gano wanda aka yi alaka dasu aka bijiro.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: An tayar da damuwar sirri, musamman game da tsarin da ya danganta ga bin wuraren kasashen masu amfani da manahaja.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: karamin wani KAFAR na amfani da iska don shiga sansanin yanar wassu wayoyin.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: A ranar 10 ga Afrilu 2020, Google da Apple sun ba da sanarwar cewa za su haɗu da ayyuka don tallafa wa irin waɗannan aikace-aikacen da ke cikin Bluetooth kai tsaye a cikin tsarin aikinsu na Android da iOS.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: A cikin China, gwamnatin kasar, tare da hadin gwiwar Alipay, ta tura wani manahaja wanda barin 'yan ƙasa damar bincika idan sun kasance suna hulɗa da mutanen da ke da cutar COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Ana amfani da shi sama da biranen China fiye da 200. A Singapore, ana amfani da wani app da ake kira TraceTogether.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Al'umar gida na IT ne suka kirkiro manahanjar, an sake shi a matsayin budade ne kuma za a mika shi ga gwamnati. Arewacin Makidoniya ta ƙaddamar da "StopKorona!", Wata manahanja ce ta Bluetooth don gano haɗarin daga mutanen da ke kamuwa da kwaya cutar kuma suna ba da amsa ga hukumomin lafiya.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Ma'aikatar Sadarwa da Fasaha da Ma'aikatar Kiwon lafiya ne suka kirkiri app din.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Tun daga ranar 14 ga watan Afrilu 2020, app ɗin yana jiran amincewa daga Google Play Store da Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: ranar 12 ga watan afrilu gwamnatin tace bibiyar muammal ta manhaja na ciki zanon jigaba kuma an kusa sakin shi cikin makwanin makamanciyar wannan manhaja ake kir kira a ireland da mma faransa stopcovid.

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Dukansu Ostiraliya da New Zealand suna la'akari da aikace-aikacen da aka yi amfani da su dangane da TraceTogether app na Singapore da yarjejeniya ta BlueTrace. Rasha ta yi niyyar gabatar da wani babban juzu'i na kayan aiki ga marasa lafiya da aka gano tare da COVID-19 da ke zaune a Moscow, wanda aka tsara don tabbatar da cewa ba su bar gida ba.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, farfesa a fannin injiniya na tsaro a Jami'ar Cambridge, ya lissafa wasu matsaloli masu yuwuwar aiwatar da tsare-tsaren aikace-aikacen na yanar gizo, gami da karairayi na karya da kuma yiwuwar rashin inganci idan shan kayan aikin zai iyakance ne ga karancin al'umma.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Magance damuwa game da yaudarar yaduwar ko cutarwar manhajar “coronavirus”, Apple ta seta iyaka a bisan irin na'uin da kungiya za su iya sa wanda ke da alaka da coronavirus a cikin shagon manhaja, iyakance su kawai “jami'oi” ko wasu kungiya da ke sananne.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google da amazon sun aiwatar da ƙuntatawa iri daya.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Masu tallata bayanan sirri sun bayyana damuwar su game da tasirin sa ido tsakanin jama'a ta amfani da kayan aikin coronavirus, musamman game da ko kayayyakin aikin sa ido da aka kirkira don magance cutar ta Coronavirus za a watsar da zarar barazanar ta wuce.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Kungiyar kare hakkin dan adam ta Amnesty International da wasu kungiyoyi sama da 100 sun fitar da sanarwa suna kiran a takaita wannan nau'in sa ido.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Kungiyoyin sun bayana yanayi takwas a kan ayyukan gwamnati:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: Dole ne ayyukan sa ido su kasance “bisa doka, sannan ya zama ana bukatar sa, kuma daidai gwargwado”.

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: buda ko kula da bibini na iya samun yammacin.

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: yin amfani da bayanai ya zama dole ne a taƙaice ga dalilai na COVID-19;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: Dole ne a kiyaye bayanan sirri da kuma ba da ma'amala kuma a nuna a kiyaye shi bisa dalilai;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: Saka ido kan marasa lafiya ta hanyar na'uran dijital dole ne a guje wariaya da raban kai.

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: duk wani musayar bayanai tare da wasu dole ne a ayyana shi a cikin doka;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: Akwai kiyayewa daga zagi da kuma hakkin 'yan kasa don mayar da martani ga cin zarafin;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: Shiga tataunawar da ma'ana ga dukkan masu fada aji ake bukata, dama na ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya da kungiyoyi gammayayar kungiyanr na'urar jamus CCC da ma yan jarida marasa iyaka (Reporter ohne Grenzen) RSF suma sun fidda sunayen dubawa.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Tsarin Google / Apple da aka gabatar ya yi niyya don magance matsalar ci gaba da sa ido ta hanyar cire hanyar ganowa daga cikin tsarin aikin na'urar su muddin ba a bukatar hakan.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: wasu kasashen sun yi amfani da bibiyar inda ake a maimakon manhajojin wanda ke fitar da amfanin sauke manhajar da kuma kare bibiyar in da ake.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: A cikin Isra'ila, an amince da bincika hanyoyin sadarwa.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Mafita hanyoyin sadarwa waɗanda ke da damar yin amfani da bayanan albarkatun wuri suna da mahimmancin nuna matsalolin sirri.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Koyaya, ba duk tsarin da sabobin tsakiya ke buƙatar samun damar zuwa wurin bayanan sirri ba; da yawa tsarin tsare sirri na sirri wadanda aka kirkira wadanda suke amfani da sabobin tsakiya kawai don sadarwa (duba sashin da ke ƙasa).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: A Korea ta Kudu wata kafa ce ba manhaja ba akayi amfani da ita wajen gano muammala.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Maimakon yin amfani da tsararren manahaja (app), tsarin ya tattara bayanan bin diddigin abubuwa daga kafofin da yawa haɗe da bayanan waya da bayanan ma'amala na katin, da haɗa waɗannan don haifar da sanarwa ta hanyar saƙonnin rubutu ga mutane masu kamuwa da cuta.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Baya ga yin amfani da wannan bayanin don faɗakar da abokan hulɗa, gwamnatin ta kuma sanya bayanan wurin a bayyane, wani abin da aka ba da izini saboda canje-canje masu yawa ga dokokin sirri bayan fashewar MERS a waccan ƙasar.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Ana amfani da wannan bayanin ga jama'a ta hanyar wasu aikace-aikace da shafukan yanar gizo. Asusun da ya haɗa da Jamus an yi amfani da su ta amfani da tsarin tsarke da tsare sirri.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: a ranar 6 ga watan Afrilu 2020, ba bayanin da aka saki tukkunna.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Tsare bayanan sirri na tuntuɓar ganowa ingantaccen tsari ne, tare da ingantaccen jikin littafin binciken waɗanda suka fara komawa aƙalla shekarar 2013. Tun daga 7 Afrilu 2020, sama da gwanayen kwararru goma sha biyu suna aiki akan mafita na sirri, kamar amfani da Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) don rattaba kusanci ga mai amfani da sauran wayoyin salula.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Duk da haka, PEPP-PT ƙoƙari ne na haɗin gwiwar wanda ya ƙunshi duka hanyoyin tsakiya da kuma hanyoyin sassauƙa, ba yarjejeniya ɗaya ba. Ka'idojin da aka ba da sun hada da Kan Sirri na Shaida (DP-PPT / DP-3T), Lambobin Gida na Lokaci (TCN, fka ayyukar lambobin haduwa, CEN), Tsarin Sirrin da Tsarin Hanyoyi don Binciken Sadarwar Waya (PACT) da sauran su.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: a wannan tsarin kamnceceniya akan bayanan ba a bari akan na'urar amman duk hadan akan na'urar ke faruwa.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: gammayar rashin shiga hadi na dakin gwajin MIT suna ta kirkiro da hanyoyi wanda ke da kariya a kafar ta hanyar laakari da rashin shiga hadi wajen bibiya da ma amfani da wajen ko gurbin dake a ware na bayanan sirri don bibiya yaduwar covid-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: yanada alaka da bincike na farar takardar Apps gone rogue bada tazara ta mussaman na hana shiga haddi a annoba wanda aka saki a watan maris 2020 a wani makamancin kokari na kafar safe trace na enigma mpc wani kamfani mai kirkrirar kimmiya wanda ya samo tushe dagss dakin gwaji na MIT.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: safe trace na amfani da kimiyya wajen barin masu amfani da kafar ta hanyar bayanar da waje mai jan hankali da bayanan kiwon lafiya da ma'aikata ba tare da sun shiga haddin su ba.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Ranar 5 ga watan Afrilu 2020, kungiyoyin TCN na duniya suka kafa ƙungiyoyin da suka haɗa kan abin da ainihi hanya ɗaya suke bi kuma yawancin karɓar ladabi, tare da burin rage rarrabuwar kawuna, da kuma ba da damar ci gaba da ma'amala na duniya gaba ɗaya ta hanyar ganowa da faɗakarwa kantunan aikace-aikace, mahimmin ɓangaren cimma burin yaduwar.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: A ranar 9 ga watan afrilu 2020, gwamnatin singapore ta sanar da bude tushen gano sanadin alaka ta manhajar ta na gwamnatin kasa.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: A ranar 10 ga Afrilu 2020, Google da Apple, kamfanonin da ke sarrafa dandamali na wayar salula na Android da iOS, sun ba da sanarwar wani shiri don ganowa, wanda suka ce za su adana sirrin, wanda ya danganta da haɗin fasahar Bluetooth Low Energy da kuma tsare sirrin sirri.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: sun kuma wallafa tsari na ainahin kimiyyar da aka yi amfani da shi a cikin kafar.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Dangane da Apple da Google, tsarin yana da niyyar yin birgima a matakai uku:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: fitar da kayan aiki don bawa gwamnati dama kirkiro mahaja ma bibiya da kuma hana shiga hadin mutane.

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: haɗa wadanan hanyoyin aikin kai tsaye cikin iOS da Android Google da Apple shirin don magance matsalolin kulawa da ci gaba ta hanyar rarraba tsarin ta hanyar sabunta tsarin aiki, kuma daga baya cire shi a cikin hanyar da zarar barazanar ta wuce.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: sake zaman b'Drug wanda aka fi sani da sake neman, sake tsarin, sake aikin, ko chanjin kulawar shine sanu tsarin yardajen magani don warkar da cututuka daban-daban ko tsarin magani wanda ba dan haka aka kirkiro shi ba.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: wannan binciken layi daya ne na ilimin fasaha wanda aka fara don samun ingantaccen maganin covid-19.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Sauran hanyoyin nazarce-nazarcen sun hada da haɓakar allurar rigakafin ƙwaƙwalwar ƙwayar cuta ta COVID-19 da ƙwayar cutar plasma ta convalescent.SARS-CoV-2 yana da kimanin sunadarai 66 na magani, kowannensu yana da shafuka masu ɗaukar nauyin ligand.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: awun wannan shafuka na bada daman fito da aiki mai inganci dan cigaba da samar da magani covid-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Daya daga cikin muhimman SARS CoV2 kamun proteins sune Papain like proteins RNA dogaro RNA polymerse. helicase, s Protein da ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein AA, da ma wasu sun karanci kowani kwayar halitar sannan suka auna tare da gwada kamanceceniyar kwarangwal da magunguna wanda suka fi karbuwa don gaggauta samar da maganin SARS Cov-2 a yayin gwajin kiwon lafiya dln shawarta a tsarin binciken kiwon lafiya.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Chloroquine magani ne na zazzabin cizon sauro wanda kuma ana amfani dashi akan wasu cututtuka na garkuwa.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: a ranar 18 ga watan maris WHO ta sanar cewa choloroquine da dangin hydroxychloroqueen na daga ciki magunguna hudu wanda za a yi gwajin kiwon lafiya dasu na hadin kai.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Gwamnan New York Andrew Cuomo ya ba da sanarwar cewa gwaji na jihar New York zai fara aiki a ranar 24 ga Maris. A ranar 28 ga Maris, FDA ta ba da izinin yin amfani da hydroxychloroquine sulfate da chloroquine phosphate a karkashin Izinin Amfani na gaggawa (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Ba a yardada tsarin jinyar gwajin asibiti wanda FDA'S su ka yi ba kuma an ba shi izini a karkashin EUA kawai azaman jinyar gwaji don amfani na gaggawa a cikin marasa lafiya da ke asibiti amma ba su iya karɓar magani a cikin gwajin asibiti ba

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC ta ce "ba a kafa amfani da, allura, ko tsawon lokacin hydroxychloroquine don maganin cizon prophylaxis ko kula da kamuwa da cututtukan SARS-CoV-2" ba tukuna.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Likitoci Sun ce Suna Amfani Da Kwayar maganin In “Babu Mafita”.

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Wata tawaga da ke bincike a Turkiyya a Istanbul na gudanar da karamin bincike kan amfanin chloroquine a hade da zinc, Vitamin A, Vitamin C da Vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: bincike babba na guddana a jami'ar duke da ma jami'ar oxford .

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: nyu makarantar karatun likita na gwajin wani matakin kariya da ma rsahin amfani da hydroxychloroquine.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Gwajin asibiti na kasar Sin a Wuhan da Shenzhen sun ce sun nuna favipiravir "a bayyanen inganci".

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Marasa lafiya 35 a Shenzhen gwajin ta nuna ba su da cutar ba a tsakiyar kwana 4, yayin da tsawon rashin lafiya ya kasance kwanaki 11 a cikin marasa lafiyar 45 waɗanda ba su kamu da shi ba.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: A cikin wani binciken da aka yi a Wuhan a kan mutane 240 da ke fama da cutar huhu, rabi ne aka ba su fulopiravir kuma rabi suka karɓi umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: hukuma magani na italia na tiunasar wa akan tabacin tallafi na magani da gwajin shi.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, Jamus ta sanar cewa za ta sayi maganin daga Japan don ajiyar ta, kuma za ta yi amfani da sojoji wajen isar da maganin a asibitocin jami'a, inda za a yi amfani da maganin don yi wa marasa lafiya na COVID-19.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Bisa ga rahoton Morning Post na China ta Kudu, Shinzo Abe ya yi yarjejeniya ga gwamnatin Trump domin sayawar magani. Maganin na iya zama mara karfi cikin cututtuka masu tsanani inda kwayar cutan ta yadu.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Yana iya zama ba amintaccen amfani ga mata masu juna biyu ko waɗanda ke ƙoƙarin yin ciki.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Daya daga cikin binciken lopinavir / ritonavir (Kaletra), haɗuwa da maganin rigakafin lopinavir da ritonavir, sun kammala cewa "babu wani fa'ida da aka gani".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: an shiyar maganin ne ta yanda zai hana HIV zama a ciki da ma kamanceceniya da hadewar protese.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Wata ƙungiyar masu bincike a Jami'ar Colorado suna ƙoƙarin sauya magungunan don samo wani fili wanda zai ɗaure tare da kariya ta SARS-CoV-2.Da akwai zargi a cikin ƙungiyar kimiyya game da ba da gudummawar albarkatun don sake dawo da magunguna musamman da aka tsara don cutar HIV / Kanjamau.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: Hukumar ta WHO ta hada da lopinavir / ritonavir a cikin shari'ar Solidarity ta kasa da kasa.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir ya kirkiro da haɓaka ta Gilead Sciences a matsayin kwayar cutar Ebola da kamuwa da cutar Marburg. Bayan haka, ilimin kimiyyar Gileyad ya gano cewa Remdesivir yana da aikin rigakafi a cikin fitsari a kan ƙwayoyin cuta masu yawa, ƙwayoyin cuta, paramyxo-, da ƙwayoyin cuta.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Daya daga cikin matsalolin warkar da irin wannan cuta shi ne yakan bijirewa magani ta hanyar sake launi wanda ka iya haifar da wasu cututuka masu tsanani da yaduwa.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Wasu daga farkon bincike da aka yi sun nuna cewa karatun zai iya samun babbar illa ta hanyar juriya. Akwai gwaji na asibiti da yawa, wadanda suka hada da asibitocin Jami'ar Cleveland guda biyu; daya na mutanen da ke da matsakaici na rashin lafiya da kuma wani don waɗanda ke da tsananin ciwo.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Akwai gwajin asibiti guda uku masu wanda ake gudanarwa na bitamin C ta cikin Jijiyar jini don mutanen da ke asibiti da rashin lafiya mai tsanani domin COVID-19; sarrafawar maganin gwaji guda biyu (Sin, Kanada) da daya wanda babu sarrafawa (Italiya)

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Jihar New York ta fara gwajin garkuwan halita azithromycin a ranar 24 ga watan Maris 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: hukumar kasar japan ta lafiya da magani a duniya NCGM na shirin gwaji teijin alvesco ciclisionide abun shaka na corticosteriod na asthma domin warkar da kamun farko na cutar corona.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Wani nau'i na angiotensin-mai canza yanayin enzyme 2, an fara gwaji yeneyi Phase II tare da marasa lafiya 200 don ɗaukar su daga mummunan, cututtukan asibiti a Denmark, Jamus, da Austria don sanin tasirin magani.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Masu Bincike A Makarantar Zuciya Ta Montreal Na Kasar Canada Na bincikan matsayin Colchicine a ragewar kumburi da rikitarwa huhu a marasa lafiya wanda suke Fama Daga Karamin alamun ciwon COVID-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: binciken mai suna colcorona na dauka sama da mutane 6000 masu shekara 40 sama wanda suka kamu da covid-19 kuma sun dana makarancin hali ba na asibiti ba.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Matan da ke da juna biyu ko masun bada nono ko kuma ba su da ingantaccen tsarin hana haihuwa, ba su cancanta ba.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: da dama anticoagulants ana ta gwada su a ksar italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: ana amfani da low molecular weight wajen warkar da majinyata, wanda hakan yasa hukumomin italia suka wallafa kaidojin amfani da shi.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: wani bincikie ya nuna majinyata 300 na amfani da enoxaparin sodium da prophylaxix da therapautickimar da aka sanar a 14 a afrilu.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Tunda SARS-CoV-2 kwayar cuta ce, an mayar da hankali sosai kan batun kimiyya don mayar da martani don ƙaddamar da magungunan rigakafin da aka yarda da su wanda aka kirkira don barkewar cutar kamar MERS, SARS, da kwayar cutar ta West Nile.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: An bada shawarar jinyar COVID-19 da Ribavirin bisa ga bugun ka'idoji na 7 kasar Sin

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir: an ba da shawarar umifenovir don maganin COVID-19 bisa ga ka'idoji na 7 na kasar Chinese

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: wasu magungun na iya warkar da covid-19.

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): China ta amince da shi.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: kuma gwaji a italy da china ku kalli Tocilizumab #COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: allurar rigakafin b'A COVID-19 maganin rigakafin cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Kodayake babu maganin alurar riga kafi da ya kammala gwajin asibiti, akwai ƙoƙarin da yawa a cikin ci gaba don haɓaka irin wannan maganin.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: A ƙarshen Fabrairu 2020, Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta ce ba ta tsammanin samun allurar rigakafin ƙwayar cutar SARS-CoV-2, ta zama ƙasa da watanni 18.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: ‘Yan maganin rigakafi su biyar na cikin Mataki I na karatun lafiya cikin Afrilu.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: An gano covid-19 a december 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: A wa ni barkewar a duniya a 2020 yasa karin haniun jari a BINCIKEN NEMAN MAGANI.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Kungiya da yawa na amfani da kwayar halita genomes ta wajen haɓakawar maganin rigakafin SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: An fara shi a watan Afrilu, muhimancin himmar CEPI don haɓaka maganin rigakafi da wuri, yawan sarrafawa, turawa da yawa, da samun sa a duk duniya.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: A watan Afrilu, masanan kimiyya na CEPI sun ba da rahoton cewa hanyoyin fasahar fasaha daban-daban 10 suna ƙarƙashin bincike da haɓakawa a farkon 2020 don ƙirƙirar ingantaccen allurar rigakafin COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: zauruka dayawa sun danawa sihag cigaban shashi na I akan karatun kariya kamar;

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: nucleic Acid (DNA Da RNA) (Mataki I mai haɓakawa da masun maganin rigakafii: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: viral vector (Tsarin I na haɓakawa kuma ɗan takarar alurar rigakafi: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Wani rahoton cepi na masu fasaha a watan afrilu, magunguna 115 aka fara kerowa da 78 tabbatatu masu cigaba 79 a cewar makarantar miken 37 son sanar amman babu bayani a cikin alumma ana zaton suna tsari ko shiryawa a dakunan gwaji da dama.

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: A shashe na I-II na gwajin kiyayewar farko da gwajin garkuwa, ana hade sune ba zabi kuma ba riko da wajen kuma a waje dayawa, wanda ke bada sahihanci dama ingantacen kima.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Gwajin matakai na III yawanci ya ƙunshi ƙarin mahalarta, gami da rukuni na sarrafawa, da gwajin tasiri na cutar rigakafin don hana cutar, yayin sa ido don tasirin mummunar sakamako mafi kyau.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Daga cikin 'yan gwajin rigakafin 79 a cikin ci gaba (wanda aka tabbatar da shi tun farkon Afrilu 2020), 74 ba su kasance cikin kimantawar ɗan Adam ba (har yanzu suna cikin "preclinical” bincike).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Kusan ran 24 ga watar Janairu shekarar 2020 a Ostiraliya, Jami'ar Queensland ta ba da sanarwar cewa tana binciken yiwuwar rigakafin ƙwayar cuta wanda zai iya canza kwayar furotin don ta tada tsarin garkuwa.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: A kusan 24 Janairu 2020 a kasar Kanada, Cibiyar Kula da Alurar rigakafi ta Duniya (VIDO-InterVac) a Jami'ar Saskatchewan ta ba da sanarwar fara aiki a kan allurar rigakafin, da nufin fara gwajin ɗan adam a cikin 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: An sanar da Ayyukan haɓakawar Rigakafi A Hukumar Kula Da Karewar Daga Cuta A 26 ga watar Junairu 2020 A China, Da Jami'ar Honk Kong a ranar 28 ga watan Janairu.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: A wuraren 29 ga watan junairu 2020 kamfanoni magungunna na jassen wanda henneke schuitemaker ke jagoranta, su sanar da fara kirkikra maganin.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: janssen na kirkiro magani na rowa tare da abokin huldar shir wadan ya kware a dakin gwaji vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: A ranar 18 ga watan Maris 2020, Emergent BioSolutions sun ba da sanarwar hadin gwiwan sarrafawa tare da Vaxart don haɓakar maganin rigakafi.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: A ranar 8 ga Fabrairu 2020, dakin gwaje-gwaje na OncoGen a Romania sun buga takarda kan ƙirar rigakafin tare da fasaha mai kama da wannan don maganin rigakafin cutar kansa.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: A ranar 25 Ga Watan Maris Shugaban Makarantar Bincike ya sanar cewa sun gama hadawar Rigakafin kuma and fara gwajin ta.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: A ranar 27 ga Fabrairu 2020, wani kamfanin tallafi na Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, ya ba da sanarwar cewa sun fara aikin rigakafin cutar don kirkirar wani allurar rigakafin Ii-Key a kan COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Suna So Su Samar Da Rigakafin Da Za A Iya Gwada Shi A Kan Mutum “A tsakanin Kwanaki 90.”

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: A ranar 5 Maris 2020, Jami'ar Washington da ke St. Louis ta ba da sanarwar ayyukanta don bunkasa allurar rigakafi.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: A rana 5 ga watan Maris 2020, aurka makarantar sojin ta su n vyi vbincvike a fort derick da walter reed da makarantar bincike na silver spring duk a western mary lant sun sanar da aikin ne man nagani.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: A kusan 10 Maris 2020, Emergent Biosolutions ya ba da sanarwar cewa ta yi ma'amala tare da Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: a hadin da ma kir-kirar magani.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Abokan haɗin gwiwar sun kara ba da sanarwar shirye-shiryen gwajin fari da Mataki I na gwajin asibiti a watan Yuli 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: A ranar 12 Maris 2020, Ma'aikatar Lafiya ta Indiya ta sanar da cewa suna aiki tare da kebe guda 11, kuma koda akan saurin sauri zai ɗauki akalla shekara ɗaya da rabi zuwa shekara biyu don samar da maganin.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: A ranar 12 ga watan Maris 2020, Medicago, kamfani a fannin ilimin halittu a Birnin Quebec, Quebec, ya ba da rahoton ci gaban coronavirus-kamar ɓarke ƙarƙashin ɓangare na kudade daga Makarantun Kanada don Binciken Kiwon Lafiya.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Maganin riga kafin da ake gwaji Na Cikin Dakin Bincike, Da tsarin gwajin a watan Yuly Ko AuGusta 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: A farkon makon nan, Jaridar The Guardian ta bayar da rahoton cewa Shugaban Amurka Donald Trump ya yi wa CureVac '' kudade masu yawa 'don damar samun damar yin amfani da allurar rigakafin cutar ta' 'Covid-19', wanda gwamnatin Jamus ta nuna rashin amincewarta.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Ranar 17 ga watan Maris 2020, Kamfanin maganin Amurka Pfizer ta sanar da hadin gwiwa tare da kamfanin BioNTech na Jamus don haɓaka rigakafi irin ta mRNA.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: magani irin na mRNA-based dan bNT162, wanda a yanzu ke cikin gwajin lafiya ana tsamanin shi a april 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: A Italiya a ranar 17 Maris 2020, Takis Biotech, wani kamfani na ilimin kimiyyar kere-kere na Italiya ya sanar da cewa za su sami sakamakon gwajin-asibiti a watan Afrilu 2020 kuma dan takarar na karshe na rigakafin cutar zai iya fara gwajin dan adam da faduwa.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: A Faransa a ranar 19 Maris 2020, Kungiyar Hadin Gwiwa game da Cike da cuta (CEPI) ta sanar da saka hannun jari na dala miliyan $ 4.9 a cikin wata cibiyar bincike ta COVID-19 wacce ta shafi Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), da Jami'ar Pittsburgh, suna kawowa, Jami'ar Pittsburgh, suna kawowa Jami'ar Pittsburgh, suna kawo Kudaden hannun jarin CEPI a cikin ci gaban allurar rigakafin COVID-19 zuwa dala miliyan 29.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Sauran abokan hadin gwiwar CEPI don ci gaban allurar rigakafin COVID-19 sune Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Jami'ar Hong Kong, Jami'ar Oxford, da Jami'ar Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: A ranar 20 ga Maris 2020, jami'an kiwon lafiya na kasar Rasha sun ba da sanarwar cewa masana kimiyya sun fara gwajin dabbobi daban-daban ‘yan takarar rigakafi shida.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Masu binciken Kwalejin Kwaleji ta Landan sun sanar a ranar 20 ga Maris 2020 cewa suna haɓaka maganin RNA na karɓar kansa don COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Aka haɓaka maganin rigakafin cikin kwanaki 14 ya inda aka samo jerin gwajin daga China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: A ƙarshen watan Maris, gwamnatin Kanada ta ba da sanarwan miliyan C$275 a cikin kudade don ayyukan bincike na 96 a kan magungunan ƙetare game da COVID-19, hade da takara da yawa na allurar rigakafi a kamfanoni da jami'o'in Kanada, kamar ayyukan Medicago da Jami'ar Saskatchewan.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: A kusan lokaci guda, Gwamnatin Kanada ta ba da miliyan C$192 musamman don inganta allurar rigakafin COVID-19, tare da shirye-shiryen kafa "bankin maganin rigakafin" na ƙasa na wasu sabbin alluran rigakafin da za a iya amfani da su idan wani barkewar cutar coronavirus ya faru.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: A ranar 2 ga Afrilu 2020, masu bincike a Jami'ar Pittsburgh makarantar ilimin magani sun ba da rahoto game da gwajin PittCoVacc, yiwuwar maganin rigakafin COVID-19 a cikin beraye, yana mai cewa "MNA ta ba da ƙarancin SARS-CoV-2 S1 allurar rigakafin ta nuna yiwuwar antigen-specific amsawar garkuwar jiki [a cikin bera] wadanda suka fara bayyana makonni 2 bayan alurar rigakafi."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: a canada a ranar 16 ga watan afrilu 2020, makarantar magunguna karkashin jamiar waterloo sun sanar da feshin hanci a matsayin maganin su na kwayar halittar DNA.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Amfani da kwayoyin cuta, ana tsara kwayar halitta ta DNA don yin kwayar cutar cikin jikin dan adam don samar da kwayoyin cuta marasa cutarwa, wadanda zasu iya tayar da tsarin garkuwar jiki don samar da kwayoyin kariya daga kwayar ta SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: A watan Maris 2020, gwamnatin amurka , masana'antu da ma wasu jami'oi guda uku sun hada karfi don samar da nau'rori dag kamfanin IBM da ma ayukan bayan sirri na yanar gizo daga kamfanin Hewlett Packard, amazon, microsoft da ma Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Wasu magungunan rigakafin suna da tasirin cutar heterologous, wanda kuma ake kira tasirin da ba na takamaiman sakamako ba.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Hakan yana nufin suna iya samun fa'idodi fiye da cuta wanda aka kare.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Wani ci gaban gwajin da aka yi barkatai a Australia Yana Neman shigarwan ma'aikacin kiwon lafiya guda 4,170

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Yana yiwuwa rigakafin a cikin ci gaba ba zai zama da aminci ko tasiri ba.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Binciken farko domin samun ingancin rigakafin ta yin amfani da CoVID-19 ƙayyadaddu tsarin dabbobi, kamar ACE2-transgenic bera, da ma wasu dabobin dakin Gwaji da wadanda asalin su ba Mutum ba ne, sun nuna bukatar aunawar tsarewan mataki uku na lafiyar halita wato biosafety-level 3 na rikewar kwayar cuta masu rai, da daidaituwan duniya domin tabbatar da tsarin lafiya.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: An yi maganin rigakafin cutar SARS da MERS a cikin samfurin dabba na mutane.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Har zuwa 2020, babu wani maganin warkarwa ko rigakafin kariya daga SARS wanda aka nuna yana da kyau da tasiri a cikin mutane.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Dangane da takardun bincike da aka buga a 2005 da 2006, ganowa da haɓaka allurar rigakafi da magunguna don magance SARS ya kasance fifiko ga gwamnatoci da hukumomin kiwon lafiyar jama'a duniya. Hakanan babu wani ingantaccen maganin alurar rigakafi kan MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Lokacin da MERS ya zama ruwan dare, an yi imanin cewa bincike na SARS wanda akwai na iya samar da samfuri mai amfani don ci gaba da allurar rigakafi da warkewa game da kamuwa da cutar MERS-CoV.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Tun daga Maris 2020, akwai allurar rigakafi (bisa ga DNA) MERS wanda ya ƙare Matak I gwaji na asibiti a cikin mutane, da kuma wasu uku da ke ci gaba, dukkan waɗannan rigakafi ne na masu tafiya da kwayoyin cuta, adenoviral-vectored guda biyu (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac ), kuma MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Tura rubutu ta hanyar sadarwar sun inganta wata ka'ida tunani mai zurfi masu cewa an san kwayar cutar da ke haifar da COVID-19 kuma an riga an sami allurar rigakafi.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Abubuwan da aka ambata waɗanda aka buga ta hanyar kafofin watsa labarun daban-daban na kafofin watsa labarun suna ambatar bayanan da suka kasance game da jerin kwayoyin da kuma alurar rigakafin wasu ƙwayar cuta ta coronavirus kamar SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: cututtukan b'coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) cuta ce wanda ta haifar da matsananciyar rashin lafiya mai saurin kamuwa da cuta coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Alamun kullum sun hada da zazzabi, tari, da matsalar numfashi.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Sauran alamu na iya haɗawa da gajiya, ciwon tsoka, zawo, ciwon makogwaro, rashin kamshi da zafin ciki.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Lokacin kamuwa zuwa bayyanuwar alamun cutar kimanin kwanaki biyar ne amma zai iya bambanta daga biyu zuwa kwanaki goma sha hudu.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Yayin da yawancin lokuta ke haifar da karamar bayyanar cututtuka, wasu ci gaba zuwa cutar huhu da gazawar ƙwayoyin cuta da yawa.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: A ranar 17 Afrilu 2020, an samu karin masu cutan fiye da miliyan biyu (2.24) daga kasashe dari biyu da goma (210) wadda ya jawo mutuwan fiye da miliyan dari da hamsin da uku (153, 000).

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Fiye da mutane dubu dari biyar da sittin da takwas ne suka warke (568, 000). Cutan yana samun yaduwa ne tsakanin mutane yayinda suka kusanci juna, yawancin lokuta ta karamin digon yawu da ke zuwa ta wurin tari, atishawa, ko magana.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Yayin da ɗigagga na fitowa lokacin numfashi, yawancin su na faduwa zuwa kasa ko kan farfajiya maimakon zaman mai iya ba da cuta daga tsawon nesa.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Mutane na iya kamuwa da cutan ta wurin taba gurbataccen farfajiya sannan su taba idanu, hanci, ko baki.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Cutar na iya rayuwa a farfajiya har awa saba'in da biyu (72).

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Ya fi yaduwa a rana uku na farko da fara nuna alamu, ko da yake yana iya yaduwa kafin alamun su bayyana daga baya. Hanyan ganewar asalin cutar ta wurin real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) daga daukan samfurin gwaji daga bayan hanci wato nasopharyngeal swab.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: An ba da shawaran amfani da abin rufe fuska wadanda suke zaton suna da cutan, tare da masu kula da su.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Shawarwarin amfani da kariyar rufe fuska da jama'a sun bambanta, tare da wasu hukumomi suna ba da shawararin a guje amfni da su, wasu na shawarar yin amfani da su, wadansu suna buƙatar amfani da su.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: A halin yanzu, babu maganin alurar rigakafi ko takamaiman maganin rigakafi na COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: An yi rikodin bazawar cutan a gida cikin yawancin ƙasashe kewaye da yankuna shida na WHO.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Wadanda suka kamu da kwayar cutar na iya zama nunin cutar ko haɓaka alamomin kamuwa da mura kamar zazzabi, tari, gajiya, da gazawar numfashi.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Alamun gaggawa sun kunshi wahalan numfashi, ciwon kirji ko matsi, rikicewa, wahalan tashiwa, da shudaden fuska ko lebuna; ana shawarar ganin likita da gaggawa idan aka ga wadannan alamu.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Wasu lokuta, alamu da suka shafi numfashi kamar atishawa, yoyon hanci ko kuma bushewar wuya na bayyanuwa.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Ana ganin kwayar cututtukan ciki kamar tashin zuciya, amai da zawo an lura da su a kashi dabam-dabam.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Wasu masun kamuwa da cutan da matsalar daurin zuciya da saurin bugun zuciya an same su a China.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: A wadansu, cutar za to iya cigaba har zuwa ga cutar limonia, rashin aikin gabobi da mutuwa.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Wannan shine ake kira lokacin hayayyafar cutar.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Lokacin kwanci na COVID-19 kwanaki biyar zuwa shida me amma zai iya dauki kwanaki biyu zuwa 14.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: Kashi 97.5% na mutane da suka nuna alamun sukan yi hakan ne cikin kwanaki goma sha daya da rabi (11.5) da kamuwa. Rohoto ta nuna cewa ba duka wadanda suka kamu bane suke nuna alamun kamuwa da ciwon ba.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Matsayin wadannan masu dauke da cutan wanda bai nuna ba a wajen yadar da shi ba a sani ba tukuna; ko da shike, wasu shaidu sun ba da alama cewa za su iya yaduwa da cutan.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: A yanzu haka ba a san kimanin rabon mutane da ba su nuna alamun kamuwa da cutan ba, amma ana kan bincike. Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) ta ba da rahoton cewa kashi 20% na duka wadanda aka tabatar suna da cutar ba su nuna alamun ba a zamansu a asibiti.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Hukumar kula da lafiya ta kasar Sin ta fara hada wanda suke nuna alamun rashin lafiya cikin masun kamuwa da cutar a yau da kullun rana 1 ga Afrilu; daga cikin masun kamu da cutar su 166 a ranar, 130 (78%) sun kasance masun nuna alamun rashin lafiyar a lokacin gwaji.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Duk majina da yau na iya ɗaukar kwayar cuta da yawa.

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Yin magana da qarfin yana bada damar fita sosai ba kamar yin magana yadda aka saba ba.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Wata bincike da aka yi a Singapore ta bayyana cewa tari na iya jawo faduwa da ke tafiya mita 4.5 (kafa 15).

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Ko da shike kwayar cutan ba zallan iska yake bi ba, National Academy of Science ta ba da shawara cewa bioaerosol transmission na iya faruwa idan aka ajiye air collectors a farfajiya a waje, kusa da muhallin mutane wanda aka samu samfurin tabattace na RNA.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Wasu hanyoyin kiwon lafiya kamar su ciki da kuma farfadowa da zuciya (CPR) na iya haifarda gurbataccen iska wanda zai haifar da yaduwar iska.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Yayinda akwai damuwa ana iya yada shi ta hanyar bayan gida, an yi imanin wannan haɗarin ya yi ƙasa kaɗan. Kwayar cutar ta fi yaduwa yayin da mutane ke alamtawa, yayinda yaduwa zai iya yiwuwa kafin bayyanar cututtuka, hadarin ya yi ƙasa kaɗan.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Cibiyar Yaki da Cututtuka ta Yankin Turai (ECDC) ta ce yayin da ba a bayyana cikakke yadda cutar ke yaduwa cikin sauki ba, mutum daya yana cutar da biyu zuwa uku. Kwayar cutar na rayuwa tsawon awanni zuwa kwanaki a kan abu.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Musamman, an gano kwayar cutar ta kwana ɗaya a cikin kwali, har zuwa kwanaki uku akan filastik (polypropylene) da baƙin ƙarfe (AISI 304), kuma har zuwa sa'o'i huɗu akan 99% jan ƙarfe.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Koyaya, wannan ya bambanta dangane da zafi da zazzabi.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Sabulu na taimakawa idan an yi amfani da shi daidai; samfurin sabulu na tarwasa cutar kuma ya ciresu daga fata da wasu farfajiya.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Sauran mafita kamar benzalkonium chloride da chlorhexidine gluconate, basuda tasiri, A cikin nazarin Hong kong, samfurin yawun baki aka ɗaukar na kwana biyu bayan an fara bada kula a asibiti.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: A cikin marasa lafiya biyar daga cikin shida, samfurin farko ya nuna mafi yawan cuta, sannan mara lafiya na shidan ya nuna mafi yawan nauyin cutar a rana ta biyu da aka yi gwajin.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Mai tsananin ciwo na numfashi cutar corona ta biyu 2 (SARS-CoV-2) matsanancin ciwo mai dauke da cutar corona, farko an killace mutane uku masu fama da cutar huhu da alaka da gungu da rashin lafiya na numfashi a cikin Wuhan.
